Alert.ODGLS144_overridden:Title: 請選擇
Alert.ODGLS144_overridden:AlertMessage:
請選擇沖銷分錄EDI轉入的資料是?
Local科目或合併Code

Alert.FORM_STD_inherited:AlertMessage: Do you really want to exit form ?
Data maybe updated. Do you want to save data?
Data maybe update. Do you want to abandon?

Trigger.ODGLS144_overridden:TriggerText:
declare
--v8.4.1 2008/4/7 Kimberly for FIN-Brent, 歷史匯率項目之Parent_Amount金額必須加上去年度的數字, 使借貸總合也為零 
--v8.5.4 2008/5/15 Kimberly add some check control
--v8.5.5 2008/5/21 Kimberly for FIN-Brent, 歷史匯率項目之ExRate為空白
 cursor c_parent(c_company_id varchar2,c_curr varchar2, c_month date) is
 select parent_id, parent_curr
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date;
 
 cursor c2_chk_close(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date) is
 select nvl(close_flag,'N') close_flag, curr
 from glg1050
 where month_date=c_month
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and data_type='N' 
 and rownum=1;
 
 cursor c3_get_glg1050(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date) is
 select a.*, a.rowid
 from glg1050 a
 where month_date=c_month
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and data_type='N' ; 
 
 cursor c_item(c_item_code varchar2) is
 select rate_type 
 from glg1046
 where item_code=c_item_code; 
 
 cursor c_rate(c_month date, c_child_curr varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2, c_item_code varchar2) is
 select decode(b.rate_type,'1',a.bs_rate,'2',a.is_rate,'3',a.bs_rate,0) child_parent_rate
 from glg1047 a,
 glg1046 b
 where a.month_date=c_month
 and a.curr=c_child_curr 
 and a.parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and b.item_code=c_item_code; 

 --v8.4.1 add by kimberly start--
 cursor c_last_year(c_last_year date, c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2, c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2, c_item_code varchar2) is
 select b.amount, b.parent_amount
 from glg1052 b
 where b.month_date=c_last_year
 and b.company_id=c_company_id
 and b.curr=c_curr
 and b.parent_id=c_parent_id
 and b.parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and b.item_code=c_item_code;
 --v8.4.1 add by kimberly end-- 

v_period_status varchar2(32); 
in_file text_io.file_type; 
out_file text_io.file_type;
v_record varchar2(2000);
v_field_value varchar2(200);
fopen_fail exception; 
pragma exception_init(fopen_fail,-302000); 
v_count number:=0;
v_type varchar2(14);
v_month varchar2(6);
v_fin_month date;
v_company_id varchar2(20);
v_curr varchar2(3);
v_item_code varchar2(10);
v_rate_type varchar2(1);
v_amount number;
v_remark varchar2(200);
v_parent_id varchar2(20);
v_parent_curr varchar2(3);
v_curr_parent_rate number;
v_parent_amount number;
v_glg1050_seq number;
v_chk varchar2(2); 
v_total number :=0; 
v_temp varchar2(2);
text_id varchar2(200);
v_record_no number :=6;
v_errchk varchar2(2);
v_error varchar2(2000);
v_errm varchar2(2000);
v_alert varchar2(2);
v_line_no number :=0;
v_last_pos number:=0; 
--v8.4.1 add by kimberly start-- 
v_last_year date; 
v_last_amt number; 
v_last_parent_amt number; 
--v8.4.1 add by kimberly end--
v_b varchar2(5);
--==============================
-- Main process
--============================== 
begin 
 if :b1v_glg_1050.month_date is null or :b1v_glg_1050.company_id is null then
 s_alert('3','Please input Month_Date and Company_Id!!',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 

 if :b1v_glg_1050.close_flag = 'Y' then
 s_alert('3','已關帳, 資料不可異動!!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 v_fin_month:=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date;
 v_company_id:=:b1v_glg_1050.company_id;
 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c2_chk_close(v_company_id, v_fin_month); --檢查對象公司是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk, v_curr;
 close c2_chk_close; 
 if v_chk is null then
 s_alert('3','無財報EDI資料!!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if; 
 if v_chk = 'Y' then
 s_alert('3','已關帳, 資料不可異動!!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 v_b:=show_alert('ALERT_COMPUTE');
 if v_b=alert_button1 THEN --Hold Amt 重算
 for cc in c3_get_glg1050(v_company_id, v_fin_month) loop 
 v_rate_type:=null;
 open c_item(cc.item_code);
 fetch c_item into v_rate_type;
 close c_item;
 
 v_curr_parent_rate:=0; 
 v_parent_amount:=0; 
 if v_rate_type in ('1','2','3') then
 open c_rate(cc.month_date, cc.curr, cc.parent_curr, cc.item_code);
 fetch c_rate into v_curr_parent_rate;
 close c_rate;
 end if;
 if v_rate_type in ('1','2') then
 v_parent_amount:=round(cc.amount*v_curr_parent_rate,sf_ars_0008(cc.parent_curr)); 
 --v8.4.1 add by kimberly start-- 
 elsif v_rate_type='3' then
 v_last_amt:=0;
 v_last_parent_amt:=0;
 v_last_year:=trunc(trunc(cc.month_date,'yyyy')-1,'mm');
 open c_last_year(v_last_year, cc.company_id, cc.curr, cc.parent_id, cc.parent_curr, cc.item_code);
 fetch c_last_year into v_last_amt, v_last_parent_amt;
 close c_last_year;
 v_parent_amount:=nvl(v_last_parent_amt,0) --去年
 +round((nvl(cc.amount,0)-nvl(v_last_amt,0))*v_curr_parent_rate,sf_ars_0008(cc.parent_curr)); --今年 
 --v8.4.1 add by kimberly end-- 
 end if; 
 update glg1050
 set curr_parent_rate=decode(v_rate_type,'3',to_number(null),v_curr_parent_rate), --v8.5.5 modify by kimberly--v_curr_parent_rate
 parent_amount=v_parent_amount
 where rowid=cc.rowid; 
 end loop;
 end if; 

 sp_glg_0029(v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr, :parameter.office_code, :parameter.user_code); --投資損益計算
 
--v8.5.4 add by kimberly start--
 delete glg1054
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and parent_id=v_company_id
 and parent_curr=v_curr
 and nvl(data_type,'N')='N' --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 and type between '1' and '4' ; 
--v8.5.4 add by kimberly end-- 

 forms_ddl('commit');
 if not form_success then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 s_alert('1','Compute Process Fail!!',v_temp);
 else
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 s_alert('1','Process Success!!',v_temp);
 end if; 

--v8.5.4 add by kimberly start-- 
--go_block('b1v_glg_1050');
--enter_query_proc; 
 set_block_property('b1v_glg_1050',default_where,'month_date='||
 chr(39)||to_char(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'yyyymmdd')||chr(39)||' and company_id='||
 chr(39)||:b1v_glg_1050.company_id||chr(39));
 go_block('b1v_glg_1050');
 execute_query;
 set_block_property('b1v_glg_1050',default_where,'');
--v8.5.4 add by kimberly end-- 

EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 v_errm:=sqlerrm;
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 s_alert(1,v_errm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

--v8.4.1 2008/4/7 Kimberly for FIN-Brent, 歷史匯率項目之Parent_Amount金額必須加上去年度的數字, 使借貸總合也為零
--v8.5.4 2008/5/15 Kimberly add some check control
--v8.5.5 2008/5/21 Kimberly for FIN-Brent, 歷史匯率項目之ExRate為空白
--v8.5.7 2008/5/28 Kimberly for FIN-Brent, 新增1.現時匯率的檢查 2.去年底關帳的檢查及歷史匯率自動轉入處理
--v11.10.1 2011/10/06 TingYu for add local_acct_no csv format,改成共用p_import_csvfile program units
--v12.2.1 2012/02/02 Kimberly for FIN-Ray, 2012年開始, 不可使用此button, 改用 [Local財報轉入] button 
declare
 v_temp varchar2 (2);
 v_errm varchar2(2000);
 v_fin_month date;
 v_company_id varchar2(20);
begin 

 if :cblk.path is null then
 s_alert('3','File path can`t be empty!!',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'busy'); 
 p_import_csvfile('1',:cblk.path,v_fin_month,v_company_id);
 
 forms_ddl ('commit');
 
 if not form_success then
 set_application_property (cursor_style, 'default');
 forms_ddl ('rollback');
 s_alert ('1', 'EDI transfer error!!', v_temp);
 else
 set_application_property (cursor_style, 'default');
 s_alert ('1', 'EDI transfer success!!', v_temp);
 end if; 

 set_block_property ('b1v_glg_1050',default_where,
 'month_date='||chr(39)||to_char (v_fin_month, 'yyyymmdd')||chr(39)|| 
 ' and company_id='|| chr(39)||v_company_id||chr(39)
 );
 
 go_block ('b1v_glg_1050');
 execute_query;
 set_block_property ('b1v_glg_1050', default_where, '');
 
EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 v_errm:=sqlerrm;
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 s_alert(1,v_errm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;
--v11.10.1 mark by TingYu start--
/*
 cursor c1_get_parent_id(c_company_id varchar2,c_curr varchar2, c_month date) is
 select parent_id, parent_curr, effect_date
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date;
 
 cursor c2_chk_close(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date) is
 select nvl(close_flag,'N') close_flag
 from glg1050
 where data_type='N'
 and trunc(month_date,'mm')=c_month
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and rownum=1;

--v8.5.7 add by kimberly start--
 cursor c3_chk_rate(c_month date, c_child_curr varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is
 select a.bs_rate, a.is_rate
 from glg1047 a
 where a.month_date=c_month
 and a.curr=c_child_curr 
 and a.parent_curr=c_parent_curr;
 
 cursor c4_chk_his_glg1052(c_month date, c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2) is
 select '1' from glg1052
 where month_date=add_months(trunc(c_month,'yyyy'),-1)
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and rownum=1;
--v8.5.7 add by kimberly end--
 
 cursor c_item(c_item_code varchar2) is
 select rate_type 
 from glg1046
 where item_code=c_item_code; 
 
 cursor c_rate(c_month date, c_child_curr varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2, c_item_code varchar2) is
 select decode(b.rate_type,'1',a.bs_rate,'2',a.is_rate,'3',a.bs_rate,0) child_parent_rate
 from glg1047 a,
 glg1046 b
 where a.month_date=c_month
 and a.curr=c_child_curr 
 and a.parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and b.item_code=c_item_code; 

 --v8.4.1 add by kimberly start--
 cursor c_last_year(c_last_year date, c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2, c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2, c_item_code varchar2) is
 select b.amount, b.parent_amount
 from glg1052 b
 where b.month_date=c_last_year
 and b.company_id=c_company_id
 and b.curr=c_curr
 and b.parent_id=c_parent_id
 and b.parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and b.item_code=c_item_code;
 --v8.4.1 add by kimberly end-- 
 
v_period_status varchar2(32); 
in_file text_io.file_type; 
out_file text_io.file_type;
v_record varchar2(2000);
v_field_value varchar2(200);
fopen_fail exception; 
pragma exception_init(fopen_fail,-302000); 
v_count number:=0;
v_type varchar2(14);
v_month varchar2(6);
v_fin_month date;
v_company_id varchar2(20);
v_curr varchar2(3);
v_item_code varchar2(10);
v_rate_type varchar2(1);
v_amount number;
v_remark varchar2(200);
v_parent_id varchar2(20);
v_parent_curr varchar2(3);
v_effect_date date; --v8.5.7 add by kimberly--
v_curr_parent_rate number;
v_parent_amount number;
v_glg1050_seq number;
v_chk varchar2(2);
v_chk_id varchar2(20);
v_chk_curr varchar2(3);
v_chk_effect_date date; --v8.5.7 add by kimberly--
v_data_exist varchar2(2); 
v_total number :=0; 
v_temp varchar2(2);
text_id varchar2(200);
v_record_no number :=6;
v_errchk varchar2(2);
v_error varchar2(2000);
v_errm varchar2(2000);
v_alert varchar2(2);
v_line_no number :=0;
v_last_pos number:=0;
--v8.4.1 add by kimberly start-- 
v_last_year date; 
v_last_amt number; 
v_last_parent_amt number; 
--v8.4.1 add by kimberly end--
--v8.5.7 add by kimberly start--
v_bs_rate number;
v_is_rate number;
--v8.5.7 add by kimberly end--
--==============================
-- Main process
--============================== 
begin 
 if :cblk.path is null then
 s_alert('3','File path can`t be empty!!',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 

 v_errchk :='N';
 v_count:=0;
 v_total:=0;
 
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'busy'); 
 in_file := text_io.fopen(:cblk.path,'R');
 
 forms_ddl('savepoint loan1');
 loop 
 BEGIN 
 text_io.get_line(in_file,v_record); 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN no_data_found THEN 
 exit;
 END ; 
 v_count:=v_count+1;
 --s_alert('1','v_count='||v_count,v_temp); 
 clear_message; 
 synchronize;
 
 if v_count=1 then 
 v_type:= ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,2))); 
 if v_type is null or v_type!='FIN_STATEMENT' then
 s_alert('3','EDI Layout error!! Type must be FIN_STATEMENT ',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 elsif v_count=2 then 
 v_month:=ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,2))); 
 --v_fin_month:=TO_DATE(ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,2))),'YYYY/MM/DD'); 
 v_fin_month:=TO_DATE(v_month||'01','YYYYMMDD'); 
 --s_alert('1','MONTH='||TO_CHAR(v_fin_month,'YYYYMMDD'),v_temp); 
 if v_fin_month is null then
 s_alert('3','No Month error!!',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 -- v_fin_month:=TO_DATE(v_month||'01','YYYYMMDD');
 elsif v_count=3 then
 v_company_id:=ltrim(rtrim( F_CSVSTR(v_record,2))); 
 --s_alert('1','Company_Id='||v_company_id,v_temp); 
 elsif v_count=4 then
 v_curr:= ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,2)));
 --s_alert('1','CURR='||v_CURR,v_temp); 
 
 open c1_get_parent_id(v_company_id, v_curr, v_fin_month);
 fetch c1_get_parent_id into v_parent_id, v_parent_curr, v_effect_date;
 close c1_get_parent_id;
 if v_parent_id is null or v_parent_curr is null then 
 s_alert('3','Company_Id or Curr or Effect_Date error!! Please check in ODGLS108 (code_type is CONSOL_COMPANY_RELATION)',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 --v8.5.7 add by kimberly start--
 v_bs_rate:=to_number(null);
 v_is_rate:=to_number(null);
 open c3_chk_rate(v_fin_month,v_curr,v_parent_curr);
 fetch c3_chk_rate into v_bs_rate, v_is_rate;
 close c3_chk_rate;
 if nvl(v_bs_rate,0)=0 or nvl(v_is_rate,0)=0 then
 s_alert('3',v_curr||' -> '||v_parent_curr||'...無現時匯率, 或現時匯率為零 !! Please check in ODGLS142 ',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_chk:=null; 
 open c4_chk_his_glg1052(v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr); --檢查去年12月歷史匯率是否已存在
 fetch c4_chk_his_glg1052 into v_chk;
 close c4_chk_his_glg1052;
 --s_alert('1', 'v_chk='||nvl(v_chk,'??')||',effect_date='||to_char(v_effect_date,'yyyymmdd'),v_temp);
 if v_chk is null and trunc(v_effect_date,'yyyy')!=trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy') then 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c2_chk_close(v_company_id, add_months(trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy'),-1)); --檢查去年12月是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c2_chk_close; 
 if v_chk != 'Y' then
 s_alert('3', to_char(add_months(trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy'),-1),'yyyymm')||' 未關帳, 歷史匯率資料無法轉入 !!',v_temp); 
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 sp_glg_0030(v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr, :parameter.office_code, :parameter.user_code); --歷史匯率年度結轉
 end if; 
 --v8.5.7 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 v_data_exist:=null;
 open c2_chk_close(v_company_id, v_fin_month); --檢查對象公司是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_data_exist;
 close c2_chk_close; 
 if v_data_exist = 'Y' then
 s_alert('3',v_company_id||' --> '||to_char(v_fin_month,'yyyymm')||'月已關帳, 財報資料不可重轉 !!',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c2_chk_close(v_parent_id, v_fin_month); --檢查母公司是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c2_chk_close; 
 if v_chk = 'Y' then
 s_alert('3',v_parent_id||' ...母公司已關帳, 財報資料不可重轉 !!',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 v_chk_id:=v_parent_id;
 v_chk_curr:=v_parent_curr;
 v_field_value:=null;
 for idx in 1..50 loop
 if v_chk_id = 'WHL' then
 exit;
 end if; 
 v_chk:=null;
 --s_alert('1','chk_id='||v_chk_id||',chk_curr='||v_chk_curr,v_temp); 
 open c1_get_parent_id(v_chk_id, v_chk_curr, v_fin_month); --取得上階母公司id
 fetch c1_get_parent_id into v_chk_id, v_chk_curr, v_chk_effect_date;
 close c1_get_parent_id;
 open c2_chk_close(v_chk_id, v_fin_month); --檢查上階母公司是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c2_chk_close;
 if v_chk = 'Y' then
 if v_field_value is null then
 v_field_value:=v_chk_id;
 else
 v_field_value:=v_field_value||', '||v_chk_id;
 end if; 
 end if; 
 end loop; 
 if v_field_value is not null then
 s_alert('3',v_field_value||' ...上階母公司已關帳, 財報資料不可重轉 !!',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 if v_data_exist is not null then 
 s_alert('2','財報資料已存在, 是否重轉 ?!',v_temp);
 if v_temp = 'Y' then
 delete glg1050
 where trunc(month_date,'mm')=v_fin_month
 and company_id=v_company_id;
 else 
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 end if;
 out_file := text_io.fopen('c:\apps\whoracle\tempf\'||v_company_id||'error'||'.txt','w'); 
 
 elsif v_count>6 then 
 v_record_no := v_record_no+1;
 v_line_no := v_line_no+1;
 
 -- v_item_code:=ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,1)));
 
 P_CSVSTR(v_record,1,v_last_pos,v_item_code); 
 --s_alert('1','ITEM_CODE('||V_RECORD_NO||')='||V_ITEM_CODE||',last_pos='||v_last_pos,v_temp); 
 if v_item_code is null then 
 exit;
 end if;
 
 v_rate_type:=null;
 open c_item(v_item_code);
 fetch c_item into v_rate_type;
 close c_item;
 
 if v_rate_type is null then 
 v_error :=v_record_no||'th record: Item_Code '||v_item_code||' is wrong, please check ODGLS141...';
 text_io.put(out_file,v_error);
 text_io.new_line(out_file);
 v_errchk :='Y'; 
 end if; 
 
 --v_amount:=to_number(replace(ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,2))),',')); 
 P_CSVSTR(v_record,2,v_last_pos,v_field_value); 
 v_amount:=to_number(replace(v_field_value,','));
 --s_alert('1','amount('||V_RECORD_NO||')='||V_amount||',last_pos='||v_last_pos||',data='||v_field_value,v_temp);
 v_total := v_total+v_amount; 
 
 P_CSVSTRB(v_record,3,v_last_pos+1,v_remark,v_last_pos);
 v_remark:=substrb(ltrim(rtrim(v_remark)),1,200); 
 --s_alert('1','REMARK('||V_RECORD_NO||')='||V_REMARK||',last_pos='||v_last_pos,v_temp); 

 v_curr_parent_rate:=0; 
 v_parent_amount:=0; 
 if v_errchk ='N' then
 if v_rate_type in ('1','2','3') then
 open c_rate(v_fin_month, v_curr, v_parent_curr, v_item_code);
 fetch c_rate into v_curr_parent_rate;
 close c_rate;
 end if;
 if v_rate_type in ('1','2') then
 v_parent_amount:=round(v_amount*v_curr_parent_rate,sf_ars_0008(v_parent_curr)); 
 --v8.4.1 add by kimberly start-- 
 elsif v_rate_type='3' then
 v_last_amt:=0;
 v_last_parent_amt:=0;
 v_last_year:=trunc(trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy')-1,'mm');
 open c_last_year(v_last_year, v_company_id, v_curr, v_parent_id, v_parent_curr, v_item_code);
 fetch c_last_year into v_last_amt, v_last_parent_amt;
 close c_last_year;
 v_parent_amount:=nvl(v_last_parent_amt,0) --去年
 +round((nvl(v_amount,0)-nvl(v_last_amt,0))*v_curr_parent_rate,sf_ars_0008(v_parent_curr)); --今年 
 --v8.4.1 add by kimberly end-- 
 end if;
 
 select glg1002_seq.nextval
 into v_glg1050_seq
 from dual;
 
 begin 
 insert into glg1050(glg1050_seq,
 data_type,
 month_date,
 company_id,
 curr,
 item_code,
 amount, 
 entry_date,
 entry_office,
 entry_user,
 entry_program,
 modify_date,
 modify_office,
 modify_program,
 modify_user, 
 remark,
 parent_id,
 parent_curr,
 curr_parent_rate,
 parent_amount
 )
 values(v_glg1050_seq,
 'N', --Normal
 v_fin_month,
 v_company_id,
 v_curr,
 v_item_code,
 v_amount, 
 sf_ars_0001,
 :parameter.office_code,
 :parameter.user_code,
 :form_id_display,
 sf_ars_0001,
 :parameter.office_code,
 :form_id_display,
 :parameter.user_code, 
 v_remark, 
 v_parent_id,
 v_parent_curr,
 decode(v_rate_type,'3',to_number(null),v_curr_parent_rate), --v8.5.5 modify by kimberly--v_curr_parent_rate,
 nvl(v_parent_amount,0) --parent_amount
 );
 exception
 when dup_val_on_index then
 v_error :=v_record_no||'th record: Item_Code '||v_item_code||' duplicate, please check EDI file...'; 
 text_io.put(out_file,v_error);
 text_io.new_line(out_file);
 v_errchk :='Y'; 
 end; 
 --s_alert('1','insert data ('||V_RECORD_NO||') is ok...',v_temp); 
 end if;
 
 end if;
 clear_message;

 end loop; 
 
 text_io.fclose(in_file); 
 
 --s_alert('1','v_total='||nvl(v_total,999999999),v_temp); 
 
 if nvl(v_total,999999999)!=0 then 
 v_error := 'DR/CR Amount not balance !!';
 text_io.put(out_file,v_error);
 text_io.new_line(out_file);
 v_errchk :='Y'; 
 end if;
 
 text_io.fclose(out_file); 
 
 if v_errchk='Y' then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 s_alert(3,'Please check of the message in c:\apps\whoracle\tempf\'||v_company_id||'error.txt',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 sp_glg_0029(v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr, :parameter.office_code, :parameter.user_code); --投資損益計算
 
 --v8.5.4 add by kimberly start--

declare
 v_temp varchar2 (2);
 v_errm varchar2(2000);
 v_fin_month date;
 v_company_id varchar2(20);
begin 
 
 if :cblk.path is null then
 s_alert('3','File path can`t be empty!!',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'busy'); 
 p_import_csvfile('2',:cblk.path,v_fin_month,v_company_id);
 
 forms_ddl ('commit');

 if not form_success then
 set_application_property (cursor_style, 'default');
 forms_ddl ('rollback');
 s_alert ('1', 'Local財報 transfer error!!', v_temp);
 else
 set_application_property (cursor_style, 'default');
 s_alert ('1', 'Local財報 transfer success!!', v_temp);
 end if;

 set_block_property ('b1v_glg_1050',default_where,
 'month_date='||chr(39)||to_char (v_fin_month, 'yyyymmdd')||chr(39)|| 
 ' and company_id='|| chr(39)||v_company_id||chr(39)
 );
 
 go_block ('b1v_glg_1050');
 execute_query;
 set_block_property ('b1v_glg_1050', default_where, ''); 
 
EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 v_errm:=sqlerrm;
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 s_alert(1,v_errm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

declare
--v8.4.3 2008/4/15 Kimberly for FIN-Brent, 新增 Total/本期淨利/資產總額/股東權益總額 4 欄位
--v8.4.4 2008/4/29 Kimberly for FIN-Brent, 200712, DAWIN的合併數錯誤? 新增GLG1054(合併財報檔)
--v8.5.1 2008/5/02 KImberly for FIN-Brent, 本期淨利/股東權益總額/股東權益-少數股權 等3欄位乘上(-1)以正數表達
--v8.5.3 2008/5/13 KImberly for FIN-Brent, 新增[合併財報調整]tab-page 輸入母子合併財報調整數, excel檔新增 調整數/最終合併數 2欄位
--v8.5.4 2008/5/15 Kimberly add some check control
--v8.6.1 2008/6/04 Kimberly for FIN-Brent, "財報"兩字改為"底稿" 
--v8.6.4 2008/06/24 Kimberly for FIN-Brent, 合併底稿資料的產生, 由[合併底稿列印]button改為關帳時, 避免user沒做列印動作
-- mark 此處產生工作底稿的處理
--v10.8.1 2010/8/31 Kimberly fix fot FIN-Erin, 新增item_code=1424, 之前月份之合併底稿有順序錯誤之情形
--v10.11.2 2010/11/18 David fix 新增會計科目轉Excel有錯誤之情形
--v11.11.1 2011/11/14 TingYu add ODGLS506-稅後淨利與ODGLS563-歸屬母公司股東比較
--v11.12.1 2011/12/14 Sharon Add 16-母子公司間資訊整合- 程式修正

 v_ifrs_flag varchar2(1):='N';--v11.12.1 add by Sharon
 v_ifrs_first varchar2(2); --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 v_ifrs_start_date date; --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 v_data_type varchar2(1); --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 
 cursor c_chk_close(c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2) is
 select nvl(close_flag,'N') close_flag
 from glg1050
 where month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and data_type='N'
 and rownum=1; 
 
 cursor c2_chk_close(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date) is
 select nvl(close_flag,'N') close_flag, curr
 from glg1050
 where month_date=c_month
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and data_type='N' 
 and rownum=1;
 
 cursor c1_get_parent_id (c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2) is
 select parent_id, parent_curr
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between effect_date and expire_date
 ; 

 cursor c2_get_child_id (c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is
 select company_id child_id,
 curr child_curr
 from v_glg_1046
 where parent_id=c_parent_id
 and parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between effect_date and expire_date
 order by company_id ;
 
 cursor c_child_exist (c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is
 select '*'
 from v_glg_1046
 where parent_id=c_parent_id
 and parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between effect_date and expire_date
 ; 
 
 cursor c3_self (c_company_id varchar2) is 
 select bb.item_code, aa.curr, aa.parent_curr, aa.rate, aa.amount, aa.parent_amount 
 from ( select item_code, curr, parent_curr, curr_parent_rate rate, sum(amount) amount, sum(parent_amount) parent_amount 
 from glg1050 
 where month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and company_id=c_company_id --自己單一財報
 and data_type in ('N','L') --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 group by item_code, curr, parent_curr, curr_parent_rate
 ) aa, 
 --v10.8.1 modify by kimberly start-- 
 --glg1046 bb
 ( select item_code from glg1046 a
 WHERE (NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' fROM v_glg_1046 B WHERE B.ADJ_ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE) 
 OR EXISTS (SELECT '1' fROM v_glg_1046 B 
 WHERE B.ADJ_ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE 
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between effect_date and expire_date
 ) 
 )
 ) bb
 --v10.8.1 modify by kimberly end-- 
 where aa.item_code(+)=bb.item_code
 order by bb.item_code ; 

 cursor c4_combine (c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is 
 select bb.item_code, c_curr curr, c_parent_curr parent_curr,
 decode(bb.rate_type,'1',cc.bs_rate,'2',cc.is_rate,to_number(null)) rate,
 aa.amount, 
 round(decode(bb.rate_type,'1',aa.amount*cc.bs_rate
 ,'2',aa.amount*cc.is_rate
 ,sf_glg_1027(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,c_company_id,c_curr,c_parent_curr,aa.item_code,aa.amount) 
 ),sf_ars_0008(c_parent_curr)) parent_amount 
 from (select item_code, sum(parent_amount) amount
 from glg1054
 where month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and parent_id=c_company_id
 and parent_curr=c_curr
 and ((nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='N' and nvl(source_type,'FIN_ADJ') not like 'IFRS%') or (nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='Y')) --v11.12.1 Add by Sharon 
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 group by item_code 
 ) aa, glg1047 cc,
 --v10.8.1 modify by kimberly start-- 
 --glg1046 bb
 ( select item_code, rate_type from glg1046 a
 WHERE (NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' fROM v_glg_1046 B WHERE B.ADJ_ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE) 
 OR EXISTS (SELECT '1' fROM v_glg_1046 B 
 WHERE B.ADJ_ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE 
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between effect_date and expire_date
 ) 
 )
 ) bb
 --v10.8.1 modify by kimberly end-- 
 where aa.item_code(+)=bb.item_code
 and cc.month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and cc.curr=c_curr
 and cc.parent_curr=c_parent_curr 
 order by bb.item_code
 ; 
 
 cursor c_get_adj_child (c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2) is 
 select distinct child_id, child_curr
 from glg1053 
 where month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and parent_id=c_company_id --與子公司的沖銷
 and parent_curr=c_curr
 and ((nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='N' and nvl(source_type,'FIN_ADJ') not like 'IFRS%') or (nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='Y')) --v11.12.1 Add by Sharon
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 order by child_id
 ;
 
 cursor c5_adj (c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2,
 c_child_id varchar2, c_child_curr varchar2) is 
 select bb.item_code, aa.amount
 from ( select adj_item_code item_code, sum(adj_amount) amount
 from glg1053 
 where month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and parent_id=c_company_id --與子公司的沖銷
 and parent_curr=c_curr
 and child_id=c_child_id
 and child_curr=c_child_curr
 and ((nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='N' and nvl(source_type,'FIN_ADJ') not like 'IFRS%') or (nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='Y')) --v11.12.1 Add by Sharon 
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 group by adj_item_code 
 ) aa, 
 --v10.8.1 modify by kimberly start-- 
 --glg1046 bb
 ( select item_code from glg1046 a
 WHERE (NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' fROM v_glg_1046 B WHERE B.ADJ_ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE) 
 OR EXISTS (SELECT '1' fROM v_glg_1046 B 
 WHERE B.ADJ_ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE 
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between effect_date and expire_date
 ) 
 )
 ) bb
 --v10.8.1 modify by kimberly end-- 
 where aa.item_code(+)=bb.item_code
 order by bb.item_code ;
 
 cursor c_item is
 select item_code, description
 from glg1046 a
 --v10.8.1 add by kimberly start-- 
 WHERE (NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' fROM v_glg_1046 B WHERE B.ADJ_ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE) 
 OR EXISTS (SELECT '1' fROM v_glg_1046 B 
 WHERE B.ADJ_ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE 
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between effect_date and expire_date
 ) 
 )
 --v10.8.1 add by kimberly end-- 
 order by item_code; 
 
--v8.4.4 add by kimberly start-- 
 cursor c_detail(c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is 
 select aa.type, aa.child_id, aa.child_curr, aa.parent_curr, bb.item_code,
 --aa.child_amount, aa.child_parent_rate, aa.parent_amount --v10.9.1 modify by kimberly--
 sum(aa.child_amount) child_amount, max(aa.child_parent_rate) child_parent_rate, sum(aa.parent_amount) parent_amount --v10.9.1 modify by kimberly-- 
 from glg1054 aa, 
 --v10.8.1 modify by kimberly start-- 
 --glg1046 bb
 ( select item_code from glg1046 a
 WHERE (NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' fROM v_glg_1046 B WHERE B.ADJ_ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE) 
 OR EXISTS (SELECT '1' fROM v_glg_1046 B 
 WHERE B.ADJ_ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE 
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between effect_date and expire_date
 ) 
 )
 ) bb
 --v10.8.1 modify by kimberly end-- 
 where aa.month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and aa.parent_id=c_parent_id
 and aa.parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and aa.type between '1' and '4' --v8.5.3 add by kimberly--
 and aa.item_code(+)=bb.item_code
 and ((nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='N' and nvl(aa.source_type,'FIN_ADJ') not like 'IFRS%') or (nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='Y')) --v11.12.1 Add by Sharon 
 and nvl(aa.data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 group by aa.type, aa.child_id, aa.child_curr, aa.parent_curr, bb.item_code --v10.9.1 add by kimberly-- 
 order by aa.type, aa.child_id, bb.item_code ;

 cursor c_total(c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2, c_type varchar2) is 
 select bb.item_code, aa.parent_amount
 from ( select item_code, sum(parent_amount) parent_amount
 from glg1054 
 where month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and parent_id=c_parent_id
 and parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and ((c_type='5' and type between '1' and '4') or
 (c_type='6' and type=c_type) or
 (c_type='9' and type between '1' and '6'))
 and ((nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='N' and nvl(source_type,'FIN_ADJ') not like 'IFRS%') or (nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='Y')) --v11.12.1 Add by Sharon 
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 group by item_code 
 ) aa,
 --v10.8.1 modify by kimberly start-- 
 --glg1046 bb
 ( select item_code from glg1046 a
 WHERE (NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' fROM v_glg_1046 B WHERE B.ADJ_ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE) 
 OR EXISTS (SELECT '1' fROM v_glg_1046 B 
 WHERE B.ADJ_ITEM_CODE=A.ITEM_CODE 
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between effect_date and expire_date
 ) 
 )
 ) bb
 --v10.8.1 modify by kimberly end-- 
 where aa.item_code(+)=bb.item_code
 order by bb.item_code ;
--v8.4.4 add by kimberly end--

--v8.5.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 cursor c_chk_glg1054(c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2, c_item_code varchar2) is
 select '1' 
 from glg1054
 where month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and parent_id=c_parent_id
 and parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and type='6' --合併調整數 
 and item_code=c_item_code
 and ((nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='N' and nvl(source_type,'FIN_ADJ') not like 'IFRS%') or (nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='Y')) --v11.12.1 Add by Sharon 
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 ;
 
--v11.11.1 add by TingYu start--
 --reference from ODGLS506
 cursor c_506 is
 select nvl(round(sum(decode(sign(trunc(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'mm')-b.voucher_date),1,0,nvl(b.debit_amt,0)-nvl(b.credit_amt,0)))*-1),0),
 nvl(round(sum(decode(sign(trunc(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'yyyy')-b.voucher_date),1,0,nvl(b.debit_amt,0)-nvl(b.credit_amt,0)))*-1),0)
 from glg1003 a,
 (select voucher_date,
 sum(debit_amt) debit_amt,
 sum(credit_amt) credit_amt, 
 acct_no
 from glg2002
 where voucher_date >= trunc(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'YYYY') 
 and voucher_date <= last_day(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date)
 and voucher_no >= to_char(trunc(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'YYYY'),'yyyymmdd')
 and voucher_no <= to_char(last_day(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date),'yyyymmdd')||'9999'
 and voucher_status = 'USE'
 and voucher_type !='GLCLOSE'
 group by voucher_date,acct_no
 ) b 
 where a.acct_type between '4' and '9zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz'
 and a.acct_no= b.acct_no;
 
 --reference from ODGLS563 
 cursor c_563(c_parent_id varchar2,c_curr varchar2) is
 select nvl(sum(decode(to_char(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'mm'),'01',decode(trunc(b.month_date,'mm'),trunc(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'mm'), amount*-1, 0)
 ,decode(months_between(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,b.month_date), 0, amount*-1, 1, amount, 0))),0) month_amount, 
 nvl(sum(decode(trunc(b.month_date,'mm'),trunc(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'mm'), amount*-1, 0)),0) acquire_amount 
 from (select c.month_date,
 c.amount*decode(c_curr,'LOCAL',1,decode(a.rate_type,'1',b.bs_rate,'2',b.is_rate,'3',b.bs_rate,0)) amount 
 from glg1046 a, glg1047 b,
 (select parent_curr, item_code, month_date,
 sum(parent_amount) amount
 from glg1054 
 where (month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date 
 or month_date=add_months(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,-1)
 or month_date=add_months(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,-2) 
 or month_date=add_months(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,-12))
 and parent_id in (SELECT a.company_id FROM v_glg_1046 a
 where a.is_consol_rpt='Y'
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between a.effect_date and a.expire_date
 and a.company_id=c_parent_id
 )
 and type between '1' and '6'
 and item_code between '4' and '8zzzzzzzzz'
 and ((nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='N' and nvl(source_type,'FIN_ADJ') not like 'IFRS%') or (nvl(v_ifrs_flag,'N')='Y')) --v11.12.1 Add by Sharon 
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 group by parent_curr, item_code, month_date
 ) c 
 where a.item_code=c.item_code
 and ((c.month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date and b.month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date) or
 (c.month_date=add_months(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,-1) and b.month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date) or
 (c.month_date=add_months(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,-2) and b.month_date=add_months(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,-1)) or
 (c.month_date=add_months(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,-12) and b.month_date=c.month_date) 
 )
 and b.curr=c.parent_curr
 and b.parent_curr='TWD' 
 ) b;
--v11.11.1 add by TingYu end-- 
--v8.5.3 add by kimberly end--
 Excel_app OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 Workbooks OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 Workbook OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 Worksheet OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 Cell OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 Args OLE2.LIST_TYPE;
 Row_cnt NUMBER;
 Col_cnt NUMBER;
 
--v10.11.2 add by david start-- 
 TYPE item_code_var IS VARRAY (1000) OF glg1046.item_code%TYPE; 
 a_item_code item_code_var := item_code_var(); 
--v10.11.2 add by david end--
 
--v8.4.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 v_tot_amt NUMBER:=0; 
 v_tot_parent_amt NUMBER:=0;
 v_profit_amt NUMBER:=0;
 v_profit_parent_amt NUMBER:=0;
 v_asset_amt NUMBER:=0;
 v_asset_parent_amt NUMBER:=0;
 v_company_amt NUMBER:=0;
 v_company_parent_amt NUMBER:=0;
 v_3121_amt NUMBER:=0; 
--v8.4.3 add by kimberly end-- 

 v_chk varchar2(2);
 v_child_exist varchar2(2);
 v_fin_month date;
 v_company_id varchar2(20);
 v_curr varchar2(3);
 v_child_id varchar2(20);
 v_child_curr varchar2(3);
 v_temp varchar2(2);
 v_field_value varchar2(200);
 sw_first varchar2(1):='Y';
 keep_type varchar2(1);
 keep_child_id varchar2(20); 
 v_506_month_amt number; --v11.11.1 add by TingYu start--
 v_506_acquire_amt number; --
 v_563_month_amt number; --
 v_563_acquire_amt number; --
 v_diff_desc varchar2(20); --v11.11.1 add by TingYu end--

--==============================
-- Header process
--============================== 
procedure header_proc
 ( c_type varchar2, c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2,
 c_child_id varchar2, c_child_curr varchar2)
is
begin
 --s_alert('1','type='||c_type||',id='||c_company_id||',curr='||c_curr||',child_id='||c_child_id||',child_curr='||c_child_curr,v_temp);
 if c_type='1' then --子公司單一 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , c_child_id);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, to_char(null));
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, to_char(null));
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , c_child_curr); 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, '匯率'); 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, c_curr);
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1; 
 elsif c_type='2' then --子孫合併 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , c_child_id||'合併');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, to_char(null));
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, to_char(null));
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , c_child_curr); 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, '匯率'); 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, c_curr);
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1; 
 elsif c_type='3' then --自己
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, c_company_id); 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, c_curr); 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1; 
 elsif c_type='4' then --沖銷 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, '與 '||c_child_id||' 之沖銷'); 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, c_curr); 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
 elsif c_type='5' then --母子合併 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, c_company_id||' 母子合併數');
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, c_curr); 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
--v8.5.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 elsif c_type='6' then --母子合併調整數 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, c_company_id||' 母子合併調整數');
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, c_curr); 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
 elsif c_type='9' then --最終母子合併 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, c_company_id||' 最終合併數');
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, c_curr); 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
--v8.5.3 add by kimberly end-- 
 end if; 
 keep_type:= c_type;
 keep_child_id:=c_child_id;
 
end;
--==============================
-- Detail process
--============================== 
procedure detail_proc (c_type varchar2, c_item_code varchar2, c_amount number, c_rate number, c_parent_amount number)
is
begin

 --v10.11.2 add by david start-- 
 while a_item_code(Row_cnt-2) <> c_item_code loop 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
 end loop;
 --v10.11.2 add by david end-- 

 if c_type in ('1','2') then --子公司單一/子孫合併
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , c_amount);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, c_rate);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, c_parent_amount);
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
 elsif c_type between '3' and '9' then --v8.5.3 modify by kimberly--in ('3','4','9') then --自己/沖銷/母子合併/調整/最終合併
 if nvl(c_parent_amount,0)!=0 then
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, c_parent_amount);
 end if; 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt + 1;
 end if;
 
--v8.4.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 v_tot_amt:=v_tot_amt+nvl(c_amount,0);
 v_tot_parent_amt:=v_tot_parent_amt+nvl(c_parent_amount,0); 
 if c_item_code between '4' and '8zzzzzzzzz' then
 v_profit_amt:=v_profit_amt+nvl(c_amount,0);
 v_profit_parent_amt:=v_profit_parent_amt+nvl(c_parent_amount,0);
 end if;
 if substr(c_item_code,1,1) = '1' then
 v_asset_amt:=v_asset_amt+nvl(c_amount,0);
 v_asset_parent_amt:=v_asset_parent_amt+nvl(c_parent_amount,0);
 end if;
 if c_item_code between '3' and '8zzzzzzzzz' then
 v_company_amt:=v_company_amt+nvl(c_amount,0);
 v_company_parent_amt:=v_company_parent_amt+nvl(c_parent_amount,0);
 end if;
 if c_type='9' and c_item_code = '3121' then 
 v_3121_amt:=nvl(c_parent_amount,0);
 end if; 
--v8.4.3 add by kimberly end-- 
 
end;
--==============================
-- Footer process
--============================== 
procedure footer_proc (c_type varchar2)
is
begin
 if c_type in ('1', '2') then --子公司單一/子孫合併
 --v8.4.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, v_tot_amt);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, v_tot_parent_amt); 
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+2;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, v_profit_amt*-1); --v8.5.1 modify by kimberly--
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, v_profit_parent_amt*-1); --v8.5.1 modify by kimberly-- 
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+2;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, v_asset_amt);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, v_asset_parent_amt); 
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+2;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, v_company_amt*-1); --v8.5.1 modify by kimberly--
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, v_company_parent_amt*-1); --v8.5.1 modify by kimberly-- 
 --v8.4.3 add by kimberly end-- 
 Row_cnt := 1;
 Col_cnt := Col_cnt + 3; 
 elsif c_type between '3' and '9' then --v8.5.3 modify by kimberly--in ('3','4','9') then --自己/沖銷/母子合併/調整/最終合併
 --v8.4.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, v_tot_parent_amt);
 if c_type in ('3','5','9') then --v8.5.3 modify by kimberly--in ('3','9') then
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+2;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, v_profit_parent_amt*-1); --v8.5.1 modify by kimberly--
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+2;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, v_asset_parent_amt);
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+2;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, v_company_parent_amt*-1); --v8.5.1 modify by kimberly--
 end if; 
 --v8.4.3 add by kimberly end--
 if c_type='9' then
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+2;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, (v_company_parent_amt-v_3121_amt)*-1); --v8.5.1 modify by kimberly--
 end if; 
 Row_cnt := 1;
 Col_cnt := Col_cnt + 1; 
 end if; 
 
--v8.4.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 v_tot_amt :=0;
 v_tot_parent_amt :=0;
 v_profit_amt :=0;
 v_profit_parent_amt:=0;
 v_asset_amt :=0;
 v_asset_parent_amt :=0;
 v_company_amt :=0;
 v_company_parent_amt:=0;
--v8.4.3 add by kimberly end-- 
 

end;
--==============================
-- Main process
--============================== 
begin
 if :b1v_glg_1050.month_date is null or :b1v_glg_1050.company_id is null then
 s_alert('3','Please input Month_Date and Company_Id!!',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_fin_month:=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date;
 v_company_id:=:b1v_glg_1050.company_id;

 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start--
 select trunc(to_date(pg_glg_0001.f_code_value('IFRS','IFRS_START_DATE','CODE_VALUE1')),'mm')
 into v_ifrs_start_date
 from dual;
 
 v_data_type:='N'; 
 if :b1v_glg_1050.company_id = 'WHL' and
 :b1v_glg_1050.month_date = v_ifrs_start_date then
 --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly start-- 
 -- s_alert('2','欲列印 "首次適用報表", 請改用 ODGLS584/ODGLS585!! 是否繼續執行?',v_temp);
 -- if v_temp!='Y' then 
 -- raise form_trigger_failure; 
 -- end if; 
 s_alert('2','只列印 "首次適用報表" ?',v_temp);
 if v_temp = 'Y' then 
 v_curr:= 'TWD';
 v_data_type:='F'; 
 end if; 
 --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly end-- 
 end if; 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 s_alert('2','是否包含 "IFRS 調整分錄" ?!(Yes:含/No:不含)',v_ifrs_flag); 
 
if v_data_type = 'N' then --v12.2.7 add by kimberly-- 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c2_chk_close(v_company_id, v_fin_month); --檢查對象公司是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk, v_curr;
 close c2_chk_close; 
 if v_chk is null then
 s_alert('3','無財報EDI資料!!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if; 
 if v_chk = 'N' then
 s_alert('3','未關帳, 不可列印!!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_field_value:=null;
 for cc in c2_get_child_id (v_company_id, v_curr) loop 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c_chk_close(cc.child_id, cc.child_curr);
 fetch c_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c_chk_close;
 if nvl(v_chk,'N') != 'Y' then
 if v_field_value is null then
 v_field_value:= cc.child_id;
 else 
 v_field_value:= v_field_value||', '||cc.child_id;
 end if;
 end if; 
 end loop;
 if v_field_value is not null then
 s_alert('3',v_field_value||' ...子孫公司財報資料未轉入或未關帳, 不可列印!!',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_child_exist:=null;
 open c_child_exist (v_company_id, v_curr);
 fetch c_child_exist into v_child_exist;
 close c_child_exist;
 
--v11.11.1 add by TingYu start-- 
 if v_company_id='WHL' then 
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'busy'); 
 open c_506;
 fetch c_506 into v_506_month_amt,v_506_acquire_amt;
 if c_506 %notfound then
 v_506_month_amt :=0;
 v_506_acquire_amt :=0;
 end if;
 close c_506; 
 
 open c_563(v_company_id,v_curr);
 fetch c_563 into v_563_month_amt,v_563_acquire_amt;
 if c_563 %notfound then
 v_563_month_amt :=0;
 v_563_acquire_amt :=0;
 end if;
 close c_563; 
 end if;
--v11.11.1 add by TingYu end--
end if; --v12.2.7 add by kimberly-- 

--財報合併檔glg1054, 改在 close_flag 打勾時產出--v8.6.4 marked by kimberly--
 
-----------產生 Excel 檔---------------------------------
 -- Create a OLE object (MS-Excel object)
 Excel_app := OLE2.CREATE_OBJ('Excel.Application');

 -- Set OLE object visible
 OLE2.SET_PROPERTY(Excel_app, 'Visible' , 'TRUE');

 -- Get the workbooks object
 Workbooks := OLE2.GET_OBJ_PROPERTY(Excel_app, 'Workbooks');

 -- Add a new workbook
 Workbook := OLE2.INVOKE_OBJ(Workbooks, 'Add');

 -- Get the activesheet object
 Worksheet := OLE2.GET_OBJ_PROPERTY(Workbook, 'ActiveSheet'); 
 
 -- 列印月份,對象Company_id
 --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly start-- 
 --OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, 1, 2, to_char(v_fin_month,'yyyy')||' 年 '||to_char(v_fin_month,'mm')||' 月 '||v_company_id||' 合併底稿'); 
 v_field_value:=to_char(v_fin_month,'yyyy')||' 年 '||to_char(v_fin_month,'mm')||' 月 '||v_company_id||' 合併底稿';
 if v_data_type='F' then
 v_field_value:=v_field_value||' (首次適用)';
 end if; 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, 1, 2, v_field_value); 
 --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly end-- 
 
 -- 列印項目名稱
 Row_cnt := 3;
 Col_cnt := 1; 
 for c1r in c_item loop
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , c1r.item_code); 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, c1r.description);
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+1; 
 --v10.11.2 add by david start-- 
 a_item_code.EXTEND;
 a_item_code (a_item_code.LAST) := c1r.item_code; 
 --v10.11.2 add by david end-- 
 end loop; 

--v8.4.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, 'Total'); 
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+2;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, '本期淨利');
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+2;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, '資產總額');
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+2;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, '股東權益總額');
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+2;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, '股東權益 - 少數股權');
--v8.4.3 add by kimberly end--

if v_data_type = 'N' then --v12.2.7 add by kimberly-- 
--v11.11.1 add by TingYu start--
 if v_company_id='WHL' then
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+2;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, '經核GLS506損益比較表-稅後淨利(當月數):'||to_char(v_506_month_amt,'999,999,999,990')
 ||'，稅後淨利(當年累計數):'||to_char(v_506_acquire_amt,'999,999,999,990'));
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, chr(1)||'與合併總損益-歸屬母公司股東 (當月數):'||to_char(v_563_month_amt,'999,999,999,990')
 ||'，(當年累計數):'||to_char(v_563_acquire_amt,'999,999,999,990'));
 if nvl(v_506_month_amt,0)=nvl(v_563_month_amt,0) and nvl(v_506_acquire_amt,0)=nvl(v_563_acquire_amt,0) then
 v_diff_desc := '無差異';
 else
 v_diff_desc := '有差異';
 end if;
 Row_cnt:=Row_cnt+1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, v_diff_desc);
 end if;
--v11.11.1 add by TingYu end--
end if; --v12.2.7 add by kimberly-- 

 Row_cnt := 1;
 Col_cnt := 3;
 
--v8.4.4 add by kimberly start-- 
 for cc in c_detail(v_company_id, v_curr) loop
 if sw_first = 'Y' then
 sw_first:= 'N'; 
 header_proc (cc.type, v_company_id, v_curr, cc.child_id, cc.child_curr); 
 end if;
 if cc.type != keep_type or
 cc.child_id != keep_child_id then
 footer_proc(keep_type);
 header_proc (cc.type, v_company_id, v_curr, cc.child_id, cc.child_curr); 
 end if; 
 
 detail_proc (cc.type, cc.item_code, cc.child_amount, cc.child_parent_rate, cc.parent_amount); 
 
 end loop; 
 if sw_first = 'N' then
 footer_proc(keep_type);
 end if;
 
 if v_child_exist is not null or v_data_type='F' then --有子公司 --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly--
 header_proc ('5', v_company_id, v_curr, null, null); 
 for cc in c_total(v_company_id, v_curr, '5') loop
 detail_proc ('5', cc.item_code, to_number(null), to_number(null), cc.parent_amount); 
 end loop;
 footer_proc('5');
 --v8.5.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 header_proc ('6', v_company_id, v_curr, null, null); 
 for cc in c_total(v_company_id, v_curr, '6') loop
 detail_proc ('6', cc.item_code, to_number(null), to_number(null), cc.parent_amount); 
 end loop;
 footer_proc('6');
 --v8.5.3 add by kimberly end-- 
 header_proc ('9', v_company_id, v_curr, null, null); 
 for cc in c_total(v_company_id, v_curr, '9') loop
 detail_proc ('9', cc.item_code, to_number(null), to_number(null), cc.parent_amount); 
 end loop;
 footer_proc('9');
 end if; 
--v8.4.4 add by kimberly end-- 

 -- Release resources
 OLE2.RELEASE_OBJ(Worksheet);
 OLE2.RELEASE_OBJ(Workbook);
 OLE2.RELEASE_OBJ(Workbooks);
 OLE2.RELEASE_OBJ(Excel_app);
 
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default'); 

 --v8.5.4 add by kimberly start-- 
 set_block_property('b1v_glg_1050',default_where,'month_date='||
 chr(39)||to_char(v_fin_month,'yyyymmdd')||chr(39)||' and company_id='||
 chr(39)||v_company_id||chr(39));
 go_block('b1v_glg_1050');
 execute_query;
 set_block_property('b1v_glg_1050',default_where,'');
 --v8.5.4 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 --v14.01.1 add by Keynes start-- 
 select was5200_seq.nextval into :parameter.p_was5200_seq from dual; 
 
 insert into was5200(was5200_seq, system_code, 
 entry_user, entry_office, entry_program, entry_date,
 log_delete_date, action,
 p_where
 )
 values (:parameter.p_was5200_seq, substr(:form_id_display,3,3),
 :parameter.user_code, :parameter.office_code, :form_id_display, sf_ars_0001,
 add_months(trunc(sf_ars_0001),6), 'QUERY',
 '合併底稿列印:select * from glg1050,v_glg_1046,glg1054,glg1047,glg1053,glg1054,glg1003,glg2002,glg1046,glg1047 '|| 
 ' where month_date =' ||chr(39)||:b1v_glg_1050.month_date ||chr(39)||
 ' company_id =' ||chr(39)||:b1v_glg_1050.company_id ||chr(39)|| 
 ' curr =' ||chr(39)||:b1v_glg_1050.curr ||chr(39)
 ); 
 forms_ddl('commit'); 
 --v14.01.1 add by Keynes end -- 
 

EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default'); 
 s_alert(1,sqlerrm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
END;

declare
--v8.5.4 2008/5/15 Kimberly add some check control 
--v10.9.1 2010/09/13 Kimberly for IFRS project, 新增可轉入IFRS_ADJ沖銷檔-子孫公司間沖銷 (GLG1053/GLG1054 新增SOURCE_TYPE欄位)
--v10.10.1 2010/10/07 Kimberly for FIN-Alina, 新增可轉入IFRS_WHL沖銷檔-母子公司間沖銷
--v11.12.1 2011/12/28 Sharon , 新增沖銷可轉入紀錄local acct_no 和轉換item_code
--v12.1.1 2012/1/12 TingYu for 刪除原先允許轉入的沖銷edi type 'IFRS_WHL',改成 'IFRS_WHL_AJE' 與 'IFRS_WHL_RJE' 
--v12.1.2 2012/1/13 Kimberly add check rule for IFRS 沖銷檔
--v12.2.1 2012/2/02 Kimberly for FIN-Ray, 2012年開始, 只可以用Local科目轉入
--v12.2.4 2012/02/13 Kimberly for 'IFRS_ADJ' 拆分- IFRS_SUB_AJE 與 IFRS_SUB_RJE
--v12.3.2 2012/03/14 Kimberly for 新增 INVEST_ID (投資公司代碼) for A440/A441 轉換為 14xx 長期股權投資科目 

v_data_type varchar2(10); --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--

 cursor c1_get_parent_id(c_company_id varchar2,c_curr varchar2, c_month date) is
 select parent_id, parent_curr,
 is_consol_rpt is_consol_rpt --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date; 
 
 cursor c2_chk_close(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date) is
 select nvl(close_flag,'N') close_flag
 from glg1050
 where data_type='N'
 and trunc(month_date,'mm')=c_month
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and rownum=1; 
 
 cursor c3_daj_exist(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date, c_source_type varchar2) is --v12.1.2 modify by kimberly--
 select distinct child_id
 from glg1053
 where month_date=c_month
 and parent_id=c_company_id
 and adj_type not in ('1','2') 
 and nvl(source_type,'FIN_ADJ')=nvl(c_source_type,'FIN_ADJ') --v12.1.2 add by kimberly--
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 ; 
 
 cursor c3(c_item_code varchar2) is
 select '*' 
 from glg1046
 where item_code=c_item_code; 
 
 cursor c4(c_parent_id varchar2,c_parent_curr varchar2, c_month date, c_child_id varchar2) is
 select curr child_curr
 from v_glg_1046
 where parent_id=c_parent_id
 and parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date
 and company_id=c_child_id ; 
 
 cursor c_rate(c_month date, c_child_curr varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2, c_item_code varchar2) is
 select decode(b.rate_type,'1',a.bs_rate,'2',a.is_rate,0) child_parent_rate
 from glg1047 a,
 glg1046 b
 where a.month_date=c_month
 and a.curr=c_child_curr 
 and a.parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and b.item_code=c_item_code; 

 cursor c_get_adj_curr(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date) is
 select curr child_curr
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id 
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date; 

v_period_status varchar2(32); 
in_file text_io.file_type; 
out_file text_io.file_type;
v_record varchar2(2000);
v_field_value varchar2(2000);
fopen_fail exception; 
pragma exception_init(fopen_fail,-302000);

v_seq_no number:=0;
