--==============================
-- Main process
--============================== 
begin

 if :cblk.path is null then
 s_alert('3','File path can`t be empty!!',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 /*--v12.2.1 marked by kimberly start-- 
 v_al:=show_alert('ALERT_ACCT');
 if chr(v_al)='Y' then
 v_merger:='Y';
 else
 v_merger:='N';
 end if; */--v12.2.1 marked by kimberly end-- 
 
 v_errchk :='N';
 v_count:=0;
 v_total:=0;
 
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'busy'); 
 in_file := text_io.fopen(:cblk.path,'R');
 
 forms_ddl('savepoint loan1');
 loop 
 BEGIN 
 text_io.get_line(in_file,v_record); 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN no_data_found THEN 
 exit;
 END ; 
 v_count:=v_count+1;
 
 clear_message; 
 synchronize;
 
 if v_count=1 then 
 v_type:= ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,2))); 
 --if v_type is null or v_type not in ('FIN_ADJ','IFRS_ADJ','IFRS_WHL') then --v_type!='FIN_ADJ' then --v12.1.1 modify by TingYu start --v10.10.1 modify by kimberly-- 
 -- s_alert('3','EDI Layout error!! Type must be "FIN_ADJ" or "IFRS_ADJ" or "IFRS_WHL" ',v_temp); -- --v10.10.1 modify by kimberly--
 --if v_type is null or v_type not in ('FIN_ADJ','IFRS_ADJ','IFRS_WHL_AJE','IFRS_WHL_RJE') then --
 -- s_alert('3','EDI Layout error!! Type must be "FIN_ADJ" or "IFRS_ADJ" or "IFRS_WHL_AJE" or "IFRS_WHL_RJE" ',v_temp); --v12.1.1 modify by TingYu end
 if v_type is null or v_type not in ('FIN_ADJ','IFRS_SUB_AJE','IFRS_SUB_RJE','IFRS_WHL_AJE','IFRS_WHL_RJE') then --v12.2.4 modify by kimberly--
 s_alert('3','EDI Layout error!! Type must be "FIN_ADJ" or "IFRS_SUB_AJE" or "IFRS_SUB_RJE" or "IFRS_WHL_AJE" or "IFRS_WHL_RJE" ',v_temp); --v12.2.4 modify by kimberly--
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 elsif v_count=2 then 
 v_month:=ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,2))); 
 --v_fin_month:=TO_DATE(ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,2))),'YYYY/MM/DD'); 
 v_fin_month:=TO_DATE(v_month||'01','YYYYMMDD'); 
 --s_alert('1','MONTH='||TO_CHAR(v_fin_month,'YYYYMMDD'),v_temp); 
 if v_fin_month is null then
 s_alert('3','No Month error!!',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 --v12.2.1 add by kimberly start-- 
 if v_fin_month >= sf_gls_0004('2011FIN016') then
 v_merger:='N'; 
 else
 v_merger:='Y';
 end if;
 --v12.2.1 add by kimberly end-- 
 elsif v_count=3 then
 v_company_id:=ltrim(rtrim( F_CSVSTR(v_record,2))); 
 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start--首次適用 
 if v_company_id = 'WHL' then
 v_data_type:= ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,3))); 
 if nvl(v_data_type,'N') = 'FIRST' then
 v_data_type:='F';
 v_merger:='Y';
 else
 v_data_type:='N';
 end if;
 else
 v_data_type:='N';
 end if;
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 --s_alert('1','Company_Id='||v_company_id,v_temp); 
 elsif v_count=4 then
 v_curr:= ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,2)));
 --s_alert('1','CURR='||v_CURR,v_temp); 
 
 open c1_get_parent_id(v_company_id, v_curr, v_fin_month);
 fetch c1_get_parent_id into v_chk_id, v_chk_curr, v_chk_is_consol_rpt; --v10.9.1 modify by kimberly--
 close c1_get_parent_id;
 if v_chk_id is null or v_chk_curr is null then 
 s_alert('3','Company_Id or Curr or Effect_Date error!! Please check in ODGLS108 (code_type is CONSOL_COMPANY_RELATION)',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 v_is_consol_rpt := v_chk_is_consol_rpt; --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c2_chk_close(v_company_id, v_fin_month); --檢查對象公司是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c2_chk_close; 
 if v_chk = 'Y' then
 s_alert('3',v_company_id||' --> '||to_char(v_fin_month,'yyyymm')||'月已關帳, 沖銷資料不可重轉 !!',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 v_chk:=null;
 open c2_chk_close(v_chk_id, v_fin_month); --檢查母公司是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c2_chk_close; 
 if v_chk = 'Y' then
 s_alert('3',v_chk_id||' ...母公司已關帳, 沖銷資料不可重轉 !!',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_field_value:=null;
 for idx in 1..50 loop
 if v_chk_id = 'WHL' then
 exit;
 end if; 
 open c1_get_parent_id(v_chk_id, v_chk_curr, v_fin_month); --取得上階母公司id 
 fetch c1_get_parent_id into v_chk_id, v_chk_curr, v_chk_is_consol_rpt; --v10.9.1 modify by kimberly--
 close c1_get_parent_id;
 --s_alert('1','上階母公司chk_id='||v_chk_id||',chk_curr='||v_chk_curr,v_temp); 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c2_chk_close(v_chk_id, v_fin_month); --檢查上階母公司是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c2_chk_close;
 if v_chk = 'Y' then
 if v_field_value is null then
 v_field_value:=v_chk_id;
 else
 v_field_value:=v_field_value||', '||v_chk_id;
 end if; 
 end if; 
 end loop; 
 if v_field_value is not null then
 s_alert('3',v_field_value||' ...上階母公司已關帳, 沖銷資料不可重轉 !!',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_field_value:=null;
 for cc in c3_daj_exist(v_company_id, v_fin_month, v_type) loop --v12.1.2 modify by kimberly-- 
 if v_field_value is null then
 v_field_value:=cc.child_id;
 else
 v_field_value:=v_field_value||', '||cc.child_id;
 end if; 
 end loop; 
 if v_field_value is not null then
 s_alert('2',v_field_value||' ...子公司沖銷資料已存在, 是否重轉 ?!',v_temp); 
 if v_temp = 'Y' then
 delete glg1053
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and parent_id=v_company_id
 and adj_type not in ('1','2')
 and nvl(source_type,'FIN_ADJ')=v_type --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 ; 
 
 delete glg1056
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and parent_id=v_company_id
 and adj_type not in ('1','2')
 and nvl(source_type,'FIN_ADJ')=v_type --v11.12.1 add by Sharon
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 ; 
 else 
 text_io.fclose(in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 end if;
 
 out_file := text_io.fopen('c:\apps\whoracle\tempf\'||v_company_id||'error'||'.txt','w'); 
 
 elsif v_count>6 then 
 -- s_alert('1','v_count='||v_count,v_temp); 
 v_record_no := v_record_no+1;
 v_line_no := v_line_no+1;

 --P_CSVSTR(v_record,1,v_last_pos,v_child_id); 
 --s_alert('1','CHILD_ID('||V_RECORD_NO||')='||v_child_id||',last_pos='||v_last_pos,v_temp); 
 --if v_child_id is null then 
 -- exit;
 --end if; 
 
 --open c4(v_company_id, v_curr, v_fin_month, v_child_id);
 --fetch c4 into v_child_curr ;
 --close c4;
 --if v_child_curr is null then
 -- v_error :=v_record_no||'th record: CHILD_ID '||v_child_id||' is wrong or Currency is not defined for '||v_company_id||', Please check in ODGLS108 (code_type is CONSOL_COMPANY_RELATION)';
 -- text_io.put(out_file,v_error);
 -- text_io.new_line(out_file);
 -- v_errchk :='Y'; 
 --end if; 
 
 P_CSVSTR(v_record,1,v_last_pos,v_adjust_id); 
 -- s_alert('1','ADJUST_ID('||V_RECORD_NO||')='||V_ADJUST_ID||',last_pos='||v_last_pos,v_temp); 
 
 if v_adjust_id is null then 
 exit;
 end if;
 
 v_child_id:=v_adjust_id;
 open c_get_adj_curr(v_child_id, v_fin_month);
 fetch c_get_adj_curr into v_child_curr;
 close c_get_adj_curr;
 if v_child_curr is null then
 v_error :=v_record_no||'th record: ADJUST_ID '||v_child_id||' is wrong or Currency is not defined for '||v_company_id||', Please check in ODGLS108 (code_type is CONSOL_COMPANY_RELATION)';
 text_io.put(out_file,v_error);
 text_io.new_line(out_file);
 v_errchk :='Y'; 
 end if; 
 
 --if v_adjust_id != v_company_id and 
 -- v_adjust_id != v_child_id then 
 -- v_error :=v_record_no||'th record: ADJUST_ID '||v_adjust_id||' must be Child_Id or Parent_Id '||v_company_id||', Please check in ODGLS108 (code_type is CONSOL_COMPANY_RELATION)';
 -- text_io.put(out_file,v_error);
 -- text_io.new_line(out_file);
 -- v_errchk :='Y'; 
 --end if; 
 
 -- v_item_code:=ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,2))); 
 --P_CSVSTR(v_record,2,v_last_pos,v_item_code); --20111228 Sharon mark
 P_CSVSTR(v_record,2,v_last_pos,v_local_acct_no); --20111228 Sharon Add
 
 --s_alert('1','ITEM_CODE('||V_RECORD_NO||')='||V_ITEM_CODE||',last_pos='||v_last_pos,v_temp); 
 /* if v_item_code is null then --20111228 Sharon mark 因為已經改成收到的資料是local_acct_no 
 exit;
 end if;*/
 
 if v_local_acct_no is null then --20111228 Sharon Add
 exit;
 end if;
 
 --v_amount:=to_number(replace(ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,3))),',')); 
 P_CSVSTR(v_record,3,v_last_pos,v_field_value); 
 v_amount:=to_number(replace(v_field_value,','));
 -- s_alert('1','amount('||V_RECORD_NO||')='||V_amount||',last_pos='||v_last_pos||',data='||v_field_value,v_temp);
 v_total := v_total+v_amount; 
 
 P_CSVSTRB(v_record,4,v_last_pos+1,v_remark,v_last_pos); 
 v_remark:=substrb(ltrim(rtrim(v_remark)),1,200); 
 -- s_alert('1','REMARK('||V_RECORD_NO||')='||V_REMARK||',last_pos='||v_last_pos,v_temp); 
 
 p_csvstrb(v_record,5,v_last_pos+1,v_invest_id,v_last_pos); --v12.3.2 add by kimberly--
 -- s_alert('1','INVEST_ID('||V_RECORD_NO||')='||v_invest_id||',last_pos='||v_last_pos,v_temp); 
 
 /* v11.12.1 Add by Sharon
 當1.的alert 選[合併Code]--> local_acct_no, new_item, adj_item_code 的值都一樣
 當1.的alert 選[Local科目]--> csv file 讀入的值放local_acct_no 欄位, 再依下面的規則轉換, 放入 new_item, adj_item_code 
 
 (1) 透過 GLG1055 取得 new_item 
 (2) SF_GLS_0006('N',new_item, v_supply_code, v_month_date) 取得轉換後的 new_item 
 v_month_date: EDI 檔中的 MONTH 欄位值
 取得 supply_code:
 select a.supply_code into v_supply_code 
 from GLG7040 A 
 WHERE A.COMPANY_ID= 'WHUS' --EDI 檔中的 ADJ_ID 欄位值
 
 (3) 透過 GLG1048 取得 item_code*/
 if v_merger ='Y' then
 v_new_item :=v_local_acct_no;
 v_item_code:=v_local_acct_no;
 else
 --v_new_item:=f_new_item(v_adjust_id,v_local_acct_no,v_fin_month); --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly--
 pu_new_item (v_adjust_id, v_local_acct_no, v_fin_month, v_new_item, v_local_child); --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly-- 
 if v_new_item is null then 
 v_error := v_record_no||'th record: Local_Acct_No '||v_local_acct_no||' can not find the New_Item, please check ODGLS146...';
 text_io.put(out_file,v_error);
 text_io.new_line(out_file);
 v_errchk :='Y'; 
 
 else 
 --v12.3.2 add by kimberly start--
 if v_new_item in ('A440','A441') then
 if v_local_child is null and v_invest_id is null then
 v_error :=v_record_no||'th record: Local_Acct_No '||v_local_acct_no||',New_Item '||v_new_item||' need key-in INVEST_ID, please check EDI file or ODGLS146...';
 text_io.put(out_file,v_error);
 text_io.new_line(out_file);
 v_errchk :='Y';
 else 
 v_local_child:= nvl(v_local_child,v_invest_id);
 end if; 
 end if; 
 --v12.3.2 add by kimberly end--
 v_item_code:=f_item_code(v_fin_month,
 nvl(v_local_child, v_adjust_id), --v_adjust_id, --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly--
 v_new_item
 ); 
 if v_item_code is null then 
 v_error :=v_record_no||'th record: Local_Acct_No '||v_local_acct_no||',New_Item '||v_new_item||' for ('||nvl(v_local_child, v_adjust_id)|| ') can not find the Item_Code, please check ODGLS143...';
 text_io.put(out_file,v_error);
 text_io.new_line(out_file);
 v_errchk :='Y';
 end if; 
 end if; 
 
 end if; 
 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c3(v_item_code);
 fetch c3 into v_chk;
 close c3;
 
 if v_chk is null then 
 v_error :=v_record_no||'th record: Item_Code '||v_item_code||' is wrong, please check ODGLS141...';
 text_io.put(out_file,v_error);
 text_io.new_line(out_file);
 v_errchk :='Y'; 
 end if; 
 

 if v_errchk ='N' then 
 open c_rate(v_fin_month, v_child_curr, v_curr, v_item_code);
 fetch c_rate into v_child_parent_rate;
 close c_rate; 
 
 v_seq_no:= v_seq_no + 1;
 
 insert into glg1056( --改成先存入glg1056
 month_date,
 parent_id,
 parent_curr,
 child_id,
 child_curr,
 adj_id, 
 adj_item_code,
 adj_amount,
 adj_type,
 seq_no, 
 modify_date,
 modify_office,
 modify_program,
 modify_user,
 remark,
 source_type, --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 local_acct_no, --v11.12.1 add by Sharon
 new_item, --v11.12.1 add by Sharon
 data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 )
 values(
 v_fin_month,
 v_company_id,
 v_curr,
 v_child_id,
 v_child_curr,
 v_adjust_id, 
 v_item_code,
 v_amount, 
 '3', --adj_type
 v_seq_no, 
 sf_ars_0001,
 :parameter.office_code,
 :form_id_display,
 :parameter.user_code,
 v_remark,
 v_type, 
 v_local_acct_no, --v11.12.1 add by Sharon
 v_new_item, --v11.12.1 add by Sharon
 v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 );
 
 insert into glg1053( 
 month_date,
 parent_id,
 parent_curr,
 child_id,
 child_curr,
 adj_id, 
 adj_item_code,
 adj_amount,
 adj_type,
 seq_no, 
 modify_date,
 modify_office,
 modify_program,
 modify_user,
 remark,
 source_type, --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 )
 values(
 v_fin_month,
 v_company_id,
 v_curr,
 v_child_id,
 v_child_curr,
 v_adjust_id, 
 v_item_code,
 v_amount, 
 '3', --adj_type
 v_seq_no, 
 sf_ars_0001,
 :parameter.office_code,
 :form_id_display,
 :parameter.user_code,
 v_remark,
 v_type, --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 );
 
 -- s_alert('1','insert data ('||V_RECORD_NO||') is ok...',v_temp); 
 end if;
 
 end if;
 clear_message;

 end loop; 
 
 text_io.fclose(in_file); 
 
 -- s_alert('1','v_total='||nvl(v_total,999999999),v_temp); 
 
 if nvl(v_total,999999999)!=0 then 
 v_error := 'DR/CR Amount not balance !! total: '|| v_total; --v12.3.2 modify by kimberly--
 text_io.put(out_file,v_error);
 text_io.new_line(out_file);
 v_errchk :='Y'; 
 end if;
 
 text_io.fclose(out_file);
 
 --s_alert('1','v_errchk='||v_errchk,v_temp); 
 
 if v_errchk='Y' then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 s_alert(3,'Please check of the message in c:\apps\whoracle\tempf\'||v_company_id||'error.txt',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 --v8.5.4 add by kimberly start--
 delete glg1054
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and parent_id=v_company_id
 and parent_curr=v_curr
 --and type between '1' and '4' --v12.2.2 modify by kimberly--
 and ((type between '1' and '4') or (type='6' and nvl(parent_amount,0)=0)) --v12.2.2 modify by kimberly-- 
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 ; 
 --v8.5.4 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 if v_data_type = 'F' then
 --s_alert('1','PU_GEN_GLG1054 start....',v_temp); 
 PU_GEN_GLG1054 (v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr, 'Y'); 
 --s_alert('1','PU_GEN_GLG1054 end....',v_temp); 
 end if; 
 --v12.2.2 add by end-- 
 
 forms_ddl('commit');
 if not form_success then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 s_alert('1','ADJ transfer error!!',v_temp);
 else
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 s_alert ('1', 'ADJ transfer success!!', v_temp);
 end if; 
 
 --v8.5.4 add by kimberly start-- 
 --go_block('b1v_glg_1050');
 --enter_query_proc; 
 set_block_property('b1v_glg_1050',default_where,'month_date='||
 chr(39)||to_char(v_fin_month,'yyyymmdd')||chr(39)||' and company_id='||
 chr(39)||v_company_id||chr(39));
 go_block('b1v_glg_1050');
 execute_query;
 set_block_property('b1v_glg_1050',default_where,'');
 --v8.5.4 add by kimberly end-- 
 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN FOPEN_FAIL THEN
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default'); 
 s_alert('1','Can`t found file!!',v_temp);
 -- MESSAGE(' ', NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
 s_alert(1,SQLERRM,v_temp);
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 go_item(:cblk.path);
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 v_errm:=sqlerrm;
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 s_alert(1,v_errm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

declare
--v8.4.2 2008/4/11 Kimberly for [A80204]合併財報JOB, 新增[WHL財報]button轉入萬海資料
--v8.5.4 2008/5/15 Kimberly add some check control
--v8.6.2 2008/6/20 Kimberly for FIN-Sendy, ODGLS108新增Supply_Code欄位之控制只針對A441/L609科目
--v10.12.1 2010/12/14 Kimberly add where condition in c3_glg2002 cursor 
--v11.4.2 2011/04/18 Kimberly FIN-Sally, vou_no='201103312332', new_item='A440' 應用supply_code來判定轉換之item_code 
--v11.10.1 2011/10/18 TingYu add insert glg1049 data
--v11.11.1 2011/11/10 TingYu Fix the Error
--v12.1.1 2012/1/12 TingYu for 新增詢問視窗 '只轉IFRS首次適用資料?' 
--v12.1.3 2012/1/13 Kimberly add check rule for IFRS首次適用資料轉入 
--v12.2.2 2012/2/08 Kimberly for 'IFRS首次適用資料' 與 '2012/1月ROC當月科目餘額資料' 並存, 以 data_type 區分: N-Normal, F-首次資料 
-- 1.glg1049, glg1053, glg1054, glg1056 新增data_type欄位
-- 2.控制 glg1050.data_type in ('N','L'), nvl(data_type,'N')='N' for glg1049/1053/1054/1056

v_ifrs_first varchar2(2); --v12.1.3 add by kimberly--
v_ifrs_start_date date; --v12.2.1 add by kimberly--
v_data_type varchar2(10); --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--

 cursor c1_chk_month_close is
 select period_status
 from glg1004
 where :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between period_begin and period_end;
 
 cursor c2_chk_lost_new_item is
 select new_item, nvl(description_c,description_e) new_item_name
 from glg1012 a
 where nvl(end_date,sysdate)>=sysdate
 and not exists (select '1' from glg1048 b
 where a.new_item=b.new_item);

 cursor c3_glg2002(c_temp varchar2) is --cursor c3_glg2002 is --v12.1.1 modify by TingYu 
--select /*+ RULE */ b.item_code,sum(nvl(debit_amt,0)-nvl(credit_amt,0)) amount --v11.10.1 modify by TingYu--
 select b.item_code,a.new_item,sum(nvl(debit_amt,0)-nvl(credit_amt,0)) amount --v11.10.1 modify by TingYu-- 
 from glg2002 a, glg1048 b
 where a.voucher_date between trunc(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'yyyy') and last_day(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date)
 and a.voucher_type!='GLCLOSE'
 and a.voucher_status='USE'
 and a.new_item=b.new_item(+) --and a.new_item=b.new_item --v11.11.1 modify by TingYu-- 
 --and a.new_item not in ('A441','L609') --v11.4.2 modify by kimberly--v8.6.2 modify by kimberly--and a.new_item not in ('A441','A443','L609') 
 and a.new_item not in ('A440','A441') --v12.3.1 modify by kimberly--,'L609') --v11.4.2 modify by kimberly-- 
 --v12.1.1 add by TingYu start--
 and (nvl(c_temp,'N') = 'N' or (nvl(c_temp,'N') = 'Y' 
 and voucher_date=trunc(to_date(pg_glg_0001.f_code_value('IFRS','IFRS_START_DATE','CODE_VALUE1')),'mm')
 and voucher_type='GLOPEN')
 )
 --v12.1.1 add by TingYu end-- 
 --group by b.item_code --v11.10.1 modify by TingYu--
 group by b.item_code,a.new_item --v11.10.1 modify by TingYu-- 
 union all
--select b.adj_item_code item_code,sum(nvl(debit_amt,0)-nvl(credit_amt,0)) amount --v11.10.1 modify by TingYu--
 select b.adj_item_code item_code,a.new_item, sum(nvl(debit_amt,0)-nvl(credit_amt,0)) amount --v11.10.1 modify by TingYu-- 
 from glg2002 a, v_glg_1046 b
 where a.voucher_date between trunc(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'yyyy') and last_day(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date)
 and a.voucher_type!='GLCLOSE'
 and a.voucher_status='USE' 
 --and a.new_item in ('A441','L609') --v11.4.2 modify by kimberly--v8.6.2 modify by kimberly--and a.new_item in ('A441','A443','L609')
 and a.new_item in ('A440','A441') --v12.3.1 modify by kimberly--,'L609') --v11.4.2 modify by kimberly-- 
 and a.ref1=b.supply_code
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between b.effect_date and b.expire_date --v10.12.1 add by kimberly--
 --v12.1.1 add by TingYu start-- 
 and (nvl(c_temp,'N') = 'N' or (nvl(c_temp,'N') = 'Y' 
 and voucher_date=trunc(to_date(pg_glg_0001.f_code_value('IFRS','IFRS_START_DATE','CODE_VALUE1')),'mm')
 and voucher_type='GLOPEN')
 )
 --v12.1.1 add by TingYu end-- 
 --group by b.adj_item_code --v11.10.1 modify by TingYu--
 group by b.adj_item_code,a.new_item --v11.10.1 modify by TingYu-- 
 ; 

 cursor c3_glg7202(c_temp varchar2) is 
 select 'WHL' adj_id,
 'TWD' adj_curr,
 b.item_code adj_item_code,
 a.new_item,
 decode(c.code_value2,'AJE','IFRS_TPE_AJE','IFRS_TPE_RJE') source_type,
 decode(c_temp,'Y','F','N') data_type,
 sum(nvl(debit_amt,0)-nvl(credit_amt,0)) amount
 from glg7202 a, glg1048 b, glg1009 c
 where a.voucher_date between trunc(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'yyyy') and last_day(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date)
 and a.voucher_type!='GLCLOSE'
 and c.code_type='VOUCHER_TYPE'
 and a.voucher_type=c.code_id
 and c.code_value3='Y' 
 and a.voucher_status='USE'
 and a.new_item=b.new_item(+) 
 and a.new_item not in ('A440','A441') --v12.3.1 modify by kimberly--,'L609')
 and (nvl(c_temp,'N') = 'N' or (nvl(c_temp,'N') = 'Y' 
 and voucher_date=trunc(to_date(pg_glg_0001.f_code_value('IFRS','IFRS_START_DATE','CODE_VALUE1')),'mm')
 and voucher_type IN ('IFRS_AJE','IFRS_RJE')) 
 ) 
 group by b.item_code,a.new_item,c.code_value2 
 union all
 select b.company_id adj_id,
 b.curr adj_curr, 
 b.adj_item_code adj_item_code,
 a.new_item,
 decode(c.code_value2,'AJE','IFRS_TPE_AJE','IFRS_TPE_RJE') source_type,
 decode(c_temp,'Y','F','N') data_type,
 sum(nvl(debit_amt,0)-nvl(credit_amt,0)) amount 
 from glg7202 a, v_glg_1046 b, glg1009 c
 where a.voucher_date between trunc(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'yyyy') and last_day(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date)
 and a.voucher_type!='GLCLOSE'
 and c.code_type='VOUCHER_TYPE'
 and a.voucher_type=c.code_id
 and c.code_value3='Y' 
 and a.voucher_status='USE' 
 and a.new_item in ('A440','A441') --v12.3.1 modify by kimberly--,'L609') 
 and a.ref1=b.supply_code
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between b.effect_date and b.expire_date --v10.12.1 add by kimberly-- 
 and (nvl(c_temp,'N') = 'N' or (nvl(c_temp,'N') = 'Y' 
 and voucher_date=trunc(to_date(pg_glg_0001.f_code_value('IFRS','IFRS_START_DATE','CODE_VALUE1')),'mm')
 and voucher_type IN ('IFRS_AJE','IFRS_RJE'))
 )
 group by b.company_id, b.curr, b.adj_item_code,a.new_item,c.code_value2
 ; 
 
 cursor c1_get_parent_id(c_company_id varchar2,c_curr varchar2, c_month date) is
 select parent_id, parent_curr
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date;
 
 cursor c2_chk_close(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date) is
 select nvl(close_flag,'N') close_flag
 from glg1050
 where data_type='N'
 and trunc(month_date,'mm')=c_month
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and rownum=1;
 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 cursor c_chk_first(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date) is
 select '1'
 from glg1050
 where data_type='F'
 and trunc(month_date,'mm')=c_month
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and rownum=1; 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 --v11.10.1 add by TinYu start-- 
 cursor c_glg1049(
 c_month_date date,
 c_company_id varchar2,
 c_curr varchar2)
 is
 select month_date,company_id,curr,item_code,nvl(sum(amount),0) tot_amt
 from glg1049
 where month_date=c_month_date
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 group by month_date,company_id,curr,item_code;
 
 c1 c_glg1049%rowtype;
 --v11.10.1 add by TinYu end--
 
v_period_status varchar2(32); 
in_file text_io.file_type; 
out_file text_io.file_type;
v_record varchar2(2000);
v_field_value varchar2(2000);
fopen_fail exception; 
pragma exception_init(fopen_fail,-302000); 
v_count number:=0;
v_type varchar2(14);
v_month varchar2(6);
v_fin_month date;
v_company_id varchar2(20);
v_curr varchar2(3);
v_item_code varchar2(10);
v_rate_type varchar2(1);
v_amount number;
v_remark varchar2(200);
v_parent_id varchar2(20);
v_parent_curr varchar2(3);
v_curr_parent_rate number;
v_parent_amount number;
v_glg1050_seq number;
v_chk varchar2(10);
v_chk_id varchar2(20);
v_chk_curr varchar2(3);
v_data_exist varchar2(2); 
v_total number :=0; 
v_adj_total number :=0; --v12.2.9 add by kimberly-- 
v_temp varchar2(2);
text_id varchar2(200);
v_record_no number :=6;
v_errchk varchar2(2);
v_error varchar2(2000);
v_errm varchar2(2000);
v_alert varchar2(2);
v_seq_no number:=0; --v12.2.9 add by kimberly--
--==============================
-- Main process
--============================== 
begin 
 if :b1v_glg_1050.month_date is null then
 s_alert('3','Please input Month_Date !!',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 if :b1v_glg_1050.close_flag = 'Y' then
 s_alert('3','已關帳, 資料不可異動!!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 v_company_id:=SF_ARS_0004('DEFAULT_LINER','ID'); --WHL
 v_curr:=SF_ARS_0004('STD_CURR','ID'); --TWD
 v_fin_month:=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date; 

 open c1_get_parent_id(v_company_id, v_curr, v_fin_month);
 fetch c1_get_parent_id into v_parent_id, v_parent_curr;
 close c1_get_parent_id;
 if v_parent_id is null or v_parent_curr is null then 
 s_alert('3','Company_Id or Curr or Effect_Date error!! Please check in ODGLS108 (code_type is CONSOL_COMPANY_RELATION)',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_field_value:=null;
 for cc in c2_chk_lost_new_item loop
 if v_field_value is null then
 v_field_value:=cc.new_item;
 else
 v_field_value:=v_field_value||', '||cc.new_item;
 end if; 
 end loop; 
 
 if v_field_value is not null then
 s_alert('3',v_field_value||' ...新增的New_Item, 請用ODGLS143補入合併財報對應科目 !!',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 
 select trunc(to_date(pg_glg_0001.f_code_value('IFRS','IFRS_START_DATE','CODE_VALUE1')),'mm') into v_ifrs_start_date from dual; --v12.2.1 add by kimberly--
 if v_fin_month = v_ifrs_start_date then --v12.2.1 add by kimberly--
 s_alert('2','只轉IFRS首次適用資料?',v_ifrs_first); --v12.1.1 add by TingYu
 else
 v_ifrs_first:='N'; --v12.2.1 add by kimberly--
 end if; --v12.2.1 add by kimberly--
 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 if v_ifrs_first='Y' then
 v_data_type:='F';
 else
 v_data_type:='N';
 end if; 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end-- 

 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 if v_ifrs_first ='Y' then 
 v_data_exist:=null;
 open c_chk_first(v_company_id, v_fin_month); 
 fetch c_chk_first into v_data_exist;
 close c_chk_first; 
 if v_data_exist is not null then 
 s_alert('2','財報資料已存在, 是否重轉 ?!',v_temp);
 if v_temp!='Y' then
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if; 
 end if; 
 else --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end-- 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c1_chk_month_close; --檢查WHL是否已關帳?
 fetch c1_chk_month_close into v_chk;
 close c1_chk_month_close; 
 if nvl(v_chk,'*') != 'CLOSE' then
 s_alert('3',to_char(v_fin_month,'yyyymm')||'月萬海未關帳 !!',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 v_data_exist:=null;
 open c2_chk_close(v_company_id, v_fin_month); --檢查對象公司是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_data_exist;
 close c2_chk_close; 
 if v_data_exist = 'Y' then
 s_alert('3',v_company_id||' --> '||to_char(v_fin_month,'yyyymm')||'月已關帳, 財報資料不可重轉 !!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 elsif v_data_exist is not null then 
 s_alert('2','財報資料已存在, 是否重轉 ?!',v_temp);
 if v_temp!='Y' then
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if; 
 end if;
 end if; 
 if v_data_exist is not null then
 
 --v12.2.9 add by kimberly start-- 
 delete glg1056
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and parent_id=v_company_id
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type
 and source_type in ('IFRS_TPE_AJE','IFRS_TPE_RJE')
 ;
 
 delete glg1053
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and parent_id=v_company_id
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type
 and source_type in ('IFRS_TPE_AJE','IFRS_TPE_RJE')
 ; 
 --v12.2.9 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 --v11.11.1 add by TingYu start--
 delete glg1049
 where trunc(month_date,'mm')=v_fin_month
 and company_id=v_company_id
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 ;
 --v11.11.1 add by TingYu end-- 
 
 delete glg1050
 where trunc(month_date,'mm')=v_fin_month
 and company_id=v_company_id
 and ((v_ifrs_first ='Y' and nvl(data_type,'N') ='F') or --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 (v_ifrs_first!='Y' and nvl(data_type,'N')!='F')) --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 ;
 
 commit; --v11.11.1 add by TingYu-- 
 end if; 
 
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'busy'); 
 
 v_total:=0; 
 forms_ddl('savepoint loan1');
 v_errchk :='N'; --v11.11.1 add by TingYu--
 for cc in c3_glg2002(v_ifrs_first) loop --c3_glg2002 loop --v12.1.1 add by TingYu 
 --v11.11.1 add by TingYu start--
 if cc.item_code is null then
 v_errchk :='Y';
 end if;
 --v11.11.1 add by TingYu end--
 --v11.10.1 modify by TingYu start--
 /* select glg1002_seq.nextval
 into v_glg1050_seq
 from dual;
 
 insert into glg1050 ( glg1050_seq,
 data_type,
 month_date,
 company_id,
 curr,
 item_code,
 amount, 
 entry_date,
 entry_office,
 entry_user,
 entry_program,
 modify_date,
 modify_office,
 modify_program,
 modify_user, 
 remark,
 parent_id,
 parent_curr,
 curr_parent_rate,
 parent_amount
 )
 values(v_glg1050_seq,
 'N', --Normal
 v_fin_month,
 v_company_id,
 v_curr,
 cc.item_code,
 cc.amount, 
 sf_ars_0001,
 :parameter.office_code,
 :parameter.user_code,
 :form_id_display,
 sf_ars_0001,
 :parameter.office_code,
 :form_id_display,
 :parameter.user_code, 
 null, --remark, 
 v_parent_id,
 v_parent_curr,
 decode(v_company_id,v_parent_id,1,to_number(null)),
 cc.amount--nvl(v_parent_amount,0) --parent_amount
 )
 ;*/
 insert into glg1049(month_date,
 company_id,
 curr,
 local_acct_no,
 new_item,
 item_code,
 amount,
 entry_date,
 entry_office,
 entry_user,
 entry_program,
 data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 )
 values(v_fin_month,
 v_company_id,
 v_curr,
 sf_glg_1004(cc.new_item), 
 cc.new_item,
 cc.item_code,
 cc.amount,
 sf_ars_0001,
 :parameter.office_code,
 :parameter.user_code,
 :form_id_display,
 v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 );
 --v11.10.1 modify by TingYu end-- 
 v_total :=v_total+cc.amount; 
 clear_message;
 end loop;
 if nvl(v_errchk,'N')<>'Y' then 
 --v11.10.1 add by TingYu start--
 open c_glg1049(v_fin_month,v_company_id, v_curr);
 loop
 fetch c_glg1049 into c1;
 if c_glg1049%notfound then
 exit;
 end if;
 
 select glg1002_seq.nextval
 into v_glg1050_seq
 from dual;
 
 insert into glg1050 ( glg1050_seq,
 data_type,
 month_date,
 company_id,
 curr,
 item_code,
 amount, 
 entry_date,
 entry_office,
 entry_user,
 entry_program,
 modify_date,
 modify_office,
 modify_program,
 modify_user, 
 remark,
 parent_id,
 parent_curr,
 curr_parent_rate,
 parent_amount
 )
 values(v_glg1050_seq,
 v_data_type, --v12.1.3 modify by kimberly--'N', --Normal
 v_fin_month,
 v_company_id,
 v_curr,
 c1.item_code,
 c1.tot_amt, 
 sf_ars_0001,
 :parameter.office_code,
 :parameter.user_code,
 :form_id_display,
 sf_ars_0001,
 :parameter.office_code,
 :form_id_display,
 :parameter.user_code, 
 null, --remark, 
 v_parent_id,
 v_parent_curr,
 decode(v_company_id,v_parent_id,1,to_number(null)),
 c1.tot_amt--nvl(v_parent_amount,0) --parent_amount
 ); 
 update glg1049
 set glg1050_seq=v_glg1050_seq
 where month_date=c1.month_date
 and company_id=c1.company_id
 and curr=c1.curr
 and item_code=c1.item_code
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 ;
 end loop;
 end if;
 --v11.10.1 add by TingYu end--
 
 --v12.2.9 add by kimberly start-- 
 if v_fin_month >= v_ifrs_start_date then
 for cc in c3_glg7202(v_ifrs_first) loop 
 if cc.adj_item_code is null then
 v_errchk :='Y'; 
 end if;
 
 v_seq_no:= v_seq_no + 1;

 month_date,
 parent_id,
 parent_curr,
 child_id,
 child_curr,
 adj_id, 
 adj_item_code,
 adj_amount,
 adj_type,
 seq_no, 
 modify_date,
 modify_office,
 modify_program,
 modify_user,
 remark,
 source_type, 
 local_acct_no,
 new_item, 
 data_type 
 )
 values (
 v_fin_month,
 v_company_id,
 v_curr,
 cc.adj_id,
 cc.adj_curr,
 cc.adj_id, 
 cc.adj_item_code,
 cc.amount, 
 '3', --adj_type
 v_seq_no,

 :parameter.office_code,
 :form_id_display,
 :parameter.user_code,
 '', --remark,

 cc.new_item, 
 cc.data_type
 );

 values(

 cc.adj_id,

 '3', --adj_type

 );
 
 
 v_adj_total :=v_adj_total+cc.amount; 
 clear_message;
 end loop; 
 end if; 
 --v12.2.9 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 
 --s_alert('1','v_total='||nvl(v_total,999999999),v_temp); 
 if nvl(v_errchk,'N')='Y' or nvl(v_total,999999999)!=0 then --v11.11.1 modify by TingYu --if nvl(v_total,999999999)!=0 then 
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 p_output_xls('1',v_fin_month,v_company_id,v_curr); --v11.10.1 add by TingYu-- 
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 --v11.10.1 modify by TingYu start--
 --s_alert(3,'DR/CR Amount not balance !!',v_temp); 
 s_alert(3,'No Item Code or DR/CR Amount not balance!!Pls check the Detail file at「C:\apps\whoracle\tempf\'||to_char(v_fin_month,'yyyymm')||'WHLerror.xls」',v_temp); 
 --v11.10.1 modify by TingYu end--
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 if v_ifrs_first != 'Y' then --v12.1.3 add by kimberly--
 sp_glg_0029(v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr, :parameter.office_code, :parameter.user_code); --投資損益計算
 end if; 
 
 --v8.5.4 add by kimberly start--
 delete glg1054
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and parent_id=v_company_id
 and parent_curr=v_curr
 --and type between '1' and '4' --v12.2.2 modify by kimberly--
 and ((type between '1' and '4') or (type='6' and nvl(parent_amount,0)=0)) --v12.2.2 modify by kimberly-- 
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 ; 
 --v8.5.4 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 if v_ifrs_first = 'Y' then
 PU_GEN_GLG1054 (v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr, 'Y'); 
 end if; 
 --v12.2.2 add by end-- 
 
 forms_ddl('commit');
 if not form_success then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 s_alert('1','Process Fail !!',v_temp);
 else
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default'); 
 s_alert('1','Process Success !!',v_temp);
 end if; 
 
 --v8.5.4 add by kimberly start-- 
 set_block_property('b1v_glg_1050',default_where,'month_date='||
 chr(39)||to_char(v_fin_month,'yyyymmdd')||chr(39)||' and company_id='||
 chr(39)||v_company_id||chr(39));
 go_block('b1v_glg_1050');
 execute_query;
 set_block_property('b1v_glg_1050',default_where,'');
 --v8.5.4 add by kimberly end-- 
 
EXCEPTION 
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 v_errm:=sqlerrm;
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 s_alert('3',v_errm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

declare
 v_temp varchar2(2);
begin
 if :b1v_glg_1050.month_date is null then
 s_alert('3','Please input Month_Date !!',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'busy'); 
 
 P_OUTPUT_XLS('2',:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,:b1v_glg_1050.company_id,:b1v_glg_1050.curr); 

--v14.01.1 add by Keynes start-- 
 select was5200_seq.nextval into :parameter.p_was5200_seq from dual; 
 
 insert into was5200(was5200_seq, system_code, 
 entry_user, entry_office, entry_program, entry_date,
 log_delete_date, action,
 p_where
 )
 values (:parameter.p_was5200_seq, substr(:form_id_display,3,3),
 :parameter.user_code, :parameter.office_code, :form_id_display, sf_ars_0001,
 add_months(trunc(sf_ars_0001),6), 'QUERY',
 'Detail匯出:select * from glg1049 a,glg1046 b,glg1012'|| 
 ' where month_date =' ||chr(39)||:b1v_glg_1050.month_date ||chr(39)||
 ' company_id =' ||chr(39)||:b1v_glg_1050.company_id ||chr(39)|| 
 ' curr =' ||chr(39)||:b1v_glg_1050.curr ||chr(39)
 ); 
 
 forms_ddl('commit'); 
--v14.01.1 add by Keynes end -- 
 
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
end;

declare
--v8.5.2 2008/05/10 Kimberly for FIN-Brent, 子公司要開帳但母公司已關帳時顯示警訊
--v8.5.4 2008/05/15 Kimberly add some check control 
--v8.6.4 2008/06/24 Kimberly for FIN-Brent, 合併底稿資料的產生, 由[合併底稿列印]button改為關帳時, 避免user沒做列印動作
--v8.7.1 2008/07/16 Kimberly for FIN-Brent, close_flag打勾產生合併底稿及調整資料, 但是close_flag必須解開才可key-in調整數
--v8.7.2 2008/07/25 Kimberly for 新增功能1.僅做投資收益但財報不合併
--v8.8.1 2008/08/06 Kimberly fix bug when WHL close error
 cursor c_chk_close(c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2) is
 select nvl(close_flag,'N') close_flag
 from glg1050
 where month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and data_type='N'
 and rownum=1; 
 
 cursor c1_get_parent_id (c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2) is
 select parent_id, parent_curr, 
 is_consol_rpt is_consol_rpt --v8.7.2 add by kimberly--
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between effect_date and expire_date
 ; 

 --v8.6.4 add by kimberly start--
 cursor c2_get_child_id (c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is
 select company_id child_id,
 curr child_curr,
 is_consol_rpt child_is_consol_rpt --v8.7.2 add by kimberly--
 from v_glg_1046
 where parent_id=c_parent_id
 and parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between effect_date and expire_date
 order by company_id ; 
 --v8.6.4 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 v_chk varchar2(2); 
 v_fin_month date;
 v_company_id varchar2(20);
 v_curr varchar2(3);
 v_is_consol_rpt varchar2(1); --v8.7.2 add by kimberly--
 v_parent_id varchar2(20); --v8.7.2 add by kimberly--
 v_parent_curr varchar2(3); --v8.7.2 add by kimberly--
 v_child_id varchar2(20);
 v_child_curr varchar2(3);
 v_temp varchar2(2);
 v_field_value varchar2(200);
 
begin
--v8.7.2 add by kimberly start--
 open c1_get_parent_id (:b1v_glg_1050.company_id, :b1v_glg_1050.curr);
 fetch c1_get_parent_id into v_parent_id, v_parent_curr, v_is_consol_rpt;
 close c1_get_parent_id;
--v8.7.2 add by kimberly end-- 

--v8.5.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 if nvl(:b1v_glg_1050.close_flag,'N') !='Y' then
 v_field_value:=null; 
 if v_parent_id != :b1v_glg_1050.company_id then 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c_chk_close(v_parent_id, v_parent_curr);
 fetch c_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c_chk_close; 
 if nvl(v_chk,'N') = 'Y' then 
 v_field_value:= v_parent_id; 
 end if; 
 end if;
 if v_field_value is not null then
 s_alert('3',v_field_value||' ...母公司已關帳, 不可異動!!',v_temp);
 :b1v_glg_1050.close_flag:='Y';
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 end if; 
--v8.5.2 add by kimberly start--

--v8.6.1 add by kimberly start--
 if nvl(:b1v_glg_1050.close_flag,'N') ='Y' then
 v_field_value:=null;
 for cc in c2_get_child_id (:b1v_glg_1050.company_id, :b1v_glg_1050.curr) loop 
 if cc.child_id != :b1v_glg_1050.company_id then --for 'WHL' --v8.8.1 add by kimberly--
 v_chk:=null;
 open c_chk_close(cc.child_id, cc.child_curr);
 fetch c_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c_chk_close;
 if nvl(v_chk,'N') != 'Y' then
 if v_field_value is null then
 v_field_value:= cc.child_id;
 else 
 v_field_value:= v_field_value||', '||cc.child_id;
 end if;
 end if; 
 end if; --v8.8.1 add by kimberly-- 
 end loop;
 if v_field_value is not null then
 s_alert('3',v_field_value||' ...子孫公司財報資料未轉入或未關帳!!',v_temp);
 :b1v_glg_1050.close_flag:=null;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 end if; 
--v8.6.1 add by kimberly end--

 commit_form; 
 if :system.form_status!='QUERY' then 
 s_alert(1,'Unable to commit form',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

--v8.5.4 add by kimberly start-- 
 update glg1050
 set close_flag=:b1v_glg_1050.close_flag
 where month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and company_id=:b1v_glg_1050.company_id
 and curr=:b1v_glg_1050.curr ; 
--forms_ddl('commit'); --v8.6.4 marked by kimberly-- 
--v8.5.4 add by kimberly end-- 

 --v8.6.4 add by kimberly start--
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'busy'); 
 if nvl(:b1v_glg_1050.close_flag,'N') ='Y' then 
 if v_is_consol_rpt='Y' then --v8.7.2 add by kimberly--
 --v8.7.1 add by kimberly start-- 
 delete glg1054
 where month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and parent_id=:b1v_glg_1050.company_id
 and ((type between '1' and '4') or (type='6' and nvl(parent_amount,0)=0)) 
 and nvl(data_type,'N')='N' --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 ;
 --v8.7.1 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 PU_GEN_GLG1054 (:b1v_glg_1050.month_date, :b1v_glg_1050.company_id, :b1v_glg_1050.curr, 'N'); --PU_GEN_GLG1054;--v12.2.2 modify by kimberly-- 
 --v8.7.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 else
 delete glg1054
 where month_date=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date
 and parent_id=:b1v_glg_1050.company_id 
 and nvl(data_type,'N')='N' --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 ;
 end if; 
 --v8.7.2 add by kimberly end-- 
 end if;
 forms_ddl('commit');
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 --v8.6.4 add by kimberly end-- 

--v8.5.4 add by kimberly start-- 
 set_block_property('b1v_glg_1050',default_where,'month_date='||
 chr(39)||to_char(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date,'yyyymmdd')||chr(39)||' and company_id='||
 chr(39)||:b1v_glg_1050.company_id||chr(39));
 go_block('b1v_glg_1050');
 execute_query;
 set_block_property('b1v_glg_1050',default_where,'');
--v8.5.4 add by kimberly end-- 
EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default'); 
 s_alert(1,sqlerrm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
end;

DECLARE
--8.6.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 cursor c1_get_parent_id(c_company_id varchar2,c_curr varchar2, c_month date) is
 select parent_id, parent_curr, effect_date
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date;

 cursor c2_chk_close(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date) is
 select nvl(close_flag,'N') close_flag
 from glg1050
 where data_type='N'
 and trunc(month_date,'mm')=c_month
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and rownum=1;
 
 cursor c3_chk_rate(c_month date, c_child_curr varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is
 select a.bs_rate, a.is_rate
 from glg1047 a
 where a.month_date=c_month
 and a.curr=c_child_curr 
 and a.parent_curr=c_parent_curr;
 
 cursor c4_chk_his_glg1052(c_month date, c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2) is
 select '1' from glg1052
 where month_date=add_months(trunc(c_month,'yyyy'),-1)
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and rownum=1; 

 cursor c_item(c_item_code varchar2) is
 select rate_type 
 from glg1046
 where item_code=c_item_code; 

 cursor c_last_year(c_last_year date, c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2, c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2, c_item_code varchar2) is
 select b.amount, b.parent_amount
 from glg1052 b
 where b.month_date=c_last_year
 and b.company_id=c_company_id
 and b.curr=c_curr
 and b.parent_id=c_parent_id
 and b.parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and b.item_code=c_item_code;

 v_fin_month date;
 v_company_id varchar2(20);
 v_curr varchar2(03); 
 v_parent_id varchar2(20);
 v_parent_curr varchar2(3); 
 v_effect_date date;
 v_item_code varchar2(10);
 v_rate_type varchar2(1);
 v_bs_rate number;
 v_is_rate number;
 v_curr_parent_rate number;
 v_amount number;
 v_parent_amount number;
 v_last_amt number;
 v_last_parent_amt number;
 v_last_year date;
 v_chk varchar2(2);
 v_temp varchar2(2);
BEGIN
 v_company_id:=:b1v_glg_1050.company_id;
 v_curr:=:b1v_glg_1050.curr;
 v_fin_month:=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date;
 v_item_code:=:b2glg1050.item_code;
 v_amount:=:b2glg1050.amount;
 
 open c1_get_parent_id(v_company_id, v_curr, v_fin_month);
 fetch c1_get_parent_id into v_parent_id, v_parent_curr, v_effect_date;
 close c1_get_parent_id;
 if v_parent_id is null or v_parent_curr is null then 
 s_alert('3','Company_Id or Curr or Effect_Date error!! Please check in ODGLS108 (code_type is CONSOL_COMPANY_RELATION)',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_bs_rate:=to_number(null);
 v_is_rate:=to_number(null);
 open c3_chk_rate(v_fin_month,v_curr,v_parent_curr);
 fetch c3_chk_rate into v_bs_rate, v_is_rate;
 close c3_chk_rate;
 if nvl(v_bs_rate,0)=0 or nvl(v_is_rate,0)=0 then
 s_alert('3',v_curr||' -> '||v_parent_curr||'...無現時匯率, 或現時匯率為零 !! Please check in ODGLS142 ',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_chk:=null; 
 open c4_chk_his_glg1052(v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr); --檢查去年12月歷史匯率是否已存在
 fetch c4_chk_his_glg1052 into v_chk;
 close c4_chk_his_glg1052;
 --s_alert('1', 'v_chk='||nvl(v_chk,'??')||',effect_date='||to_char(v_effect_date,'yyyymmdd'),v_temp);
 if v_chk is null and trunc(v_effect_date,'yyyy')!=trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy') then 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c2_chk_close(v_company_id, add_months(trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy'),-1)); --檢查去年12月是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c2_chk_close; 
 if v_chk != 'Y' then
 s_alert('3', to_char(add_months(trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy'),-1),'yyyymm')||' 未關帳, 歷史匯率資料無法轉入 !!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 sp_glg_0030(v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr, :parameter.office_code, :parameter.user_code); --歷史匯率年度結轉
 end if; 
 
 v_rate_type:=null;
 open c_item(v_item_code);
 fetch c_item into v_rate_type;
 close c_item;
 
 if v_rate_type is null then 
 s_alert('3','Item_Code '||v_item_code||' is wrong, please check ODGLS141...',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if; 

 if v_rate_type in ('1','3') then
 v_curr_parent_rate:=v_bs_rate;
 elsif v_rate_type='2' then
 v_curr_parent_rate:=v_is_rate;
 end if;
 
 if v_rate_type in ('1','2') then
 v_parent_amount:=round(v_amount*v_curr_parent_rate,sf_ars_0008(v_parent_curr)); 
 elsif v_rate_type='3' then
 v_last_amt:=0;
 v_last_parent_amt:=0;
 v_last_year:=trunc(trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy')-1,'mm');
 open c_last_year(v_last_year, v_company_id, v_curr, v_parent_id, v_parent_curr, v_item_code);
 fetch c_last_year into v_last_amt, v_last_parent_amt;
 close c_last_year;
 v_parent_amount:=nvl(v_last_parent_amt,0) --去年
 +round((nvl(v_amount,0)-nvl(v_last_amt,0))*v_curr_parent_rate,sf_ars_0008(v_parent_curr)); --今年 
 end if;
 
 :b2glg1050.parent_id:=v_parent_id;
 :b2glg1050.parent_curr:=v_parent_curr;
 if v_rate_type in ('1','2') then
 :b2glg1050.curr_parent_rate:=v_curr_parent_rate;
 end if;
 :b2glg1050.parent_amount:=v_parent_amount;
--v8.6.3 add by kimberly end-- 

EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 s_alert(1,sqlerrm,v_temp);
 forms_ddl('rollback'); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

DECLARE
--8.6.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 cursor c1_get_parent_id(c_company_id varchar2,c_curr varchar2, c_month date) is
 select parent_id, parent_curr
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date;
--8.6.3 add by kimberly end-- 
 v_temp varchar2(2);
BEGIN
 if nvl(:b2glg1050.total_amt,999999999)!=0 then
 s_alert(3,'DR/CR Amount not balance !!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if;

 if :b2glg1050.parent_id is null then
 :b2glg1050.parent_curr:=null;
 :b2glg1050.curr_parent_rate:=null;
 :b2glg1050.parent_amount:=null;
 end if;
 
 if :b2glg1050.glg1050_seq is null then
 select glg1002_seq.NEXTVAL
 into :b2glg1050.glg1050_seq
 from dual;
 end if;
 
 :b2glg1050.entry_date := sf_ars_0001;
 :b2glg1050.entry_office := :parameter.office_code;
 :b2glg1050.entry_user := :parameter.user_code;
 :b2glg1050.entry_program:= :form_id_display;
 :b2glg1050.modify_date := sf_ars_0001;
 :b2glg1050.modify_office := :parameter.office_code;
 :b2glg1050.modify_user := :parameter.user_code;
 :b2glg1050.modify_program:= :form_id_display;
 
EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 s_alert(1,sqlerrm,v_temp);
 forms_ddl('rollback'); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

 v_temp varchar2(2);
 lv_alert varchar2(1);

--v14.10.1 add by Keynes start-- 
 select was5200_seq.nextval into :parameter.p_was5200_seq from dual;

 insert into was5200(was5200_seq, system_code, 
 entry_user, entry_office, entry_program, entry_date,
 log_delete_date, action,
 p_where
 )
 values (:parameter.p_was5200_seq, substr(:form_id_display,3,3),
 :parameter.user_code, :parameter.office_code, :form_id_display, sf_ars_0001,
 add_months(trunc(sf_ars_0001),6), 'UPDATE',
 'update glg1050'|| ' set remark ='||chr(39)|| :b2glg1050.remark ||chr(39)|| 
 ', parent_amount = ' ||chr(39)||:b2glg1050.parent_amount ||chr(39)|| 
 ' where item_code =' ||chr(39)||:b2glg1050.item_code ||chr(39)|| 
 ' and amount =' ||chr(39)||:b2glg1050.amount ||chr(39)|| 
 ' and parent_id =' ||chr(39)||:b2glg1050.parent_id ||chr(39)|| 
 ' and parent_curr =' ||chr(39)||:b2glg1050.parent_curr ||chr(39)|| 
 ' and curr_parent_rate ='||chr(39)||:b2glg1050.curr_parent_rate||chr(39)||
 ' and item_name =' ||chr(39)||:b2glg1050.item_name ||chr(39)|| 
 ' and data_type_name =' ||chr(39)||:b2glg1050.data_type_name ||chr(39) 
 ); 
--v14.10.1 add by Keynes end -- 
EXCEPTION

declare
 v_temp varchar2(1);
begin
 select DESCRIPTION into :b2glg1050.item_name
 from glg1046
 where item_code= :b2glg1050.item_code; 
exception
 when no_data_found then
 s_alert('3','單一財報-無此Item code:'||:b2glg1050.item_code,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;

 s_alert('3','單一財報 出現錯誤:'||sqlerrm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end; 
 if :b2glg1050.data_type ='N' then
 :b2glg1050.data_type_name:='EDI';
 elsif :b2glg1050.data_type ='A' then 
 :b2glg1050.data_type_name:='ADJ';
 elsif :b2glg1050.data_type ='L' then 
 :b2glg1050.data_type_name:='HIS';
 elsif :b2glg1050.data_type ='F' then --v12.1.3 add by kimberly-- 
 :b2glg1050.data_type_name:='FIRST';--v12.1.3 add by kimberly-- 
 else
 :b2glg1050.data_type_name:=:b2glg1050.data_type;
 end if;

Trigger.ODGLS144_overridden:TriggerText:
DECLARE
 cursor c1 is 
 select a.parent_id,a.parent_curr
 from V_GLG_1046 A
 where a.company_id=:b1v_glg_1050.company_id
 and :b4glg1052_his.month_date between a.effect_date and a.expire_date
 ; 

 v_temp varchar2(2);
 v_rate number;
BEGIN 
 open c1;
 fetch c1 into :b4glg1052_his.parent_id, :b4glg1052_his.parent_curr;
 close c1; 
 
EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 s_alert(1,sqlerrm,v_temp);
 forms_ddl('rollback'); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B9GLG1056',DEFAULT_WHERE,' MONTH_DATE='||CHR(39)||to_char(:B5GLG1053_ADJ.MONTH_DATE,'yyyymm')||'01'||CHR(39)
 ||' AND ADJ_ID='||CHR(39)||:B5GLG1053_ADJ.ADJ_ID||CHR(39)
 ||' AND PARENT_ID='||CHR(39)||:B5GLG1053_ADJ.PARENT_ID||CHR(39)
 ||' AND ADJ_TYPE='||CHR(39)||:B5GLG1053_ADJ.ADJ_TYPE||CHR(39)
 ||' AND ADJ_ITEM_CODE='||CHR(39)||:B5GLG1053_ADJ.ADJ_ITEM_CODE||CHR(39)
 ||' AND SEQ_NO='||:B5GLG1053_ADJ.SEQ_NO
 ||' AND DATA_TYPE='||CHR(39)||:B5GLG1053_ADJ.DATA_TYPE||CHR(39) --v12.2.9 add by kimberly-- 
 ||' AND SOURCE_TYPE='||CHR(39)||:B5GLG1053_ADJ.SOURCE_TYPE||CHR(39) --v12.2.9 add by kimberly--
 ) ;
SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('WINDOW2',X_POS,50);
SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('WINDOW2',Y_POS,200);
go_block('B9GLG1056');
execute_query;

declare
 --v12.2.9 2012/02/17 Kimberly 新增 IFRS_TPE_AJE 與 IFRS_TPE_RJE for 母公司IFRS影響數(GLG7201~GLG7203) 
 v_temp varchar2(1);
begin
select DESCRIPTION into :b5glg1053_adj.item_name
 from glg1046
 where item_code= :b5glg1053_adj.adj_item_code;
exception
 when no_data_found then
 s_alert('3','沖銷 無此Item code:'||:b2glg1050.item_code,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then

 raise form_trigger_failure;
end;

--v11.7.1 modify by kimberly start-- 
 --v12.1.1 modify by TingYu start--
 --if nvl(:b5glg1053_adj.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_WHL' then --v10.10.1 modify by kimberly--
 -- :b5glg1053_adj.f_source_type:='W'; 
 if nvl(:b5glg1053_adj.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_WHL_AJE' then
 :b5glg1053_adj.f_source_type:='WA'; --'A' --v12.2.4 modify by kimberly--
 elsif nvl(:b5glg1053_adj.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_WHL_RJE' then 
 :b5glg1053_adj.f_source_type:='WR'; --v12.2.4 modify by kimberly--
 --v12.1.1 modify by TingYu end-- 
 --v12.2.4 modify by kimberly start-- 
 elsif nvl(:b5glg1053_adj.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_SUB_AJE' then --'IFRS_ADJ'
 :b5glg1053_adj.f_source_type:='SA';
 elsif nvl(:b5glg1053_adj.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_SUB_RJE' then
 :b5glg1053_adj.f_source_type:='SR';
 --v12.2.4 modify by kimberly end--
 --v12.2.9 add by kimberly start-- 
 elsif nvl(:b5glg1053_adj.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_TPE_AJE' then 
 :b5glg1053_adj.f_source_type:='TA';
 elsif nvl(:b5glg1053_adj.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_TPE_RJE' then
 :b5glg1053_adj.f_source_type:='TR';
 --v12.2.9 add by kimberly end-- 
 else
 :b5glg1053_adj.f_source_type:='';
 end if; 
--v11.7.1 modify by kimberly end--

DECLARE
--v10.10.2 2010/10/28 Kimberly add pre-update trigger
 v_temp varchar2(2);
BEGIN 
 :b5glg1053_adj.modify_date := sf_ars_0001;
 :b5glg1053_adj.modify_office := :parameter.office_code;
 :b5glg1053_adj.modify_user := :parameter.user_code;
 :b5glg1053_adj.modify_program:= :form_id_display;
--v14.10.1 add by Keynes start-- 
 select was5200_seq.nextval into :parameter.p_was5200_seq from dual; 
 dbms_application_info.set_client_info(:parameter.p_was5200_seq); --client_info var2(64)); 
 insert into was5200(was5200_seq, system_code, 
 entry_user, entry_office, entry_program, entry_date,

declare
 v_temp varchar2(1);
begin
 begin
 select DESCRIPTION into :b5v_glg_1048.item_name
 from glg1046
 where item_code= :b5v_glg_1048.item_code;
 
 exception 
 when no_data_found then
 s_alert('3','合併底稿 無此 Item code:'||:b5v_glg_1048.item_code,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 s_alert('3','合併底稿 出現錯誤:'||sqlerrm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end;
 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 if nvl(:b5v_glg_1048.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_WHL_AJE' then
 :b5v_glg_1048.f_source_type:='WA'; --'A' --v12.2.4 modify by kimberly--
 elsif nvl(:b5v_glg_1048.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_WHL_RJE' then
 :b5v_glg_1048.f_source_type:='WR'; --'R' --v12.2.4 modify by kimberly-- 
 elsif nvl(:b5v_glg_1048.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_SUB_AJE' then --'IFRS_ADJ' then --v12.2.4 modify by kimberly--
 :b5v_glg_1048.f_source_type:='SA'; --'S' --v12.2.4 modify by kimberly--
 elsif nvl(:b5v_glg_1048.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_SUB_RJE' then --v12.2.4 add by kimberly--
 :b5v_glg_1048.f_source_type:='SR'; --v12.2.4 add by kimberly-- 
--v12.2.9 add by kimberly start-- 
 elsif nvl(:b5v_glg_1048.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_TPE_AJE' then 
 :b5v_glg_1048.f_source_type:='TA';
 elsif nvl(:b5v_glg_1048.source_type,'FIN_ADJ')='IFRS_TPE_RJE' then
 :b5v_glg_1048.f_source_type:='TR';
 --v12.2.9 add by kimberly end-- 
 else 
 :b5v_glg_1048.f_source_type:='';
 end if; 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end--
 
 
end;

DECLARE

 cursor c_child_exist (c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is
 select '*'
 from v_glg_1046
 where parent_id=c_parent_id
 and parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and :b1v_glg_1050.month_date between effect_date and expire_date
 ;

 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if;

 :b6glg1054.child_id := :b6glg1054.parent_id;
 :b6glg1054.child_curr := :b6glg1054.parent_curr;
 :b6glg1054.type := '6';
 :b6glg1054.parent_amount := nvl(:b6glg1054.parent_amount,0); --v8.5.4 add by kimberly--
 :b6glg1054.modify_date := sf_ars_0001;
 :b6glg1054.modify_office := :parameter.office_code;
 :b6glg1054.modify_user := :parameter.user_code;

 raise form_trigger_failure;

END;

Trigger.ODGLS144_overridden:TriggerText:
DECLARE
--8.6.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 cursor c1_get_parent_id(c_company_id varchar2,c_curr varchar2, c_month date) is
 select parent_id, parent_curr, effect_date
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date;

 cursor c2_chk_close(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date) is
 select nvl(close_flag,'N') close_flag
 from glg1050
 where data_type='N'
 and trunc(month_date,'mm')=c_month
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and rownum=1;
 
 cursor c3_chk_rate(c_month date, c_child_curr varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is
 select a.bs_rate, a.is_rate
 from glg1047 a
 where a.month_date=c_month
 and a.curr=c_child_curr 
 and a.parent_curr=c_parent_curr;
 
 cursor c4_chk_his_glg1052(c_month date, c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2) is
 select '1' from glg1052
 where month_date=add_months(trunc(c_month,'yyyy'),-1)
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and rownum=1; 

 cursor c_item(c_item_code varchar2) is
 select rate_type 
 from glg1046
 where item_code=c_item_code; 

 cursor c_last_year(c_last_year date, c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2, c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2, c_item_code varchar2) is
 select b.amount, b.parent_amount
 from glg1052 b
 where b.month_date=c_last_year
 and b.company_id=c_company_id
 and b.curr=c_curr
 and b.parent_id=c_parent_id
 and b.parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and b.item_code=c_item_code;

 v_fin_month date;
 v_company_id varchar2(20);
 v_curr varchar2(03); 
 v_parent_id varchar2(20);
 v_parent_curr varchar2(3); 
 v_effect_date date;
 v_item_code varchar2(10);
 v_rate_type varchar2(1);
 v_bs_rate number;
 v_is_rate number;
 v_curr_parent_rate number;
 v_amount number;
 v_parent_amount number;
 v_last_amt number;
 v_last_parent_amt number;
 v_last_year date;
 v_chk varchar2(2);
 v_temp varchar2(2);
BEGIN
 v_company_id:=:b1v_glg_1050.company_id;
 v_curr:=:b1v_glg_1050.curr;
 v_fin_month:=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date;
 v_item_code:=:b2glg1050.item_code;
 v_amount:=:b2glg1050.amount;
 
 open c1_get_parent_id(v_company_id, v_curr, v_fin_month);
 fetch c1_get_parent_id into v_parent_id, v_parent_curr, v_effect_date;
 close c1_get_parent_id;
 if v_parent_id is null or v_parent_curr is null then 
 s_alert('3','Company_Id or Curr or Effect_Date error!! Please check in ODGLS108 (code_type is CONSOL_COMPANY_RELATION)',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_bs_rate:=to_number(null);
 v_is_rate:=to_number(null);
 open c3_chk_rate(v_fin_month,v_curr,v_parent_curr);
 fetch c3_chk_rate into v_bs_rate, v_is_rate;
 close c3_chk_rate;
 if nvl(v_bs_rate,0)=0 or nvl(v_is_rate,0)=0 then
 s_alert('3',v_curr||' -> '||v_parent_curr||'...無現時匯率, 或現時匯率為零 !! Please check in ODGLS142 ',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_chk:=null; 
 open c4_chk_his_glg1052(v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr); --檢查去年12月歷史匯率是否已存在
 fetch c4_chk_his_glg1052 into v_chk;
 close c4_chk_his_glg1052;
 --s_alert('1', 'v_chk='||nvl(v_chk,'??')||',effect_date='||to_char(v_effect_date,'yyyymmdd'),v_temp);
 if v_chk is null and trunc(v_effect_date,'yyyy')!=trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy') then 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c2_chk_close(v_company_id, add_months(trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy'),-1)); --檢查去年12月是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c2_chk_close; 
 if v_chk != 'Y' then
 s_alert('3', to_char(add_months(trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy'),-1),'yyyymm')||' 未關帳, 歷史匯率資料無法轉入 !!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 sp_glg_0030(v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr, :parameter.office_code, :parameter.user_code); --歷史匯率年度結轉
 end if; 
 
 v_rate_type:=null;
 open c_item(v_item_code);
 fetch c_item into v_rate_type;
 close c_item;
 
 if v_rate_type is null then 
 s_alert('3','Item_Code '||v_item_code||' is wrong, please check ODGLS141...',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if; 

 if v_rate_type in ('1','3') then
 v_curr_parent_rate:=v_bs_rate;
 elsif v_rate_type='2' then
 v_curr_parent_rate:=v_is_rate;
 end if;
 
 if v_rate_type in ('1','2') then
 v_parent_amount:=round(v_amount*v_curr_parent_rate,sf_ars_0008(v_parent_curr)); 
 elsif v_rate_type='3' then
 v_last_amt:=0;
 v_last_parent_amt:=0;
 v_last_year:=trunc(trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy')-1,'mm');
 open c_last_year(v_last_year, v_company_id, v_curr, v_parent_id, v_parent_curr, v_item_code);
 fetch c_last_year into v_last_amt, v_last_parent_amt;
 close c_last_year;
 v_parent_amount:=nvl(v_last_parent_amt,0) --去年
 +round((nvl(v_amount,0)-nvl(v_last_amt,0))*v_curr_parent_rate,sf_ars_0008(v_parent_curr)); --今年 
 end if;
 
 :b2glg1050.parent_id:=v_parent_id;
 :b2glg1050.parent_curr:=v_parent_curr;
 if v_rate_type in ('1','2') then
 :b2glg1050.curr_parent_rate:=v_curr_parent_rate;
 end if;
 :b2glg1050.parent_amount:=v_parent_amount;
--v8.6.3 add by kimberly end-- 

EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 s_alert(1,sqlerrm,v_temp);
 forms_ddl('rollback'); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin B72V_GLG_1052 detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B71V_GLG_1051.MONTH_DATE is not null) or (:B71V_GLG_1051.COMPANY_ID is not null) or (:B71V_GLG_1051.CURR is not null) or (:B71V_GLG_1051.ITEM_CODE is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B71V_GLG_1051.B71V_GLG_1051_B72V_GLG_1052'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B72V_GLG_1052'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B72V_GLG_1052 detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --

 WHERE V.MONTH_DATE = :B71V_GLG_1051.MONTH_DATE and V.COMPANY_ID = :B71V_GLG_1051.COMPANY_ID and V.CURR = :B71V_GLG_1051.CURR and V.ITEM_CODE = :B71V_GLG_1051.ITEM_CODE;
 --
 -- End B72V_GLG_1052 detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin B72V_GLG_1052 detail program section
 --
 OPEN B72V_GLG_1052_cur; 
 FETCH B72V_GLG_1052_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( B72V_GLG_1052_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE B72V_GLG_1052_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE B72V_GLG_1052_cur;
 --
 -- End B72V_GLG_1052 detail program section
 --
END;

Trigger.ODGLS144_overridden:TriggerText:
DECLARE
--8.6.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 cursor c1_get_parent_id(c_company_id varchar2,c_curr varchar2, c_month date) is
 select parent_id, parent_curr, effect_date
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date;

 cursor c2_chk_close(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date) is
 select nvl(close_flag,'N') close_flag
 from glg1050
 where data_type='N'
 and trunc(month_date,'mm')=c_month
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and rownum=1;
 
 cursor c3_chk_rate(c_month date, c_child_curr varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is
 select a.bs_rate, a.is_rate
 from glg1047 a
 where a.month_date=c_month
 and a.curr=c_child_curr 
 and a.parent_curr=c_parent_curr;
 
 cursor c4_chk_his_glg1052(c_month date, c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2) is
 select '1' from glg1052
 where month_date=add_months(trunc(c_month,'yyyy'),-1)
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and rownum=1; 

 cursor c_item(c_item_code varchar2) is
 select rate_type 
 from glg1046
 where item_code=c_item_code; 

 cursor c_last_year(c_last_year date, c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2, c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2, c_item_code varchar2) is
 select b.amount, b.parent_amount
 from glg1052 b
 where b.month_date=c_last_year
 and b.company_id=c_company_id
 and b.curr=c_curr
 and b.parent_id=c_parent_id
 and b.parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and b.item_code=c_item_code;

 v_fin_month date;
 v_company_id varchar2(20);
 v_curr varchar2(03); 
 v_parent_id varchar2(20);
 v_parent_curr varchar2(3); 
 v_effect_date date;
 v_item_code varchar2(10);
 v_rate_type varchar2(1);
 v_bs_rate number;
 v_is_rate number;
 v_curr_parent_rate number;
 v_amount number;
 v_parent_amount number;
 v_last_amt number;
 v_last_parent_amt number;
 v_last_year date;
 v_chk varchar2(2);
 v_temp varchar2(2);
BEGIN
 v_company_id:=:b1v_glg_1050.company_id;
 v_curr:=:b1v_glg_1050.curr;
 v_fin_month:=:b1v_glg_1050.month_date;
 v_item_code:=:b2glg1050.item_code;
 v_amount:=:b2glg1050.amount;
 
 open c1_get_parent_id(v_company_id, v_curr, v_fin_month);
 fetch c1_get_parent_id into v_parent_id, v_parent_curr, v_effect_date;
 close c1_get_parent_id;
 if v_parent_id is null or v_parent_curr is null then 
 s_alert('3','Company_Id or Curr or Effect_Date error!! Please check in ODGLS108 (code_type is CONSOL_COMPANY_RELATION)',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_bs_rate:=to_number(null);
 v_is_rate:=to_number(null);
 open c3_chk_rate(v_fin_month,v_curr,v_parent_curr);
 fetch c3_chk_rate into v_bs_rate, v_is_rate;
 close c3_chk_rate;
 if nvl(v_bs_rate,0)=0 or nvl(v_is_rate,0)=0 then
 s_alert('3',v_curr||' -> '||v_parent_curr||'...無現時匯率, 或現時匯率為零 !! Please check in ODGLS142 ',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 
 v_chk:=null; 
 open c4_chk_his_glg1052(v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr); --檢查去年12月歷史匯率是否已存在
 fetch c4_chk_his_glg1052 into v_chk;
 close c4_chk_his_glg1052;
 --s_alert('1', 'v_chk='||nvl(v_chk,'??')||',effect_date='||to_char(v_effect_date,'yyyymmdd'),v_temp);
 if v_chk is null and trunc(v_effect_date,'yyyy')!=trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy') then 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c2_chk_close(v_company_id, add_months(trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy'),-1)); --檢查去年12月是否已關帳
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c2_chk_close; 
 if v_chk != 'Y' then
 s_alert('3', to_char(add_months(trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy'),-1),'yyyymm')||' 未關帳, 歷史匯率資料無法轉入 !!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 sp_glg_0030(v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr, :parameter.office_code, :parameter.user_code); --歷史匯率年度結轉
 end if; 
 
 v_rate_type:=null;
 open c_item(v_item_code);
 fetch c_item into v_rate_type;
 close c_item;
 
 if v_rate_type is null then 
 s_alert('3','Item_Code '||v_item_code||' is wrong, please check ODGLS141...',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if; 

 if v_rate_type in ('1','3') then
 v_curr_parent_rate:=v_bs_rate;
 elsif v_rate_type='2' then
 v_curr_parent_rate:=v_is_rate;
 end if;
 
 if v_rate_type in ('1','2') then
 v_parent_amount:=round(v_amount*v_curr_parent_rate,sf_ars_0008(v_parent_curr)); 
 elsif v_rate_type='3' then
 v_last_amt:=0;
 v_last_parent_amt:=0;
 v_last_year:=trunc(trunc(v_fin_month,'yyyy')-1,'mm');
 open c_last_year(v_last_year, v_company_id, v_curr, v_parent_id, v_parent_curr, v_item_code);
 fetch c_last_year into v_last_amt, v_last_parent_amt;
 close c_last_year;
 v_parent_amount:=nvl(v_last_parent_amt,0) --去年
 +round((nvl(v_amount,0)-nvl(v_last_amt,0))*v_curr_parent_rate,sf_ars_0008(v_parent_curr)); --今年 
 end if;
 
 :b2glg1050.parent_id:=v_parent_id;
 :b2glg1050.parent_curr:=v_parent_curr;
 if v_rate_type in ('1','2') then
 :b2glg1050.curr_parent_rate:=v_curr_parent_rate;
 end if;
 :b2glg1050.parent_amount:=v_parent_amount;
--v8.6.3 add by kimberly end-- 

EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 s_alert(1,sqlerrm,v_temp);
 forms_ddl('rollback'); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

DECLARE
--8.6.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 cursor c1_get_parent_id(c_company_id varchar2,c_curr varchar2, c_month date) is
 select parent_id, parent_curr
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date;
--8.6.3 add by kimberly end-- 
 v_temp varchar2(2);
BEGIN
 if nvl(:b10glg1050_F.total_amt,999999999)!=0 then
 s_alert(3,'DR/CR Amount not balance !!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if;

 if :b10glg1050_F.parent_id is null then
 :b10glg1050_F.parent_curr:=null;
 :b10glg1050_F.curr_parent_rate:=null;
 :b10glg1050_F.parent_amount:=null;
 end if;
 
 if :b10glg1050_F.glg1050_seq is null then
 select glg1002_seq.NEXTVAL
 into :b10glg1050_F.glg1050_seq
 from dual;
 end if;
 
 :b10glg1050_F.entry_date := sf_ars_0001;
 :b10glg1050_F.entry_office := :parameter.office_code;
 :b10glg1050_F.entry_user := :parameter.user_code;
 :b10glg1050_F.entry_program:= :form_id_display;
 :b10glg1050_F.modify_date := sf_ars_0001;
 :b10glg1050_F.modify_office := :parameter.office_code;
 :b10glg1050_F.modify_user := :parameter.user_code;
 :b10glg1050_F.modify_program:= :form_id_display;
 
EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 s_alert(1,sqlerrm,v_temp);
 forms_ddl('rollback'); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

DECLARE
 v_temp varchar2(2);
BEGIN
 if nvl(:b10glg1050_F.total_amt,999999999)!=0 then
 s_alert(3,'DR/CR Amount not balance !!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if;
 
/* 
 if :b10glg1050_F.data_type='N' and :b10glg1050_F.parent_id is not null then
 s_alert(3,'Parent_Id must be empty for Original EDI data !!',v_temp); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;

 if :b10glg1050_F.data_type='N' and :b10glg1050_F.child_id is not null then

 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if;
 
 if :b10glg1050_F.data_type='A' and
 (:b10glg1050_F.parent_id is null and :b10glg1050_F.child_id is null) then
 s_alert(3,'Either Parent_Id or Child_Id must be input !!',v_temp);

 end if;
*/ 

 if :b10glg1050_F.parent_id is null then

 :b10glg1050_F.modify_date := sf_ars_0001;

 :b10glg1050_F.modify_user := :parameter.user_code;
 :b10glg1050_F.modify_program:= :form_id_display;
--v14.10.1 add by Keynes start-- 
 select was5200_seq.nextval into :parameter.p_was5200_seq from dual; 
 dbms_application_info.set_client_info(:parameter.p_was5200_seq); --client_info var2(64)); 
 insert into was5200(was5200_seq, system_code, 
 entry_user, entry_office, entry_program, entry_date,
 log_delete_date, action,
 p_where
 )
 values (:parameter.p_was5200_seq, substr(:form_id_display,3,3),
 :parameter.user_code, :parameter.office_code, :form_id_display, sf_ars_0001,
 add_months(trunc(sf_ars_0001),6), 'UPDATE',
 'update glg1050'|| ' set remark ='||chr(39)|| :B10GLG1050_F.remark ||chr(39)|| 
 ', parent_amount = ' ||chr(39)||:B10GLG1050_F.parent_amount ||chr(39)|| 
 ' where item_code =' ||chr(39)||:B10GLG1050_F.item_code ||chr(39)|| 
 ' and amount =' ||chr(39)||:B10GLG1050_F.amount ||chr(39)|| 
 ' and parent_id =' ||chr(39)||:B10GLG1050_F.parent_id ||chr(39)|| 
 ' and parent_curr =' ||chr(39)||:B10GLG1050_F.parent_curr ||chr(39)|| 
 ' and curr_parent_rate =' ||chr(39)||:B10GLG1050_F.curr_parent_rate||chr(39)||
 ' and item_name =' ||chr(39)||:B10GLG1050_F.item_name ||chr(39)|| 
 ' and data_type_name =' ||chr(39)||:B10GLG1050_F.data_type_name ||chr(39) 
 ); 
--v14.10.1 add by Keynes end -- 
EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 s_alert(1,sqlerrm,v_temp);
 forms_ddl('rollback'); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

declare
 v_temp varchar2(1);
begin
 select DESCRIPTION into :b10glg1050_F.item_name
 from glg1046
 where item_code= :b10glg1050_F.item_code; 
exception
 when no_data_found then
 s_alert('3','單一財報-無此Item code:'||:b10glg1050_F.item_code,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 s_alert('3','單一財報 出現錯誤:'||sqlerrm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end; 
 if :b10glg1050_F.data_type ='N' then
 :b10glg1050_F.data_type_name:='EDI';
 elsif :b10glg1050_F.data_type ='A' then 
 :b10glg1050_F.data_type_name:='ADJ';
 elsif :b10glg1050_F.data_type ='L' then 
 :b10glg1050_F.data_type_name:='HIS';
 elsif :b10glg1050_F.data_type ='F' then --v12.1.3 add by kimberly-- 
 :b10glg1050_F.data_type_name:='FIRST';--v12.1.3 add by kimberly-- 
 else
 :b10glg1050_F.data_type_name:=:b10glg1050_F.data_type;
 end if;

DECLARE 
 --v8.6.3 2008/6/23 Kimberly for FIN-Sendy, 台灣財報開放新增科目及修改Local Amount欄位
 v_temp varchar2(2);
BEGIN
 if nvl(:b1v_glg_1050.close_flag,'N') = 'Y' then 
 set_block_property('b10glg1050_F',insert_allowed,property_false); 
 set_block_property('b10glg1050_F',delete_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('b10glg1050_F',update_allowed,property_false);
 else 
 --v8.6.3 modify by kimberly start--
 --set_block_property('b10glg1050_F',update_allowed,property_true); 
 if :b1v_glg_1050.company_id='WHL' then
 set_block_property('b10glg1050_F',insert_allowed,property_true); 
 set_block_property('b10glg1050_F',update_allowed,property_true);
 set_block_property('b10glg1050_F',delete_allowed,property_true);
 else
 set_block_property('b10glg1050_F',update_allowed,property_true);
 set_block_property('b10glg1050_F',insert_allowed,property_false); 
 set_block_property('b10glg1050_F',delete_allowed,property_false);
 end if;
 --v8.6.3 modify by kimberly end--
 end if;
EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 forms_ddl('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 s_alert(1,sqlerrm,v_temp);
 forms_ddl('rollback'); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END;

if nvl(:b1v_glg_1050.close_flag,'N') != 'Y' then
 if :b1v_glg_1050.company_id='WHL' then 
 set_item_property('b10glg1050_F.amount',update_allowed,property_true);
 else 
 set_item_property('b10glg1050_F.amount',update_allowed,property_false);
 end if; 
 end if;

ProgramUnit.ODGLS144_overridden:ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE P_required_item IS
/******************************************************************************************\
* creator: JENG 2000/11/16
* purpose: set required item visual attribute
*
*
*
\******************************************************************************************/
 v_first_item VARCHAR2(200);
 v_LAST_item VARCHAR2(200);
 v_current_item VARCHAR2(200);

 v_first_BLOCK VARCHAR2(200);
 v_LAST_BLOCK VARCHAR2(200);
 v_current_BLOCK VARCHAR2(200);

 v_current_FORM VARCHAR2(200);

BEGIN
 v_current_form := GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURRENT_FORM_NAME);
 v_first_block := GET_FORM_PROPERTY(v_current_form,FIRST_BLOCK);
 v_last_block := GET_FORM_PROPERTY(v_current_form, LAST_BLOCK);

 v_current_BLOCK := v_first_block;

 LOOP -- loop blocks in form
 v_first_item := v_current_block||'.'||GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(v_current_block,FIRST_ITEM);
 v_last_item := v_current_block||'.'||GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(v_current_block, LAST_ITEM);

 v_current_item := v_first_item;
 
 LOOP -- loop items in block

 IF Get_Item_Property(v_current_item,ITEM_CANVAS) IS NOT NULL AND
 Get_Item_Property(v_current_item,ITEM_TYPE) IN ('CHAR ITEM','TEXT ITEM','LIST') THEN

 IF Get_Item_Property(v_current_item,REQUIRED)='TRUE' AND
 Get_Item_Property(v_current_item,VISIBLE)='TRUE' THEN

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_current_item,PROMPT_visual_attribute,'promt_red');
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_current_item,PROMPT_TEXT , 'black'); 
 
 END IF;

 END IF;

 IF v_current_item=v_last_item THEN
 EXIT;
 ELSE
 v_current_item := v_current_block||'.'||GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(v_current_item, NEXTITEM);
 END IF;

 END LOOP; -- loop item

 IF v_current_block=v_last_block THEN
 EXIT;
 ELSE
 v_current_block := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(v_current_block, NEXTBLOCK);
 END IF;

 END LOOP; -- loop block

END; -- end of P_REQUIRED_ITEM

PROCEDURE alert_stop(v_error_code number) 
 is 
 v_temp varchar2(32);
BEGIN
 s_alert('1',sf_gls_0001(v_error_code),v_temp);
END;

procedure clear_form_proc is
begin
 clear_form(no_validate);
 execute_trigger('when-new-form-instance');
end;

procedure commit_proc is
 lv_char varchar2(1);
begin
 if :system.record_status not in ('NEW') then
 enter;
 if form_failure then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end if;
 commit;
exception
 when others then
 s_alert('3',sqlerrm,lv_char);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end;

PROCEDURE P_POP_LIST(P_ITEMNAME VARCHAR2,P_CODETYPE VARCHAR2) IS
 GROUP1_ID RECORDGROUP; 
 GROUP2_ID RECORDGROUP;
 COL1_ID GROUPCOLUMN; 
 COL2_ID GROUPCOLUMN; 
 IT_ID ITEM := FIND_ITEM(P_ITEMNAME); 
 STATUS NUMBER; 
 SQL_TEMP VARCHAR2(500);
 V_GROUP1 VARCHAR2(100);
 V_GROUP2 VARCHAR2(100);
 V_SEQ NUMBER := 0;
BEGIN

 SQL_TEMP := 'SELECT CODE_VALUE1,CODE_ID FROM ARC1017'||
 ' WHERE CODE_TYPE = '||''''||P_CODETYPE||''''||
 ' ORDER BY CODE_ID';

 LOOP
 V_GROUP1 := P_CODETYPE||'1'||TO_CHAR(V_SEQ);
 V_GROUP2 := P_CODETYPE||'2'||TO_CHAR(V_SEQ);

 GROUP1_ID := Find_Group(V_GROUP1); 
 IF NOT Id_Null(GROUP1_ID) THEN 
 V_SEQ := V_SEQ + 1;
 ELSE 
 EXIT;
 END IF; 
 END LOOP;

 GROUP1_ID := CREATE_GROUP(V_GROUP1);
 COL1_ID := ADD_GROUP_COLUMN(GROUP1_ID,'COL1',CHAR_COLUMN,50);
 COL2_ID := ADD_GROUP_COLUMN(GROUP1_ID,'COL2',CHAR_COLUMN,50);
 ADD_GROUP_ROW(GROUP1_ID,1); 
 ADD_GROUP_ROW(GROUP1_ID,2);
 RETRIEVE_LIST(IT_ID, V_GROUP1); 
 GROUP2_ID := CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY(V_GROUP2,SQL_TEMP); 
 STATUS := POPULATE_GROUP(V_GROUP2);
-- SHOW_ALERT_MESSAGE(TO_CHAR(STATUS));
 POPULATE_LIST(IT_ID,V_GROUP2);
END;

procedure enter_query_proc is
 cur_block varchar2(80);
 cur_va varchar2(80);
 lv_alert number;
begin
 cur_block := :system.current_block;
 if :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' then
 lv_alert := show_alert('alert_out');
 if lv_alert = alert_button1 then
 clear_form_proc;
 else
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end if;
 cur_va := get_block_property(cur_block,current_record_attribute);
 set_block_property(cur_block,current_record_attribute,'enter_query_va');
 enter_query;
 if cur_va is null then
 set_block_property(cur_block,current_record_attribute,'normal_record_va');
 else
 set_block_property(cur_block,current_record_attribute,cur_va);
 end if;
end;

procedure exec_query_proc is
 lv_alert number;
 lv_char varchar2(1); --v14.01.1 add by Keynes 資訊安全控管 
 lv_err varchar2(2000); --v14.01.1 add by Keynes 
begin
 if :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' then
 lv_alert := show_alert('alert_out');
 if lv_alert = alert_button1 then
 clear_form_proc;
 execute_query;
 end if;
 else
 execute_query;
 end if;
 
 
 --v14.01.1 add by Keynes start-- 
 select was5200_seq.nextval into :parameter.p_was5200_seq from dual; 
 
 insert into was5200(was5200_seq, system_code, 
 entry_user, entry_office, entry_program, entry_date,
 log_delete_date, action,
 p_where, p_where2
 )
 values (:parameter.p_was5200_seq, substr(:form_id_display,3,3),
 :parameter.user_code, :parameter.office_code, :form_id_display, sf_ars_0001,
 add_months(trunc(sf_ars_0001),6), 'QUERY',
 substrb(:system.last_query,1,4000), substrb(:system.last_query,4001,4000)
 ); 
 
 forms_ddl('commit');
exception 
 when others then 
 lv_err:= substr(sqlerrm,1,2000); 
 forms_ddl('rollback'); 
 s_alert('3','EXEC_QUERY_PROC FAIL: '||lv_err,lv_char); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 --v14.10.1 add by Keynes end-- 
end;

procedure exit_proc is
 alert_bun number ;
begin
 if :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' then
 alert_bun := show_alert('alert_out');
 if alert_bun = alert_button1 then
 exit_form(no_validate);
 end if;
 else
 exit_form;
 end if;
end;
