FUNCTION F_CSVFILE (p_filename VARCHAR2, p_line_seq PLS_INTEGER, p_item_seq PLS_INTEGER) RETURN VARCHAR2
IS
 v_str VARCHAR2(2000);
 v_file TEXT_IO.FILE_TYPE;
BEGIN
 BEGIN
 v_file:=TEXT_IO.FOPEN(p_filename,'R');
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 BELL;
 MESSAGE(p_filename||'--File open fail!!');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END;
 FOR i IN 1..p_line_seq LOOP
 text_io.get_line(v_file,v_str);
 END LOOP;
 RETURN (F_CSVSTR(v_str,p_item_seq)); 
 TEXT_IO.FCLOSE(v_file);
 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 TEXT_IO.FCLOSE(v_file);
 RETURN NULL;
END;

FUNCTION F_CSVSTR(p_str IN VARCHAR2, p_item_seq PLS_INTEGER) RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 v_pos PLS_INTEGER:=0;
 v_char VARCHAR2(1):=NULL;
 v_item VARCHAR2(2000):=NULL;
 v_inquote VARCHAR2(20):='N';
BEGIN
 FOR i IN 1..p_item_seq LOOP
 v_item:=NULL;
 LOOP 
 v_pos:=v_pos+1;
 v_char:=SUBSTR(p_str,v_pos,1); 
 IF v_char IS NULL AND v_inquote='Y' THEN
 BELL;
 MESSAGE('String Error!!');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSIF v_char IS NULL AND NVL(v_inquote,'N')!='Y' THEN
 EXIT; 
 END IF;
 
 
 IF v_char='"' AND v_inquote='Y' THEN
 IF SUBSTR(p_str,v_pos+1,1)='"' THEN 
 v_pos:=v_pos+1;
 v_item:=v_item||'"';
 ELSE
 v_inquote:='N';
 END IF;
 ELSIF v_char='"' AND NVL(v_inquote,'N')='N' THEN
 v_inquote:='Y';
 ELSIF v_char=',' AND NVL(v_inquote,'N')='N' THEN
 EXIT; 
 ELSE
 v_item:=v_item||v_char;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 END LOOP;
 RETURN v_item;
END;

FUNCTION F_CSVSTRB(p_str IN VARCHAR2, p_item_seq PLS_INTEGER) RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
--v7.9.1 2007/9/17 Kimberly add for FIN-Connie申請單, remark 欄位可接受中文字
--v7.10.1 2007/10/5 Kimberly fix bug for v7.9.1 when amount value like " 4,000 " --有千分位符號,以雙引號包住 
 v_item VARCHAR2(2000):=NULL;
 v_fm_pos PLS_INTEGER:=0;
 v_to_pos PLS_INTEGER:=0;
 --v7.10.1 add by kimberly start-- 
 v_str varchar2(2000):=p_str;
 v_quote_fm_pos PLS_INTEGER:=0;
 v_quote_to_pos PLS_INTEGER:=0;
 --v7.10.1 add end--
BEGIN 
 if p_item_seq <= 1 then
 v_fm_pos:=0;
 select INSTRB(p_str,',',1,p_item_seq) into v_to_pos from dual;
 else 
 select INSTRB(p_str,',',1,p_item_seq-1),
 INSTRB(p_str,',',1,p_item_seq) 
 into v_fm_pos, v_to_pos
 from dual;
 end if; 
 
 if v_fm_pos!=0 and v_to_pos=0 then
 v_item:=SUBSTRB(p_str, v_fm_pos+1);
 elsif v_to_pos!=0 then 
 v_item:=SUBSTRB(p_str, v_fm_pos+1, v_to_pos-1-v_fm_pos);
 end if;
 
 RETURN v_item;
END;

PROCEDURE P_CSVSTR(p_str IN VARCHAR2, p_item_seq IN PLS_INTEGER, p_last_pos OUT NUMBER, p_item OUT VARCHAR2) IS
--v7.10.1 2007/10/5 Kimberly fix bug for v7.9.1 when amount value like " 4,000 " --有千分位符號,以雙引號包住
-- 新增此procedure可傳回下一個逗號的位置 
-- eg A-Format字串: MJ79907,JPMOJ,C538,,"2007/7/1",D," 30,000 ",, 
-- 取第二個place_code欄位--> p_item='JPMOJ', p_last_pos=14 
 v_pos PLS_INTEGER:=0;
 v_char VARCHAR2(1):=NULL;
 v_item VARCHAR2(2000):=NULL;
 v_inquote VARCHAR2(20):='N';
BEGIN
 FOR i IN 1..p_item_seq LOOP
 v_item:=NULL;
 LOOP 
 v_pos:=v_pos+1;
 v_char:=SUBSTR(p_str,v_pos,1); 
 IF v_char IS NULL AND v_inquote='Y' THEN
 BELL;
 MESSAGE('String Error!!');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSIF v_char IS NULL AND NVL(v_inquote,'N')!='Y' THEN
 EXIT; 
 END IF; 
 
 IF v_char='"' AND v_inquote='Y' THEN
 IF SUBSTR(p_str,v_pos+1,1)='"' THEN 
 v_pos:=v_pos+1;
 v_item:=v_item||'"';
 ELSE
 v_inquote:='N';
 END IF;
 ELSIF v_char='"' AND NVL(v_inquote,'N')='N' THEN
 v_inquote:='Y';
 ELSIF v_char=',' AND NVL(v_inquote,'N')='N' THEN
 EXIT; 
 ELSE
 v_item:=v_item||v_char;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 END LOOP;
 p_item:= v_item;
 p_last_pos:=v_pos;
END;

PROCEDURE P_CSVSTRB(p_str IN VARCHAR2, p_item_seq IN PLS_INTEGER, p_start_pos IN NUMBER, p_item OUT VARCHAR2, p_last_pos OUT VARCHAR2) IS
--v7.10.1 2007/10/5 Kimberly fix bug for v7.9.1 when amount value like " 4,000 " --有千分位符號,以雙引號包住
-- 新增此procedure, 傳入可輸入中文字的remark開始位置 p_start_pos 
-- eg A-Format字串: MJ79907,JPMOJ,C538,,"2007/7/1",D," 30,000 ",, 中文
-- 取第9個remark欄位--> p_item='中文', p_start_pos=46
--v7.10.2 2007/10/9 Kimberly fix for A-Format字串: MJ79907,JPMOJ,C538,,2007/7/1,D," 30,000 ",,Shifting to Cy =usd 8917.0,,
-- remark欄位無雙引號, 開始位置應為0 
 v_item VARCHAR2(2000):=NULL;
 v_fm_pos PLS_INTEGER:=0;
 v_to_pos PLS_INTEGER:=0;
 v_str varchar2(2000):=NULL; 
BEGIN
 v_str:=substr(p_str,p_start_pos); --取p_start_pos位置開始後的字串
 select INSTR(v_str,'"',1,1),
 INSTR(v_str,'"',1,2) 
 into v_fm_pos, v_to_pos --找出雙引號的起訖位置
 from dual;
 
 if v_fm_pos=0 and v_to_pos=0 then --無雙引號時, 找出分隔符號逗號的起訖位置
 --v7.10.2 modify by kimberly start--
 -- select INSTR(v_str,',',1,1),
 -- INSTR(v_str,',',1,2) 
 -- into v_fm_pos, v_to_pos 
 -- from dual;
 select INSTR(v_str,',',1,1) 
 into v_to_pos 
 from dual;
 --v7.10.2 modify end--
 end if;
 
 if v_to_pos=0 then
 v_item:=SUBSTR(v_str, v_fm_pos+1);
 elsif v_to_pos!=0 then 
 v_item:=SUBSTR(v_str, v_fm_pos+1, v_to_pos-1-v_fm_pos);
 end if; 
 p_item:=v_item; 
--p_last_pos:=v_to_pos; --v12.3.2 modify by kimberly-- 
 p_last_pos:=p_start_pos+nvl(length(v_item),0); --v12.3.2 modify by kimberly-- 
END;

Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

PROCEDURE OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet IN OUT OLE2.OBJ_TYPE,
 ROW IN NUMBER ,
 COL IN NUMBER ,
 TEXT IN VARCHAR2 ) IS
 Cell OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 Args OLE2.LIST_TYPE;
BEGIN
 Args := OLE2.CREATE_ARGLIST;
 OLE2.ADD_ARG(Args, ROW);
 OLE2.ADD_ARG(Args, COL);
 Cell := OLE2.GET_OBJ_PROPERTY(Worksheet, 'Cells', Args);
-- OLE2.SET_PROPERTY(Cell, 'Value', ''''||TEXT);
 OLE2.SET_PROPERTY(Cell, 'Value', TEXT); 
 OLE2.RELEASE_OBJ(Cell);
 OLE2.DESTROY_ARGLIST(Args);
END;

--v8.7.2 2008/07/25 Kimberly for 新增功能1.僅做投資收益但財報不合併
--v10.9.1 2010/09/13 Kimberly for IFRS project, 新增可轉入IFRS_ADJ沖銷檔-子孫公司間沖銷 (GLG1053/GLG1054 新增SOURCE_TYPE欄位)
--v10.11.1 2010/11/10 Kimberly for FIN-Alina,子孫公司間沖銷(IFRS_ADJ)/母子公司間沖銷(IFRS_WHL)之檔案全由WHL轉入--皆為台幣數, 則無匯差問題
--v11.4.1 2011/04/13 Kimberly fix bug for HK-Prisca, UNIWIN 有手動輸入合併底稿的調整數, Close重勾後double ?
--v12.2.6 2012/02/14 Kimberly for FIN-Alina, 首次適用資料漏了子孫公司的數字, 也就是2011/12月[合併底稿]的subsidirary Amt
--v12.2.8 2012/02/15 Kimberly for FIN-Alina, fix v12.2.6 損益需結轉至 3211 (年初未分配盈餘)
 v_ifrs_first varchar2(2); --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 v_ifrs_start_date date; --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 v_data_type varchar2(1); --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 
 v_chk varchar2(2);
 v_child_exist varchar2(2);
 v_fin_month date;
 v_company_id varchar2(20);
 v_curr varchar2(3);
 v_child_id varchar2(20);
 v_child_curr varchar2(3);
 v_temp varchar2(2);
 v_field_value varchar2(200);
 sw_first varchar2(1):='Y';
 keep_type varchar2(1);
 keep_child_id varchar2(20);

 cursor c_chk_close(c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2) is
 select nvl(close_flag,'N') close_flag
 from glg1050
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and data_type='N'
 and rownum=1; 
 
 cursor c2_chk_close(c_company_id varchar2, c_month date) is
 select nvl(close_flag,'N') close_flag, curr
 from glg1050
 where month_date=c_month
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and data_type='N' 
 and rownum=1;
 
 cursor c1_get_parent_id (c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2) is
 select parent_id, parent_curr,
 is_consol_rpt --v8.7.2 add by kimberly--
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and v_fin_month between effect_date and expire_date
 ; 

 cursor c2_get_child_id (c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is
 select company_id child_id,
 curr child_curr,
 is_consol_rpt child_is_consol_rpt --v8.7.2 add by kimberly--
 from v_glg_1046
 where parent_id=c_parent_id
 and parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and v_fin_month between effect_date and expire_date
 order by company_id ;
 
 cursor c_child_exist (c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is
 select '*'
 from v_glg_1046
 where parent_id=c_parent_id
 and parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and v_fin_month between effect_date and expire_date
 ; 
 
 cursor c3_self (c_company_id varchar2) is 
 select bb.item_code, aa.curr, aa.parent_curr, aa.rate, aa.amount, aa.parent_amount,
 'FIN_ADJ' source_type --v11.4.1 add by kimberly 
 from 
 ( select item_code, curr, parent_curr, curr_parent_rate rate, sum(amount) amount, sum(parent_amount) parent_amount 
 from glg1050 
 where month_date=v_fin_month --v_fin_month --v12.2.2 modify by kimberly--
 and company_id=c_company_id --自己單一財報
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 and ((v_ifrs_first ='Y' and nvl(data_type,'N') ='F') or
 (v_ifrs_first!='Y' and nvl(data_type,'N')!='F'))
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end-- 
 group by item_code, curr, parent_curr, curr_parent_rate
 ) aa, glg1046 bb 
 where aa.item_code(+)=bb.item_code
 order by bb.item_code ; 

 cursor c4_combine (c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2) is 
 select bb.item_code, c_curr curr, c_parent_curr parent_curr,
 decode(bb.rate_type,'1',cc.bs_rate,'2',cc.is_rate,to_number(null)) rate,
 aa.amount, 
 nvl(aa.source_type, 'FIN_ADJ') source_type, --v11.4.1 modify by kimberly --aa.source_type, --v10.9.1 add by kimberly-- 
 round(decode(bb.rate_type,'1',aa.amount*cc.bs_rate
 --,'2',aa.amount*cc.is_rate --v10.11.1 modify by kimberly--
 ,'2',decode(nvl(source_type,'FIN_ADJ'),'FIN_ADJ',cc.is_rate,cc.bs_rate)*aa.amount --v10.11.1 modify by kimberly--
 --v10.9.1 modify by kimberly start-- 
 --,sf_glg_1027(v_fin_month,c_company_id,c_curr,c_parent_curr,aa.item_code,aa.amount)
 ,decode(nvl(source_type,'FIN_ADJ'),'FIN_ADJ',sf_glg_1027(v_fin_month,c_company_id,c_curr,c_parent_curr,aa.item_code,aa.amount),aa.amount*cc.bs_rate) 
 --v10.9.1 modify by kimberly end-- 
 ),sf_ars_0008(c_parent_curr)) parent_amount 
 from (select source_type, --v10.9.1 add by kimberly-- 
 item_code,
 sum(parent_amount) amount 
 from glg1054
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and parent_id=c_company_id
 and parent_curr=c_curr
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 group by source_type, --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 item_code 
 ) aa, glg1046 bb, glg1047 cc
 where aa.item_code(+)=bb.item_code
 and cc.month_date=v_fin_month
 and cc.curr=c_curr
 and cc.parent_curr=c_parent_curr 
 order by bb.item_code,
 nvl(aa.source_type, 'FIN_ADJ') --v11.4.1 modify by kimberly --aa.source_type --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 ; 
 
 cursor c_get_adj_child (c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2) is 
 select distinct child_id, child_curr
 from glg1053 
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and parent_id=c_company_id --與子公司的沖銷
 and parent_curr=c_curr 
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 order by child_id
 ;
 
 cursor c5_adj (c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2,
 c_child_id varchar2, c_child_curr varchar2) is 
 select bb.item_code,
 nvl(aa.source_type, 'FIN_ADJ') source_type, --v11.4.1 modify by kimberly --aa.source_type, --v10.9.1 add by kimberly-- 
 aa.amount
 from 
 ( select adj_item_code item_code, 
 source_type, --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 sum(adj_amount) amount
 from glg1053 
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and parent_id=c_company_id --與子公司的沖銷
 and parent_curr=c_curr
 and child_id=c_child_id
 and child_curr=c_child_curr
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 group by adj_item_code,
 source_type --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 ) aa, glg1046 bb 
 where aa.item_code(+)=bb.item_code
 order by bb.item_code,
 nvl(aa.source_type, 'FIN_ADJ') --v11.4.1 modify by kimberly --aa.source_type --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 ; 
 
--v8.4.4 add by kimberly start-- 
 cursor c_total(c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2, c_type varchar2) is 
 select bb.item_code,
 nvl(aa.source_type, 'FIN_ADJ') source_type, --v11.4.1 modify by kimberly --aa.source_type, --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 aa.parent_amount
 from 
 ( select item_code,
 source_type, --v10.9.1 add by kimberly-- 
 sum(parent_amount) parent_amount
 from glg1054 
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and parent_id=c_parent_id
 and parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 and ((c_type='5' and type between '1' and '4') or
 (c_type='6' and type=c_type) or
 (c_type='9' and type between '1' and '6'))
 group by item_code,
 source_type --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 ) aa, glg1046 bb 
 where aa.item_code(+)=bb.item_code
 order by bb.item_code,
 nvl(aa.source_type, 'FIN_ADJ') --v11.4.1 modify by kimberly --aa.source_type --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 ;
--v8.4.4 add by kimberly end--

--v8.5.3 add by kimberly start-- 
 cursor c_chk_glg1054(c_parent_id varchar2, c_parent_curr varchar2, c_item_code varchar2, c_source_type varchar2) is --v10.9.1 modify by kimberly--
 select '1' 
 from glg1054
 where month_date=v_fin_month
 and parent_id=c_parent_id
 and parent_curr=c_parent_curr
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 and type='6' --合併調整數 
 and item_code=c_item_code
 --and source_type=c_source_type --v11.4.1 modify by kimberly--v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 and nvl(source_type,'FIN_ADJ')=nvl(c_source_type,'FIN_ADJ') --v11.4.1 modify by kimberly-- 
 ; 
--v8.5.3 add by kimberly end--

--==============================
-- GLG1054 process
--============================== 
--v8.4.4 add by kimberly start-- 
procedure insert_glg1054_proc
 ( c_month_date date, c_company_id varchar2, c_curr varchar2,
 c_type varchar2, c_child_id varchar2, c_child_curr varchar2, c_item_code varchar2,
 c_child_amount number, c_child_parent_rate number, c_parent_amount number,
 c_source_type varchar2 default null --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 )
is
begin
 insert into glg1054 (month_date,
 parent_id,
 parent_curr,
 type,
 child_id,
 child_curr,
 item_code,
 child_amount,
 child_parent_rate,
 parent_amount,
 modify_office,
 modify_user,
 modify_date,
 modify_program,
 source_type, --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 )
 values (c_month_date,
 c_company_id,
 c_curr,
 c_type,
 c_child_id,
 c_child_curr,
 c_item_code,
 c_child_amount,
 c_child_parent_rate,
 c_parent_amount,
 :parameter.office_code,
 :parameter.user_code,
 sf_ars_0001,
 :form_id_display,
 c_source_type, --v10.9.1 add by kimberly-- 
 v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 ); 
 
end;
--v8.4.4 add by kimberly end-- 
--==============================
-- Generate_Proc process
--============================== 
procedure generate_proc is
begin
--產生財報合併檔--
 v_child_exist:=null;
 open c_child_exist (v_company_id, v_curr);
 fetch c_child_exist into v_child_exist;
 close c_child_exist; 
 
 if v_child_exist is not null then --有子公司
 for cc in c2_get_child_id (v_company_id, v_curr) loop
 if cc.child_id != v_company_id --WHL's parent_id is equal to conpamy_id
 and cc.child_is_consol_rpt='Y' then --v8.7.2 add by kimberly-- 
 v_chk:=null;
 open c_child_exist (cc.child_id, cc.child_curr); --子公司是否有孫公司? 
 fetch c_child_exist into v_chk;
 close c_child_exist;
 if v_chk is null then --無孫公司, 列印單一財報 
 for c3r in c3_self (cc.child_id) loop 
 --s_alert(1,'c3_self--> '||cc.child_id||',ITEM_CODE='||c3r.item_code,v_temp); 
 insert_glg1054_proc (v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr,
 '1', cc.child_id, cc.child_curr, c3r.item_code,
 c3r.amount, c3r.rate, c3r.parent_amount,
 c3r.source_type --v11.4.1 add by kimberly-- 
 ); 
 end loop; 
 --s_alert(1,'c3_self OK for 子公司 !!',v_temp);
 else --有孫公司, 列印合併財報 
 for c4r in c4_combine (cc.child_id , cc.child_curr, v_curr) loop
 --s_alert(1,'c4_combine--> '||cc.child_id||',ITEM_CODE='||c4r.item_code,v_temp);
 insert_glg1054_proc (v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr,
 '2', cc.child_id, cc.child_curr, c4r.item_code,
 c4r.amount, c4r.rate, c4r.parent_amount,
 c4r.source_type --v10.9.1 add by kimberly-- 
 ); 
 end loop;
 --s_alert(1,'c4_combine OK !!',v_temp);
 end if;
 end if; 
 end loop; 
 end if;
 
 --列印自己單一財報 
 for dd in c3_self (v_company_id) loop
 --s_alert(1,'自己單一財報 c3_self--> '||v_company_id||',ITEM_CODE='||dd.item_code,v_temp);
 insert_glg1054_proc (v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr,
 '3', v_company_id, v_curr, dd.item_code,
 to_number(null), to_number(null), dd.amount,
 dd.source_type --v11.4.1 add by kimberly-- 
 ); 
 end loop; 
 --s_alert(1,'c3_self OK for 自己 !!',v_temp); 
 
 --列印沖銷資料
 for cc in c_get_adj_child(v_company_id, v_curr) loop 
 for c5r in c5_adj (v_company_id, v_curr, cc.child_id , cc.child_curr) loop
 insert_glg1054_proc (v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr,
 '4', cc.child_id , cc.child_curr, c5r.item_code,
 to_number(null), to_number(null), c5r.amount,
 c5r.source_type --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 );
 end loop;
 end loop;
 --s_alert(1,' c5_adj OK for 自己 !!',v_temp); 

 --v8.5.3 add by kimberly start--
 --產生調整數資料
 if v_child_exist is not null then --有子公司 --v8.5.4 add by kimberly--
 for cc in c_total(v_company_id, v_curr, '5') loop
 if nvl(cc.parent_amount,0)!=0 then
 v_chk:=null;
 open c_chk_glg1054 (v_company_id, v_curr, cc.item_code, cc.source_type); --v10.9.1 modify by kimberly--
 fetch c_chk_glg1054 into v_chk;
 close c_chk_glg1054;
 if v_chk is null then
 insert_glg1054_proc (v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr,
 '6', v_company_id , v_curr, cc.item_code,
 to_number(null), to_number(null), 0,
 cc.source_type --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 );
 end if;
 end if; 
 end loop; 
 end if; 
 -- s_alert(1,' 產生調整數資料 ok !!',v_temp); 
 --v8.5.3 add by kimberly end--
end; 
--============================== 
--v12.2.6 add by kimberly start--
procedure gen_ifrs_first_proc is 
begin 
 for dd in (select nvl(aa.source_type,'FIN_ADJ') source_type, bb.item_code, sum(amount) amount --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly-- 
 from (select a.source_type, a.item_code, a.parent_amount amount
 from glg1054 a, glg1046 b --調整數--
 where a.month_date=add_months(v_fin_month,-1)
 and a.parent_id=v_company_id
 and a.parent_curr=v_curr
 and nvl(a.data_type,'N')='N'
 and a.type='6'
 and a.item_code=b.item_code
 and to_number(b.acct_type) between 1 and 3
 --v12.2.8 add by kimberly start-- 
 union all
 select a.source_type, '3211' item_code, a.parent_amount amount
 from glg1054 a, glg1046 b --調整數--損益結轉至年初未分配盈餘--
 where a.month_date=add_months(v_fin_month,-1)
 and a.parent_id=v_company_id
 and a.parent_curr=v_curr
 and nvl(a.data_type,'N')='N'
 and a.type='6'
 and a.item_code=b.item_code
 and to_number(b.acct_type) between 4 and 9
 --v12.2.8 add by kimberly end-- 
 union all 
 select a.source_type, a.item_code,a.child_amount+a.amount+a.adj_amount amount
 from v_glg_1048 a, glg1046 b --母子公司合併數--
 where a.month_date=add_months(v_fin_month,-1)
 and a.company_id=v_company_id
 and a.curr=v_curr
 and nvl(a.data_type,'N')='N'
 and a.item_code=b.item_code
 and to_number(b.acct_type) between 1 and 3
 --v12.2.8 add by kimberly start-- 
 union all 
 select a.source_type, '3211' item_code,(a.child_amount+a.amount+a.adj_amount) amount
 from v_glg_1048 a, glg1046 b --母子公司合併數--
 where a.month_date=add_months(v_fin_month,-1)
 and a.company_id=v_company_id
 and a.curr=v_curr
 and nvl(a.data_type,'N')='N'
 and a.item_code=b.item_code
 and to_number(b.acct_type) between 4 and 9 
 --v12.2.8 add by kimberly end-- 
 ) aa, glg1046 bb --v12.2.7 add by kimberly--
 where aa.item_code(+)=bb.item_code --v12.2.7 add by kimberly-- 
 group by nvl(aa.source_type,'FIN_ADJ'), bb.item_code --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly-- 
 ) loop
 
 insert_glg1054_proc (v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr,
 '3', v_company_id, v_curr, dd.item_code,
 to_number(null), to_number(null), dd.amount,
 dd.source_type 
 ); 
 end loop; 
 
 --列印沖銷資料
 for cc in c_get_adj_child(v_company_id, v_curr) loop 
 for c5r in c5_adj (v_company_id, v_curr, cc.child_id , cc.child_curr) loop
 insert_glg1054_proc (v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr,
 '4', cc.child_id , cc.child_curr, c5r.item_code,
 to_number(null), to_number(null), c5r.amount,
 c5r.source_type --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 );
 end loop;
 end loop;
 
 --產生調整數資料 
 for cc in c_total(v_company_id, v_curr, '5') loop
 if nvl(cc.parent_amount,0)!=0 then
 v_chk:=null;
 open c_chk_glg1054 (v_company_id, v_curr, cc.item_code, cc.source_type); --v10.9.1 modify by kimberly--
 fetch c_chk_glg1054 into v_chk;
 close c_chk_glg1054;
 if v_chk is null then
 insert_glg1054_proc (v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr,
 '6', v_company_id , v_curr, cc.item_code,
 to_number(null), to_number(null), 0,
 cc.source_type --v10.9.1 add by kimberly--
 );
 end if;
 end if; 
 end loop; 
 
end; 
--v12.2.6 add by kimberly end--
--==============================
-- Main process
--============================== 
BEGIN
--s_alert(1,'month='||to_char(v_fin_month,'yyyymm')||', company_id='||:b1v_glg_1050.company_id,v_temp);
 --v12.2.2 modify by kimberly start-- 
 --v_fin_month :=v_fin_month;
 --v_company_id:=:b1v_glg_1050.company_id; 
 --v_curr:=:b1v_glg_1050.curr; 
 v_fin_month :=nvl(:b1v_glg_1050.month_date, p_month_date);
 v_company_id:=nvl(:b1v_glg_1050.company_id, p_company_id); 
 v_curr:=nvl(:b1v_glg_1050.curr, p_curr); 
 --v12.2.2 modify by kimberly end-- 
 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 v_ifrs_first := nvl(p_ifrs_first,'N');
 
 if v_company_id='WHL' and v_ifrs_first='Y' then
 v_data_type := 'F'; 
 gen_ifrs_first_proc; --v12.2.6 add by kimberly--
 else 
 v_ifrs_first := 'N';
 v_data_type := 'N';
 generate_proc;
 end if; 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end--

EXCEPTION
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 set_application_property(cursor_style,'default'); 
 s_alert(1,'data_type:'||v_data_type||'...' ||sqlerrm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
END;

PROCEDURE p_import_csvfile(p_file_type in varchar2,p_path in varchar2,
 p_fin_month out date,p_company_id out varchar2) IS
/*******************************************************************************
| create by : TingYu 2011.10.06
| parameter : p_file_type 檔案轉入類別,'1':EDI,'2':Local Acct No
| p_path 檔案轉入路徑
| purpose : csv檔案轉入
| modify :
| v12.2.3 2012/02/08 Kimberly fix for 加上 nvl() function-- 
| v12.2.5 2012/02/13 Kimberly for local財報轉入時, new_item in ('A440','A441','L609')必需轉成14長期股權投資科目
| v12.2.7 2012/02/15 Kimberly fix v12.2.5, glg1055 新增child_id記錄投資公司的代碼, 並以此做轉換 
| v12.3.1 2012/03/14 Kimberly for FIN-Joshua/Ray, 取消L609 轉成 14xx長期股權投資科目, 改依ODGLS143之對應轉換 
\*******************************************************************************/
v_data_type varchar2(10); --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--

 --v12.2.1 add by kimberly start-- 
 cursor c_chk_admin is
 select 'Y' 
 from glg1009
 where code_type='ODGLS144_ADMIN'
 and code_id=:parameter.user_code ;
 --v12.2.1 add by kimberly end--
 
 cursor c1_get_parent_id (c_company_id varchar2,c_curr varchar2,c_month date)
 is
 select parent_id, parent_curr, effect_date
 from v_glg_1046
 where company_id = c_company_id
 and curr = c_curr
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date;

 cursor c2_chk_close (c_company_id varchar2, c_month date)
 is
 select nvl (close_flag, 'N') close_flag
 from glg1050
 where data_type = 'N'
 and trunc (month_date, 'mm') = c_month
 and company_id = c_company_id
 and rownum = 1;

 cursor c3_chk_rate (c_month date,c_child_curr varchar2,c_parent_curr varchar2)
 is
 select a.bs_rate, a.is_rate
 from glg1047 a
 where a.month_date = c_month
 and a.curr = c_child_curr
 and a.parent_curr = c_parent_curr;

 cursor c4_chk_his_glg1052 (c_month date,c_company_id varchar2,c_curr varchar2)
 is
 select '1'
 from glg1052
 where month_date = add_months (trunc (c_month, 'yyyy'), -1)
 and company_id = c_company_id
 and curr = c_curr
 and rownum = 1;
 
 cursor c_item (c_item_code varchar2)
 is
 select rate_type
 from glg1046
 where item_code = c_item_code;

 cursor c_rate (
 c_month date,
 c_child_curr varchar2,
 c_parent_curr varchar2,
 c_item_code varchar2)
 is
 select decode(b.rate_type,'1', a.bs_rate,'2', a.is_rate,'3', a.bs_rate,0) child_parent_rate
 from glg1047 a, glg1046 b
 where a.month_date = c_month
 and a.curr = c_child_curr
 and a.parent_curr = c_parent_curr
 and b.item_code = c_item_code;

 cursor c_last_year (
 c_last_year date,
 c_company_id varchar2,
 c_curr varchar2,
 c_parent_id varchar2,
 c_parent_curr varchar2,
 c_item_code varchar2)
 is
 select b.amount, b.parent_amount
 from glg1052 b
 where b.month_date = c_last_year
 and b.company_id = c_company_id
 and b.curr = c_curr
 and b.parent_id = c_parent_id
 and b.parent_curr = c_parent_curr
 and b.item_code = c_item_code;

 cursor c_chk_new_item(c_company_id varchar2,c_acct_no varchar2)
 is
 select SF_GLS_0006('N',a.new_item, b.supply_code, p_fin_month) new_item,
 a.child_id child_id --v12.2.7 add by kimberly--
 from glg1055 a,glg7040 b
 where a.company_id=b.company_id
 and a.company_id=c_company_id
 and a.local_acct_no=c_acct_no
 and trunc(nvl(effect_date,p_fin_month))<=trunc(p_fin_month)
 and trunc(nvl(expire_date,p_fin_month))>=trunc(p_fin_month)
 and rownum <=1;
 
 cursor c_chk_item_code(c_month date,c_company_id varchar2,c_new_item varchar2) --v12.2.5 modify by kimberly--
 is
 select item_code
 from glg1048
 where new_item=c_new_item 
 and c_new_item not in ('A440','A441') --v12.3.1 modify by kimberly--,'L609') --v12.2.5 add by kimberly-- 
 --v12.2.5 add by kimberly start-- 
 union all
 select adj_item_code item_code 
 from v_glg_1046
 where c_new_item in ('A440','A441') --v12.3.1 modify by kimberly--,'L609')
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and c_month between effect_date and expire_date 
 --v12.2.5 add by kimberly end-- 
 ;
 
 cursor c_glg1049(
 c_month_date date,
 c_company_id varchar2,
 c_curr varchar2)
 is
 select month_date,company_id,curr,item_code,nvl(sum(amount),0) tot_amt
 from glg1049
 where month_date=c_month_date
 and company_id=c_company_id
 and curr=c_curr
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 group by month_date,company_id,curr,item_code;
 
 c1 c_glg1049%rowtype;

 v_period_status varchar2 (32);
 in_file text_io.file_type;
 out_file text_io.file_type;
 v_record varchar2 (2000);
 v_field_value varchar2 (200);
 fopen_fail exception;
 pragma exception_init (fopen_fail, -302000);
 v_count number := 0;
 v_type varchar2 (14);
 v_month varchar2 (6);
 v_fin_month date;
 v_company_id varchar2 (20); 
 v_curr varchar2 (3);
 v_item_code varchar2 (10);
 v_rate_type varchar2 (1);
 v_amount number;
 v_remark varchar2 (200);
 v_adj_curr varchar2(3); --v12.3.2 add by kimberly--
 v_adj_amount number; --v12.3.2 add by kimberly--
 v_invest_id varchar2 (20); --v12.3.2 add by kimberly--
 v_parent_id varchar2 (20);
 v_parent_curr varchar2 (3);
 v_effect_date date; 
 v_curr_parent_rate number;
 v_parent_amount number;
 v_glg1050_seq number;
 v_chk varchar2 (2);
 v_chk_id varchar2 (20);
 v_chk_curr varchar2 (3);
 v_chk_effect_date date; 
 v_data_exist varchar2 (2);
 v_total number := 0;
 v_temp varchar2 (2);
 text_id varchar2 (200);
 v_record_no number := 6;
 v_errchk varchar2 (2);
 v_error varchar2 (2000);
 v_errm varchar2 (2000);
 v_alert varchar2 (2);
 v_line_no number := 0;
 v_last_pos number := 0;
 v_last_year date;
 v_last_amt number;
 v_last_parent_amt number;
 v_bs_rate number;
 v_is_rate number;
 v_local_acct_no varchar2(30);
 v_new_item varchar2(10);
 v_local_child varchar2(20); --v12.2.7 add by kimberly--
--===================================
-- function f_rate_type
--===================================
function f_rate_type(ff_item_code in varchar2) return varchar2 is

 cursor c_item (c_item_code varchar2)
 is
 select rate_type
 from glg1046
 where item_code = c_item_code;
 
 ff_rate_type varchar2 (1);
 
begin

 open c_item (ff_item_code);
 fetch c_item into ff_rate_type;
 if c_item%notfound then
 ff_rate_type := null;
 end if;
 close c_item;

 if ff_rate_type is null then
 v_error := v_record_no||'th record: Item_Code '||ff_item_code|| ' is wrong, please check ODGLS141...';
 text_io.put (out_file, v_error);
 text_io.new_line (out_file);
 v_errchk := 'Y';
 end if;
 
 return ff_rate_type;
end;
--===================================
-- proceudre p_insert_glg1050
--===================================
procedure p_insert_glg1050 (pp_rate_type in varchar2,pp_item_code in varchar2,
 pp_amount in number, pp_remark in varchar2) is
begin

 v_curr_parent_rate := 0;
 v_parent_amount := 0;
 
 if pp_rate_type in ('1', '2', '3') then
 open c_rate (v_fin_month, v_curr, v_parent_curr, pp_item_code);
 fetch c_rate
 into v_curr_parent_rate;
 close c_rate;
 end if;

 if pp_rate_type in ('1', '2') then
 v_parent_amount :=round (pp_amount * v_curr_parent_rate, sf_ars_0008 (v_parent_curr));
 elsif pp_rate_type = '3' then
 v_last_amt := 0;
 v_last_parent_amt := 0;
 v_last_year := trunc (trunc (v_fin_month, 'yyyy') - 1, 'mm');
 
 open c_last_year (v_last_year,v_company_id,v_curr,
 v_parent_id,v_parent_curr,pp_item_code);
 fetch c_last_year
 into v_last_amt, v_last_parent_amt;
 close c_last_year;

 v_parent_amount := nvl(v_last_parent_amt,0)--去年
 +round((nvl (pp_amount,0)-nvl(v_last_amt,0))*v_curr_parent_rate,sf_ars_0008 (v_parent_curr)); --今年
 end if;

 select glg1002_seq.nextval
 into v_glg1050_seq
 from dual;

 begin
 insert into glg1050(glg1050_seq, data_type,
 month_date, company_id, 
 curr, item_code, amount, 
 entry_date, entry_office, entry_user, entry_program, 
 modify_date, modify_office, modify_user, modify_program,
 remark,parent_id, parent_curr, 
 curr_parent_rate, parent_amount)
 values(v_glg1050_seq, v_data_type, --'N' data_type,--v12.2.2 modify by kimberly-- 
 v_fin_month, v_company_id, 
 v_curr, pp_item_code, pp_amount, 
 sf_ars_0001, :parameter.office_code, :parameter.user_code,:form_id_display, 
 sf_ars_0001, :parameter.office_code, :parameter.user_code,:form_id_display, 
 pp_remark,v_parent_id, v_parent_curr,
 decode(pp_rate_type,'3',to_number (null),v_curr_parent_rate),nvl (v_parent_amount, 0)
 );
 exception
 when dup_val_on_index then
 v_error :=v_record_no||'th record: Item_Code '||v_item_code||' duplicate, please check EDI file...';
 text_io.put (out_file, v_error);
 text_io.new_line (out_file);
 v_errchk := 'Y';
 end;
end;
--=================================
-- main process
--=================================
begin

 v_errchk := 'N';
 v_count := 0;
 v_total := 0;
 in_file := text_io.fopen (p_path, 'R');
 forms_ddl ('savepoint loan1');

 loop
 begin
 text_io.get_line (in_file, v_record);
 exception
 when no_data_found then
 exit;
 end;

 v_count := v_count + 1;
 clear_message;
 synchronize;

 if v_count = 1 then
 v_type := ltrim (rtrim (f_csvstr (v_record, 2)));

 if v_type is null or v_type != 'FIN_STATEMENT' then
 s_alert ('3','EDI Layout error!! Type must be FIN_STATEMENT ',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 elsif v_count = 2 then
 
 v_month := ltrim(rtrim(f_csvstr(v_record,2)));
 v_fin_month := to_date (v_month || '01', 'YYYYMMDD');

 if v_fin_month is null then
 s_alert ('3', 'No Month error!!', v_temp);
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 --v12.2.1 add by kimberly start-- 
 if p_file_type = '1' and v_fin_month >= sf_gls_0004('2011FIN016') then
 v_chk := null;
 open c_chk_admin;
 fetch c_chk_admin into v_chk;
 close c_chk_admin;
 if v_chk is null then 
 s_alert ('3', 'Month error:'||v_month||'!! 自'||to_char(sf_gls_0004('2011FIN016'),'yyyy/mm')||'月開始, 請改用 [Local財報轉入] button 轉入Local科目餘額表', v_temp);
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 end if; 
 --v12.2.1 add by kimberly end--
 p_fin_month := v_fin_month;
 
 elsif v_count = 3 then
 v_company_id := ltrim(rtrim(f_csvstr(v_record,2)));
 p_company_id := v_company_id;
 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start--首次適用 
 if v_company_id = 'WHL' then
 v_data_type:= ltrim(rtrim(F_CSVSTR(v_record,3))); 
 if nvl(v_data_type,'N') = 'FIRST' then
 v_data_type:='F';
 else
 v_data_type:='N';
 end if;
 else
 v_data_type:='N';
 end if;
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 elsif v_count = 4 then 
 v_curr := ltrim(rtrim(f_csvstr(v_record,2)));
 
 open c1_get_parent_id (v_company_id, v_curr, v_fin_month);
 fetch c1_get_parent_id into v_parent_id, v_parent_curr, v_effect_date;
 close c1_get_parent_id;

 if v_parent_id is null or v_parent_curr is null then
 s_alert('3','Company_Id or Curr or Effect_Date error!! Please check in ODGLS108 (code_type is CONSOL_COMPANY_RELATION)',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 v_bs_rate := to_number (null);
 v_is_rate := to_number (null);

 open c3_chk_rate (v_fin_month, v_curr, v_parent_curr);
 fetch c3_chk_rate into v_bs_rate, v_is_rate;
 close c3_chk_rate;

 if nvl (v_bs_rate, 0) = 0 or nvl (v_is_rate, 0) = 0 then
 s_alert('3',v_curr|| ' -> '|| v_parent_curr|| '...無現時匯率, 或現時匯率為零 !! Please check in ODGLS142 ',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 v_chk := null;
 
 --檢查去年12月歷史匯率是否已存在
 open c4_chk_his_glg1052 (v_fin_month,v_company_id,v_curr);
 fetch c4_chk_his_glg1052 into v_chk;
 close c4_chk_his_glg1052;

 if v_chk is null and trunc (v_effect_date, 'yyyy') != trunc (v_fin_month, 'yyyy') then
 v_chk := null;
 
 --檢查去年12月是否已關帳
 open c2_chk_close (v_company_id,add_months (trunc (v_fin_month, 'yyyy'), -1));
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c2_chk_close;

 if v_chk != 'Y' then
 s_alert ('3',to_char(add_months(trunc (v_fin_month, 'yyyy'),-1),'yyyymm')||' 未關帳, 歷史匯率資料無法轉入 !!',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 --歷史匯率年度結轉
 sp_glg_0030(v_fin_month,v_company_id,v_curr,:parameter.office_code,:parameter.user_code); 
 end if;

 v_data_exist := null;
 
 --檢查對象公司是否已關帳
 open c2_chk_close (v_company_id,v_fin_month);
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_data_exist;
 close c2_chk_close;

 if v_data_exist = 'Y'then
 s_alert ('3',v_company_id|| ' --> '|| to_char (v_fin_month, 'yyyymm')|| '月已關帳, 財報資料不可重轉 !!',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 v_chk := null;
 
 --檢查母公司是否已關帳
 open c2_chk_close (v_parent_id,v_fin_month);
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c2_chk_close;

 if v_chk = 'Y' then
 s_alert ('3',v_parent_id || ' ...母公司已關帳, 財報資料不可重轉 !!',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 v_chk_id := v_parent_id;
 v_chk_curr := v_parent_curr;
 v_field_value := null;

 for idx in 1 .. 50 loop
 if v_chk_id = 'WHL' then
 exit;
 end if;

 v_chk := null;
 
 --取得上階母公司id
 open c1_get_parent_id (v_chk_id, v_chk_curr, v_fin_month);
 fetch c1_get_parent_id into v_chk_id, v_chk_curr, v_chk_effect_date;
 close c1_get_parent_id;
 
 --檢查上階母公司是否已關帳
 open c2_chk_close (v_chk_id, v_fin_month);
 fetch c2_chk_close into v_chk;
 close c2_chk_close;

 if v_chk = 'Y' then
 if v_field_value is null then
 v_field_value := v_chk_id;
 else
 v_field_value := v_field_value||', '|| v_chk_id;
 end if;
 end if;
 end loop;

 if v_field_value is not null then
 s_alert ('3',v_field_value|| ' ...上階母公司已關帳, 財報資料不可重轉 !!',v_temp);
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

 if v_data_exist is not null then
 s_alert ('2', '財報資料已存在, 是否重轉 ?!', v_temp);

 if v_temp = 'Y' then
 
 delete glg1050
 where trunc (month_date, 'mm') = v_fin_month
 and company_id = v_company_id
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 and ((v_data_type ='F' and nvl(data_type,'N') ='F') or
 (v_data_type!='F' and nvl(data_type,'N')!='F'))
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end-- 
 ;
 
 if p_file_type ='2' then
 delete glg1049
 where trunc (month_date,'mm')=v_fin_month
 and company_id = v_company_id
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 ;
 end if;
 else
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end if;

 out_file :=text_io.fopen ('c:\apps\whoracle\tempf\'|| v_company_id|| 'error'|| '.txt','w');
 
 elsif v_count > 6 then
 
 v_record_no := v_record_no + 1;
 v_line_no := v_line_no + 1;
 v_item_code := null;
 v_new_item := null;
 v_local_acct_no := null; 
 
 if p_file_type='1' then
 
 p_csvstr (v_record, 1, v_last_pos, v_item_code);
 
 if v_item_code is null then
 exit;
 end if;

 v_rate_type := null;
 v_rate_type := f_rate_type(v_item_code);

 elsif p_file_type='2' then
 
 p_csvstr (v_record, 1, v_last_pos, v_local_acct_no);
 
 if v_local_acct_no is null then
 exit;
 end if; 
 end if;

 p_csvstr (v_record, 2, v_last_pos, v_field_value); 
 v_amount := nvl(to_number (replace (v_field_value, ',')),0); --v12.2.3 modify by kimberly, 加上 nvl() function-- 
 v_total := v_total + v_amount;
 
 -- if v_record_no in (7,17) then
 -- s_alert('1','amount('||v_record_no||')='||V_amount||',last_pos='||v_last_pos,v_temp); 
 -- end if; 
 
 p_csvstrb (v_record, 3, v_last_pos + 1, v_remark, v_last_pos); 
 v_remark := substrb (ltrim (rtrim (v_remark)), 1, 200); 
 
 -- if v_record_no in (7,17) then
 -- s_alert('1','remark('||v_record_no||')='||v_remark||',last_pos='||v_last_pos,v_temp); 
 -- end if;
 
 --v12.3.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 p_csvstrb(v_record, 4, v_last_pos + 1, v_adj_curr, v_last_pos); 
 
 -- if v_record_no in (7,17) then
 -- s_alert('1','v_adj_curr('||v_record_no||')='||v_adj_curr||',last_pos='||v_last_pos,v_temp); 
 -- end if;
 
 p_csvstrb(v_record, 5, v_last_pos + 1, v_field_value, v_last_pos);
 v_adj_amount := nvl(to_number (replace (v_field_value, ',')),0);
 
 -- if v_record_no in (7,17) then
 -- s_alert('1','v_adj_amount('||v_record_no||')='||v_adj_amount||',last_pos='||v_last_pos,v_temp); 
 -- end if;
 
 p_csvstrb(v_record, 6, v_last_pos + 1, v_invest_id, v_last_pos); 
 
 -- if v_record_no in (7,17) then
 -- s_alert('1','v_invest_id('||v_record_no||')='||v_invest_id||',last_pos='||v_last_pos,v_temp); 
 -- end if; 
 --v12.3.2 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 if p_file_type='2' then
 
 --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly start-- 
 /*open c_chk_new_item (v_company_id,v_local_acct_no);
 fetch c_chk_new_item into v_new_item;
 if c_chk_new_item%notfound then
 v_new_item := null;
 end if;
 close c_chk_new_item; */
 pu_new_item(v_company_id,v_local_acct_no,v_fin_month,v_new_item,v_local_child);
 --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly end-- 
 
 if v_new_item is not null then 
 
 --v12.3.2 add by kimberly start--
 if v_new_item in ('A440','A441') then
 if v_local_child is null and v_invest_id is null then
 v_error :=v_record_no||'th record: Local_Acct_No '||v_local_acct_no||',New_Item '||v_new_item||' need key-in INVEST_ID, please check EDI file or ODGLS146...';
 text_io.put(out_file,v_error);
 text_io.new_line(out_file);
 v_errchk :='Y';
 else 
 v_local_child:= nvl(v_local_child,v_invest_id);
 end if; 
 end if; 
 --v12.3.2 add by kimberly end--
 
 --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly start--
 /*open c_chk_item_code(v_fin_month,v_company_id,v_new_item); 
 fetch c_chk_item_code into v_item_code;
 if c_chk_item_code%notfound then
 v_item_code := null;
 end if;
 close c_chk_item_code; */
 v_item_code:= f_item_code (v_fin_month,
 nvl(v_local_child, v_company_id),
 v_new_item
 );
 --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly end-- 
 
 if v_item_code is null then
 v_error := v_record_no||'th record: New_Item '||v_new_item|| ' can not find the Item_Code, please check ODGLS143...';
 text_io.put (out_file, v_error);
 text_io.new_line (out_file);
 v_errchk := 'Y';
 end if;

 else
 if v_amount !=0 then 
 v_error := v_record_no||'th record: Local_Acct_No '||v_local_acct_no||' can not find the New_Item, please check ODGLS146...';
 text_io.put (out_file, v_error);
 text_io.new_line (out_file);
 v_errchk := 'Y';
 end if;
 end if;
 
 end if;
 
 if v_errchk = 'N' then 
 
 if p_file_type='1' then 
 p_insert_glg1050(v_rate_type,v_item_code,v_amount,v_remark);
 elsif p_file_type='2' then
 if v_amount !=0 then 
 insert into glg1049(month_date, company_id, curr, local_acct_no,
 new_item, item_code, amount, entry_date,
 entry_office, entry_user, entry_program, remark,
 data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 )
 values (v_fin_month, v_company_id, v_curr, v_local_acct_no,
 v_new_item, v_item_code, v_amount, sf_ars_0001,
 :parameter.office_code, :parameter.user_code, :form_id_display, v_remark,
 v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 );
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;

 clear_message;
 end loop;
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 
 if p_file_type='2' then
 if v_errchk = 'N' then
 open c_glg1049(v_fin_month,v_company_id, v_curr);
 loop
 fetch c_glg1049 into c1;
 if c_glg1049%notfound then
 exit;
 end if;
 
 v_rate_type := null;
 v_rate_type := f_rate_type(c1.item_code);
 
 p_insert_glg1050(v_rate_type,c1.item_code,c1.tot_amt,null);

 update glg1049
 set glg1050_seq=v_glg1050_seq
 where month_date=c1.month_date
 and company_id=c1.company_id
 and curr=c1.curr
 and item_code=c1.item_code
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 ;
 
 end loop;
 end if;
 end if;

 if nvl (v_total, 999999999) != 0 then
 v_error := 'DR/CR Amount not balance !! total: '|| v_total; --v12.3.2 modify by kimberly--
 text_io.put (out_file, v_error);
 text_io.new_line (out_file);
 v_errchk := 'Y';
 end if;

 text_io.fclose (out_file);

 if v_errchk = 'Y' then
 set_application_property (cursor_style, 'default');
 s_alert (3,'Please check of the message in c:\apps\whoracle\tempf\'|| v_company_id|| 'error.txt',v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 --投資損益計算
 sp_glg_0029 (v_fin_month,
 v_company_id,
 v_curr,
 :parameter.office_code,
 :parameter.user_code);

 delete glg1054
 where month_date = v_fin_month
 and parent_id = v_company_id
 and parent_curr = v_curr
 and nvl(data_type,'N')=v_data_type --v12.2.2 add by kimberly-- 
 and type between '1' and '4';
 
 
exception
 when fopen_fail then
 set_application_property (cursor_style, 'default');
 s_alert ('1', 'Can`t found file!!', v_temp);
 s_alert ('3', sqlerrm, v_temp);
 forms_ddl ('rollback');
 go_item (p_path);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when form_trigger_failure then
 set_application_property (cursor_style, 'default');
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 text_io.fclose (out_file);
 forms_ddl ('rollback');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 when others then
 set_application_property (cursor_style, 'default');
 text_io.fclose (in_file);
 text_io.fclose (out_file);
 v_errm := sqlerrm;
 forms_ddl ('rollback');
 s_alert ('3', v_errm, v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end;

PROCEDURE p_output_xls(p_type varchar2,p_month_date date,p_company_id varchar2,p_curr varchar2) IS
 Excel_app OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 Workbooks OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 Workbook OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 Worksheets OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 Worksheet OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 args OLE2.List_Type;
 v_temp varchar2(1);
 
 -----------------------------------
 -- function acct_no_desc
 -----------------------------------
 function acct_no_desc(f_local_acct_no varchar2) return char is
 cursor c_glg1003 is
 select nvl(a.acct_desc_c,a.acct_desc_e) acct_no_desc
 from glg1003 a 
 where a.acct_no = f_local_acct_no
 and rownum <=1;
 
 cursor c_glg1055 is
 select a.acct_no_desc acct_no_desc
 from glg1055 a
 where a.local_acct_no = f_local_acct_no
 and rownum <=1; 
 
 f_acct_no_desc varchar2(500);

 begin
 if p_company_id='WHL' then
 
 open c_glg1003;
 fetch c_glg1003 into f_acct_no_desc;
 if c_glg1003%notfound then
 f_acct_no_desc := null;
 end if;
 close c_glg1003;
 
 else
 
 open c_glg1055;
 fetch c_glg1055 into f_acct_no_desc;
 if c_glg1055%notfound then
 f_acct_no_desc :=null;
 end if;
 close c_glg1055;
 
 end if;
 --return f_acct_no_desc; --v12.2.2 modify by kimberly--
 return ltrim(rtrim(replace(replace(f_acct_no_desc,chr(9)),chr(10)))); --v12.2.2 modify by kimberly--

 end; 
 
 -----------------------------
 -- procedure p_body
 -----------------------------
 procedure p_body is 
 v_count number;
 Row_cnt number; 
 Col_cnt number; 
 v_tot_amt number; 
 cursor c_data is 
 select decode(nvl(a.data_type,'N'),'F','首次適用','各月餘額') data_type, --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 a.month_date,
 a.company_id,
 a.curr,
 a.item_code,
 a.new_item,
 nvl(c.description_c,c.description_e) new_item_desc,
 a.local_acct_no,
 b.description item_code_desc,
 a.amount,
 decode(a.item_code,null,'No Item_Code mapping in ODGLS143',a.remark) remark
 from glg1049 a,glg1046 b,glg1012 c
 where a.item_code=b.item_code(+)
 and a.new_item=c.new_item(+)
 and a.month_date=p_month_date
 and a.company_id=p_company_id
 and a.curr=p_curr
 order by nvl(a.data_type,'N'), --v12.2.2 add by kimberly--
 nvl(a.item_code,'0'),a.new_item,a.local_acct_no; 
 
 c1 c_data%rowtype;
 
 begin
 begin 
 select count(1)
 into v_count
 from glg1049
 where month_date=p_month_date
 and company_id=p_company_id
 and curr=p_curr
 and rownum<=1;
 exception 
 when others then 
 s_alert('1','Get GLG1049 Fail!'||sqlerrm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end ;
 if v_count !=0 then
 Row_cnt := 1; 
 Col_cnt := 1; 
 --print parameter--
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , 'Month Date:');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, to_char(p_month_date,'yyyymm')); 
 Row_cnt := 2; 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , 'Company Id:');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, p_company_id);
 Row_cnt := 3; 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , 'Curr:');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, p_curr);
 
 --print title-- 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt +1; 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt, 'Item Code');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, 'Item Code Desc');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, 'New Item');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+3, 'New Item Desc');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+4, 'Local Acct No');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+5, 'Acct No Desc');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+6, 'Amout');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+7, 'Remark'); 
 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 if p_company_id='WHL' then
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+8, 'Data Type');
 end if; 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 --print dtl-- 
 v_tot_amt := 0; 
 open c_data;
 loop
 fetch c_data into c1;
 if c_data%notfound then
 exit;
 end if;
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt +1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , c1.item_code);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, c1.item_code_desc);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, c1.new_item);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+3, c1.new_item_desc); 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+4, c1.local_acct_no);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+5, acct_no_desc(c1.local_acct_no));
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+6, c1.amount);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+7, c1.remark);
 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 if p_company_id='WHL' then
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+8, c1.data_type);
 end if; 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end--
 
 v_tot_amt := c1.amount+v_tot_amt; 
 end loop;
 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt +1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+5, 'Total amount:');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+6, v_tot_amt);
 if v_tot_amt<>0 then
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+7,'DR/CR Amount not balance!!');
 end if;
 else
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, 1, 1, '查無資料...');
 end if;
 end;
-----------------------------
 -- procedure p_daj
 -----------------------------
 procedure p_adj is 
 v_count number;
 Row_cnt number; 
 Col_cnt number; 
 v_tot_amt number; 
 cursor c_data is 
 select decode(nvl(a.data_type,'N'),'F','首次適用','各月餘額') data_type,
 a.source_type,
 a.month_date,
 a.parent_id company_id,
 a.parent_curr curr,
 a.adj_id, 
 a.adj_item_code item_code,
 b.description item_code_desc,
 a.adj_amount amount,
 decode(a.adj_item_code,null,'No Item_Code mapping in ODGLS143',a.remark) remark
 from glg1053 a,glg1046 b
 where a.adj_item_code=b.item_code(+)
 and a.month_date=p_month_date
 and (a.parent_id=p_company_id or a.adj_id=p_company_id)
 order by nvl(a.data_type,'N'), a.source_type, a.parent_id, a.adj_id,
 nvl(a.adj_item_code,'0'); 
 
 c1 c_data%rowtype;
 
 begin
 begin 
 select count(1)
 into v_count
 from glg1053
 where month_date=p_month_date
 and (parent_id=p_company_id or adj_id=p_company_id) 
 and rownum<=1;
 exception 
 when others then 
 s_alert('1','Get GLG1053 Fail!'||sqlerrm,v_temp);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end ;
 if v_count !=0 then
 Row_cnt := 1; 
 Col_cnt := 1; 
 --print parameter--
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , 'Month Date:');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, to_char(p_month_date,'yyyymm')); 
 Row_cnt := 2; 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , 'Company Id:');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, p_company_id);
 Row_cnt := 3; 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , 'Curr:');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, p_curr);
 
 --print title-- 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt +1; 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , 'Source Type');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, 'Company Id');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, 'Curr');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+3, 'Adj Id');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+4, 'Adj Item Code');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+5, 'Item Code Desc');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+6, 'Amount'); 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+7, 'Remark');
 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 if p_company_id='WHL' then
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+8, 'Data Type');
 end if; 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 --print dtl-- 
 v_tot_amt := 0; 
 open c_data;
 loop
 fetch c_data into c1;
 if c_data%notfound then
 exit;
 end if;
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt +1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt , c1.source_type);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+1, c1.company_id);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+2, c1.curr);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+3, c1.adj_id);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+4, c1.item_code); 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+5, c1.item_code_desc); 
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+6, c1.amount);
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+7, c1.remark);
 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly start-- 
 if p_company_id='WHL' then
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+8, c1.data_type);
 end if; 
 --v12.2.2 add by kimberly end--
 
 if c1.company_id = p_company_id then
 v_tot_amt := c1.amount+v_tot_amt; 
 end if; 
 end loop;
 
 Row_cnt := Row_cnt +1;
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+5, 'Total amount:');
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+6, v_tot_amt);
 if v_tot_amt<>0 then
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, Row_cnt, Col_cnt+7,'Company_Id:'||p_company_id||'--> DR/CR Amount not balance!!');
 end if;
 else
 OLE_FILL_TEXT (Worksheet, 1, 1, '查無資料...');
 end if;
 end; 
------------------------------
-- main program
------------------------------ 
BEGIN
 
----------------產生 Excel 檔---------------------------------
 -- Create a OLE object (MS-Excel object)
 Excel_app := OLE2.CREATE_OBJ('Excel.Application');

 -- Set OLE object visible
 OLE2.SET_PROPERTY(Excel_app, 'Visible' , 'TRUE');

 -- Get the workbooks object
 Workbooks := OLE2.GET_OBJ_PROPERTY(Excel_app, 'Workbooks');

 -- Add a new workbook
 Workbook := OLE2.INVOKE_OBJ(Workbooks, 'Add');
 
 -- Get the activesheet object & set sheet name
 --v12.2.9 modify by kimberly start--
 --Worksheet := OLE2.GET_OBJ_PROPERTY(Workbook, 'ActiveSheet'); 
 --OLE2.SET_PROPERTY(Worksheet, 'Name', 'Detail');
 Worksheets := ole2.get_obj_property(Workbook, 'Worksheets');
 Worksheet := ole2.invoke_obj(Worksheets, 'Add');
 --v12.2.9 modify by kimberly end--
 
 -- Print data
 p_body; 
 
 ole2.set_property (Worksheet, 'Name', '財報Detail');
 ole2.release_obj (Worksheet);
 
 ----------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 --v11.2.9 add by kimberly start--
 Worksheet := ole2.invoke_obj (Worksheets, 'Add');
 p_adj;
 ole2.set_property (Worksheet, 'Name', '沖銷Detail');
 ole2.release_obj (Worksheet);
 --v11.2.9 add by kimberly end-- 
 
 --Save the Excel file created
 args := OLE2.Create_Arglist;
 if p_type='1' then
 OLE2.ADD_ARG(args,'C:\APPS\WHORACLE\tempf\'||to_char(p_month_date,'yyyymm')||'WHLerror.xls'); 
 else
 OLE2.ADD_ARG(args,'C:\APPS\WHORACLE\PRINTF\'||:form_id_display||'_'||to_char(p_month_date,'yyyymm')||'_'||p_company_id||'_'||p_curr||'.xls');
 end if;
 OLE2.INVOKE(workbook, 'SaveAs', args); 
 OLE2.DESTROY_ARGLIST(args); 

 -- Release resources
 OLE2.RELEASE_OBJ(Worksheet);
 OLE2.RELEASE_OBJ(Workbook);
 OLE2.RELEASE_OBJ(Workbooks);
 OLE2.RELEASE_OBJ(Excel_app);

END;

PROCEDURE OLE_AUTOFIT (Worksheet IN OUT OLE2.OBJ_TYPE) IS

 range OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 range_col OLE2.OBJ_TYPE;
 
BEGIN
 -- Autofit columns 
range := OLE2.GET_OBJ_PROPERTY( worksheet,'UsedRange'); 
range_col := OLE2.GET_OBJ_PROPERTY( range,'Columns');

OLE2.INVOKE( range_col,'AutoFit' );
 
OLE2.RELEASE_OBJ( range ); 
OLE2.RELEASE_OBJ( range_col ); 

END;

FUNCTION F_glg1055_newitem(vcompany_id IN VARCHAR2, vlocal_acct_no IN VARCHAR2) RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 v_new_item VARCHAR2(2000):=NULL;
BEGIN
 select new_item
 into v_new_item
 from glg1055
 where company_id=vcompany_id
 and local_acct_no=vlocal_acct_no;
 return v_new_item;
exception
 when others then
 return null;
 
END;

FUNCTION F_new_item(vcompany_id IN VARCHAR2, vlocal_acct_no IN VARCHAR2,v_month_date IN date) RETURN VARCHAR2 IS 

 cursor c_get_new_item is
 select SF_GLS_0006('N',a.new_item, b.supply_code, v_month_date) new_item
 from glg1055 a,glg7040 b
 where a.company_id=b.company_id
 and a.company_id=vcompany_id
 and vcompany_id!='WHL' --v12.2.1 add by kimberly--
 and a.local_acct_no=vlocal_acct_no
 and trunc(nvl(effect_date,v_month_date))<=trunc(v_month_date)
 and trunc(nvl(expire_date,v_month_date))>=trunc(v_month_date)
 and rownum <=1
 --v12.2.1 add by kimberly start-- 
 union all
 select new_item
 from glg1012
 where vcompany_id='WHL'
 and new_item= vlocal_acct_no 
 and trunc(v_month_date) between trunc(nvl(begin_date,v_month_date)) and trunc(nvl(end_date,v_month_date))
 --v12.2.1 add by kimberly end-- 
 ;
 v_new_item VARCHAR2(2000):=NULL; 
BEGIN
 open c_get_new_item; 
 fetch c_get_new_item into v_new_item;
 close c_get_new_item; 
 
 return v_new_item;
 
exception
 when others then
 return null; 
END;

FUNCTION F_item_code(p_month in date,p_company_id in varchar2,p_new_item IN VARCHAR2) --v12.2.5 modify by kimberly
RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 v_item_code VARCHAR2(2000):=NULL;
 
BEGIN
 select item_code
 into v_item_code
 from glg1048
 where new_item=p_new_item
 and p_new_item not in ('A440','A441') --v12.3.1 modify by kimberly--,'L609') --v12.2.5 add by kimberly--
 --v12.2.5 add by kimberly start-- 
 union all
 select adj_item_code item_code 
 from v_glg_1046
 where p_new_item in ('A440','A441') --v12.3.1 modify by kimberly--,'L609')
 and company_id=p_company_id
 and p_month between effect_date and expire_date 
 --v12.2.5 add by kimberly end-- 
 ;

 return v_item_code;
exception
 when others then
 return null;
 
END;

PROCEDURE PU_NEW_ITEM(p_company_id in varchar2, p_local_acct_no in varchar2, p_month_date in date,
 p_new_item out varchar2, p_child_id out varchar2
 ) IS

 cursor c_get_new_item is
 select SF_GLS_0006('N',a.new_item, b.supply_code, p_month_date) new_item,
 a.child_id child_id --v12.2.7 add by kimberly--
 from glg1055 a,glg7040 b
 where a.company_id=b.company_id
 and a.company_id=p_company_id
 and p_company_id!='WHL' --v12.2.1 add by kimberly--
 and a.local_acct_no=p_local_acct_no
 and trunc(nvl(effect_date,p_month_date))<=trunc(p_month_date)
 and trunc(nvl(expire_date,p_month_date))>=trunc(p_month_date)
 and rownum <=1 
 --v12.2.1 add by kimberly start-- 
 union all
 select new_item, '' child_id --v12.2.7 modify by kimberly--
 from glg1012
 where p_company_id='WHL'
 and new_item= p_local_acct_no 
 and trunc(p_month_date) between trunc(nvl(begin_date,p_month_date)) and trunc(nvl(end_date,p_month_date))
 --v12.2.1 add by kimberly end-- 
 ; 
BEGIN
 open c_get_new_item; 
 fetch c_get_new_item into p_new_item, p_child_id;
 close c_get_new_item; 
 
exception
 when others then
 p_new_item :=null;
 p_child_id :=null; 
END;

RecordGroup.ODGLS144_overridden:RecordGroupQuery:

 where (:b1v_glg_1050.month_date between a.effect_date and a.expire_date or :b1v_glg_1050.month_date is null) 
 and (:b1v_glg_1050.company_id is null or a.company_id=:b1v_glg_1050.company_id)

select a.item_code,a.description
 from glg1046 A
 order by a.item_code

Trigger.FORM_STD_inherited:TriggerText:
Declare 
 lv_action varchar2(20):='Oracle AP Program';
begin
 set_window_property('window0',window_state,maximize);
 ----------------------------------------
 --* 2003/01/22 add maximize property *--
 ----------------------------------------
 set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,window_state,maximize);
 set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,title,upper(:system.current_form)); -- Added by Welson 2006/02/20
 :form_id_display := upper(:system.current_form);
 :form_name_display := :parameter.program_name;
 :user_id_display := :parameter.user_code;
 
 ---------------------------------------------------------
 --* 2005/04/08 Jessie for v$session.module and Action *--
 ---------------------------------------------------------
 DBMS_APPLICATION_INFO.SET_MODULE(upper(:system.current_form),lv_action);
 
 new_form_proc;
end;

Declare
 lv_rowid varchar2(100);
 lv_str varchar2(1000);
 lv_char varchar2(1);
begin 
 -------------------------------------------------------------------
 -- 2005/11/02 Jessie Chang 
 -- show alert while Block Records are locked already by others 
 -----------------------------------------------------------------
 IF (ERROR_CODE = 40501 AND ERROR_TYPE = 'FRM') or 
 (ERROR_CODE = 54 and ERROR_TYPE='ORA') then 
 BEGIN
 lv_rowid := NAME_IN(:system.cursor_block||'.ROWID');
 lv_str := sf_sss_0025(lv_rowid);
 if lv_str is not null then
 S_ALERT('1',lv_str,LV_CHAR);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 else
 on_error;
 end if;
 END;
 else 
 on_error; 
 END IF; 
end;
--on_error;
